## <a name="gx_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1669">gx_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1669">gx_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1670">İşlem düğmesi olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1670">Process button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1671">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1671">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_event_process(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1672">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1672">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1673">Bu hizmet, belirtilen düğme için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1673">This service processes an event for the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1674">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1674">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1675">**düğme** Düğme denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1675">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1676">**event_ptr** İşlemeye olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1676">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1677">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1677">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1678">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı düğme olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1678">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1679">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1679">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1680">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1680">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1681">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1681">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1682">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1682">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1683">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1683">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_button_event_process(GX_BUTTON *button,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default button
            event processing */
        status = gx_button_event_process(button, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1735">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1735">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1736">Tuval için alfa Blend değeri ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1736">Set alpha-blend value for canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1737">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1737">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_alpha_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1738">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1738">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1739">Bu hizmet, belirtilen tuval için alfa Blend değerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1739">This service sets the alpha-blend value for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1740">Tuval alfa değerleri 0 (saydam) ile 255 (tamamen donuk) arasında değişebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1740">Canvas alpha values can range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1741">Birleşik kaplama canvalarını karıştırma, bir bileşik tuval oluşturma yoluyla donanım grafik katmanı desteği veya yazılım desteği gerektirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1741">Blending overlay canvases requires either hardware graphics layer support, or software support via the creation of a composite canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1742">Tuval karıştırma için donanım desteği, tuval alfa değerini ayarlamadan önce gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API'si çağrılarak etkinleştirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1742">Hardware support for canvas blending is enabled by invoking the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API prior to setting the canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1743">Bir tuval bir donanım grafik katmanına bağlı olduğunda, gx_canvas_alpha_set() API'sini çağırmak donanım grafik katmanı karıştırma hizmetlerini doğrudan çağırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1743">When a canvas is bound to a hardware graphics layer, calling the gx_canvas_alpha_set() API directly invokes the hardware graphics layer blending services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1744">Uygulama, tuval karıştırma için yazılım desteğini kullanmak için GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE stiline sahip bir tuval oluşturmalı ve bu stilde diğer tüm yönetilen tuvaller son görüntüden önce bileşik haline gelir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1744">To utilize software support for canvas blending, the application must create a canvas with GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE style, into which all other managed canvases are composited prior to final display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1745">Tuval karıştırmaya yönelik yazılım desteği yalnızca 16 bpp veya daha yüksek renk derinliğine sahip bir görüntü sürücüsü ile çalıştırıla birlikte sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1745">Software support for canvas blending is only provided when running with a display driver of 16-bpp or higher color depth.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1746">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1746">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1747">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1747">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1748">**alfa** Alfa karışımı değeri, 0 (saydam) ile 255 (opak) arasında bir aralıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1748">**alpha** Alpha-blend value, range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).</span></span>

### <a name="return--values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1749">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1749">Return  Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı alfa karışımı değer kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful alpha-blend value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1751">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1751">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1752">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1752">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1753">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1753">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1754">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1754">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1755">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1755">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1756">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1756">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the alpha-blend value of “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_alpha_set(&my_canvas, GX_ALPHA_VALUE_OPAQUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the alpha-blend value was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_arc_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1766">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1766">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1767">Yay çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1767">Draw arc</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1768">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_arc_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r,
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1769">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1770">Bu hizmet, geçerli fırçayı kullanarak tuvalde bir daire yayı çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1770">This service draws a circle arc on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1771">Daire yay, tuval geçersiz bölgeye kırpılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1771">The circle arc is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1772">Bu hizmetin GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1772">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1773">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1773">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1774">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1774">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1775">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1775">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1776">**r** Daire yay yarıçapı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1776">**r** Radius of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1777">**start_angle** Daire yayının başlangıç açısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1777">**start_angle** Starting angle of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1778">**end_angle** Daire yayının bitiş açısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1778">**end_angle** Ending angle of the circle arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1779">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1779">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı yay çekme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1782">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Geçersiz değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1782">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1783">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1783">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1784">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1784">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1785">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1785">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1786">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1786">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle arc from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_arc_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the arc has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1799">gx_canvas_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1799">gx_canvas_block_move</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1800">Tuval piksel bloğunu taşı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1800">Move block of canvas pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1801">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1801">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_block_move(GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    GX_VALUE x_shift, GX_VALUE y_shift, GX_RECTANGLE *dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1802">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1802">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1803">Bu hizmet, bir tuval piksel verisi bloğunu belirtilen yönde taşır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1803">This service moves a block of canvas pixel data in the direction specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1804">Bu hizmet, hızlı kaydırma gerçekleştirmek üzere Gux tarafından dahili olarak kullanılır, ancak uygulama yazılımı tarafından da kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1804">This service is used internally by GUIX to accomplish fast scrolling, but may also be used by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1805">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1805">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1806">**blok** Taşınacak alanın koordinatları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1806">**block** Coordinates of area to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1807">**x_shift** X ekseninde kaydırma yapılacak piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1807">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1808">**y_shift** Y ekseninde kaydırma yapılacak piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1808">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1809">**kirli** Blok taşıma başarılı olursa, bu işlev kaynak dikdörtgenin bu parametresindeki çağırana hala kirli olan bölümünü döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1809">**dirty** If the block move is successful, this function returns the portion of the source rectangle that is still dirty to the caller in this parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1810">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1810">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1811">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı blok taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1811">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1812">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) başarısız blok taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1812">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Failed block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1813">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1813">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1814">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1814">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1815">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1815">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1816">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1816">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1817">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1817">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE invalid;
GX_RECTANGLE move;

/* define 100 x 100 pixel rectangle */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&move, 0, 0, 99, 99);

/* Move this rectangle 10 pixels to the right”. */
status = gx_canvas_block_move(&move, 10, 0, &invalid);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, then ‘invalid’ marks the area that needs to be redrawn after the block move. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_circle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1830">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1830">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1831">Daire çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1831">Draw circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1832">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1832">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_circle_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1833">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1833">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1834">Bu hizmet, geçerli fırçayı kullanarak tuvalde bir daire çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1834">This service draws a circle on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1835">Daire tuval geçersiz bölgeye kırpılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1835">The circle is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1836">Bu hizmetin GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1836">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1837">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1838">**xcenter** x-coord of the center of the circle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1838">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the circle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1839">**ycenter** y-coord of the center of the centerlce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1839">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1840">**r** Dairenin Yarıçapı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1840">**r** Radius of the circle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1841">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1841">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1842">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı daire çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1842">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1844">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz daire yarıçapı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1844">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1845">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1845">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1846">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1846">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1847">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1847">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1848">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1848">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Draw a circle of radius 10 centered at (100, 100). */
status = gx_canvas_circle_draw(100, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circle has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1861">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1861">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1862">Tuval oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1862">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1863">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1863">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1864">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1865">Bu hizmet, belirtilen özelliklerle ve ilişkili bellekle tuvalde oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1865">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1866">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1866">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1867">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1867">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1868">**ad** Tuval için mantıksal ad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1868">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1869">**display (görüntüleme)** Daha önce oluşturulan görüntü işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1869">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1870">**tür** Tuval türü Tuval türleri şunları içerir:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1870">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1871">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** Ekran dışı çizim için kullanılan bir bellek tuvali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1871">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1872">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** Bileşik bina işleminin bir parçası olarak veya tek tuval mimarileri için arabelleğe geçiş işleminin bir parçası olarak etkin görüntüye otomatik olarak boşaltan tuval.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1872">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1873">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** Bu bayrak, tuval çizim içeriğini kaybetmeden tuvali açmak ve kapatmak için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1873">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1874">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Gelecekteki kullanım için ayrılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1874">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1875">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** Bu bayrak, birden çok yönetilen tuvali bileşik tuvalde bir arada olacak şekilde yapılandıran çok tuvalli bir sistem yapılandırırken uygulama tarafından kullanılır ve bileşik, donanım çerçevesi arabelleğine yönlendirilendir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1875">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1876">**width (genişlik)** Piksel cinsinden genişlik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1876">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1877">**height (yükseklik)** Piksel cinsinden yükseklik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1877">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1878">**memory_area** Tuval için bellek alanı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1878">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1879">Bu değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1879">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1880">**GX_NULL** oluşturma sırasındaki diğer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1880">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1881">**ve** daha sonra gx_canvas_memory_define kullanılarak başlatıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1881">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1882">**memory_size** Bayt cinsinden bellek alanı boyutu veya tuval oluşturulduktan sonra tuval belleği tanımlanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1882">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1883">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1883">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1884">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı tuval oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1884">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1885">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1885">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1886">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1886">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1887">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1887">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1888">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Geçersiz tuval denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1888">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Invalid canvas control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1889">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Geçersiz tuval türü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1889">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid canvas type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1890">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1890">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1891">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1892">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1892">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1897">gx_canvas_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1897">gx_canvas_delete</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1899">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1899">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_delete(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1900">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1900">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1901">Bu hizmet tuvali siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1901">This service deletes the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1902">Tuval, GUIX tarafından bakımı yapılan dahili bağlantılı tuval listesinden kaldırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1902">The canvas is removed from the internal linked list of canvas maintained by GUIX.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1903">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1903">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1904">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1904">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1905">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1905">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1906">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı tuval oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1906">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1907">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1907">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1908">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1908">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1909">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1909">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1910">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1910">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1911">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1911">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1920">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1920">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1921">Tuval çizimini tamamen doldurun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1921">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1922">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1922">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1923">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1924">Bu hizmet, Gux 'in belirtilen tuvalde uygulama çiziminin tamamlandığını bilmesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1924">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1925">Uygulama bu hizmeti kullanarak tuvalde hemen çizim yapılmasını zorlayabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1925">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1926">Bu, tuvali görünür çerçeve arabelleğine boşaltır ve/veya sistem belleği mimarisine bağlı olarak bir hata atma geçiş işlemi tetikler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1926">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1927">Bu hizmet yalnızca uygulama tarafından, gx_canvas_drawing_initiate () ile başlatılan bir çizim dizisinin kapatılmasını sağlamak için çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1927">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1928">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1928">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1929">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1929">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1930">**Temizleme** **_GX_TRUE_**, tuval değişiklikleri ekranda temizlenir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1930">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1931">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1931">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1932">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çizim tamamlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1932">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1933">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1933">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1934">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1934">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1935">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1935">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1936">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1936">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1937">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1937">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Complete drawing on “my_canvas” and flush to display. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_complete(&my_canvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully completed. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1944">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1944">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1945">Tuval çizimi başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1945">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1946">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1946">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1947">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1947">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1948">Bu hizmet, belirtilen tuvalde çizimini başlatıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1948">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1949">Bu hizmet, tuvalin güncelleştirilmiş olması gerekirken GUIX tarafından otomatik olarak gerçekleştirilen ertelenen çizim işlemi kapsamında dahili olarak çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1949">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1950">Ancak uygulamanın GUIX ertelenen çizim algoritmasını atlayarak ve önce gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, ardından istenen çizim işlevlerini çağırarak ve ardından gx_canvas_drawing_complete() çağırarak tuval üzerinde anında ve doğrudan çizim gerçekleştirmesine izin verilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1950">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1951">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1951">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1952">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1952">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1953">**Who (Kim)** Çağıranın pencere öğesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1953">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1954">Bu parametre, çizim kırpmayı başlatmak ve sonraki çizim işlemlerine yönelik parametreleri görüntülemek için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1954">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1955">**dirty_area** Çizilen alan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1955">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1956">Bu parametre, çağıranın tüm çizim işlemlerinin kırpılmış olarak istediği alanı belirtmek için çağıranı tarafından geçirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1956">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1957">Bu genellikle daha önce kirli olarak işaretlenen alandır, ancak çağıranın kırpma alanını genişletmesi veya daraltması ücretsizdir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1957">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1958">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1958">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1959">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı çizim başlat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1959">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1960">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) En fazla iç içe geçme sayısını aşma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1960">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1961">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) Çağıran için görünüm yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1961">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1964">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1964">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1965">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1966">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1966">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1967">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initiate drawing on “my_canvas”, my_widget.gx_widget_size
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(&my_canvas, &my_widget,
    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_ellipse_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1974">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1974">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1975">Elips çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1975">Draw ellipse</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1976">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    INT a, 
    dINT b);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1977">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1978">Bu hizmet, geçerli fırçayı kullanarak tuvalde bir elips çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1978">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1979">Elips tuval için geçersiz bölgeye kırpıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1979">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1980">Bu hizmet için GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT tanımlanması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1980">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1981">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1981">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1982">Elips merkezinin **xcenter** x-cozı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1982">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1983">Elips merkezinin **Orta ortası**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1983">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1984">yarı birincil **eksenin uzunluğu**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1984">**a** Length of the semi-major axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1985">**b** yarı küçük eksenin uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1985">**b** Length of the semi-minor axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1986">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1986">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1987">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı daire çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1987">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1988">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1988">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1990">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1990">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1991">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1991">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1992">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1992">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-1993">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-1993">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw an ellipse of semi-major radius 100, semi-minor radius 50
    and centered at (200, 200). */
status = gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(200, 200, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ellipse has been drawn on
    “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2006">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2006">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2007">Tuvali donanım grafik katmanına bağlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2007">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2008">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2008">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2009">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2009">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2010">Bu hizmet, GUIX çizim tuvalini donanım grafik katmanına bağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2010">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2011">Bu hizmet yalnızca birden çok donanım grafik katmanını destekleyen donanım cihazları için gereklidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2011">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2012">Bir tuvalin donanım grafik katmanına bağlaması, gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set() ve gx_canvas_offset_set() API'leri ile doğrudan donanım görüntüleme sürücü hizmetleri tarafından uygulanmasına neden olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2012">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2013">Donanım görüntüleme sürücüsü birden çok grafik katmanını desteklemezse, bu hizmet birden çok grafik katmanını GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2013">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2014">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2014">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2015">**Donanımda** uygulanacak tuval tuvali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2015">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2016">**katman** donanım grafik katmanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2016">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2017">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2017">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2018">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2018">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2019">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Görüntü katmanı hizmeti tanımlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2019">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2020">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Geçersiz işaretçiler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2020">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2021">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2021">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2022">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2022">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2023">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Desteklenmiyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2023">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2024">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2024">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2025">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2025">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2026">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2026">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Binds the canvas to the hardware graphics layer 1. */
status = gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(&my_canvas, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drawing canvas is bound to the
    hardware graphics. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2041">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Geçersiz işaretçiler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2041">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2042">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2042">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
    GX_VALUE x_end, 
    GX_VALUE y_end);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2063">**y_end** Satırın y konumu başlatılıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2063">**y_end** Starting y-position of the line</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2065">**y_end** Satırın y konumu bitiriliyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2065">**y_end** Ending y-position of the line</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2067">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çizgi çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2067">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2068">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2068">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2070">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2070">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2071">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) geçersiz fırça genişliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2071">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Invalid brush width</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2087">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2087">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2088">Tuval belleğini tanımlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2088">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2089">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2089">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2090">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2090">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2091">Bu hizmet, tuval oluşturulduktan sonra tuval bellek adresini atamak için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2091">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2092">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2092">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2093">**tuval** Önceden oluşturulmuş tuval işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2093">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2094">**bellek** Tuval belleği adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2094">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2095">**memsize** Tuval bellek bloğu bayt cinsinden boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2095">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2096">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2096">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2097">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2097">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2098">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Geçersiz denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2098">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2099">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2099">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2100">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2100">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2101">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2101">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2102">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2102">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign canvas memory block. */
status = gx_canvas_memory_define(canvas,
    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas memory pointer has be
reassigned. */

```

```C
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2168">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2168">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2169">Bu hizmet, belirtilen tuval için bir x, y görüntüleme boşluğu atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2169">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2170">Bu, tuvalin görünür çerçeve arabelleğine yerleştirme konumunu denetler ve genellikle tuval fiziksel görünenden küçük olduğunda kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2170">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2171">Tuval, gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind () API 'sini kullanarak bir donanım grafik katmanına bağlanmışsa, gx_canvas_offset_set hizmeti doğrudan donanım desteği kullanılarak uygulanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2171">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2172">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2174">**x** x konum koordinatı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2174">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2175">uzaklığa göre **y** y koordinatı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2175">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2176">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2176">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı Aralık ataması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2178">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2178">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2180">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2180">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2181">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2181">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2226">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2226">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2227">Piksel çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2227">Draw pixel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2228">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2228">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2229">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2229">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2230">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlam fırçalarının çizgi rengini kullanarak tuvalde bir piksel çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2230">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2231">Yapılandırma seçeneği GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT pikseli diğerleriyle karıştırarak pikseli tamamen opak olarak çizin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2231">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2232">**x** noktası,çizilen pikselin y konumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2232">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2233">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2233">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2234">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı piksel haritası çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2234">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2235">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2235">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2236">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2236">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2237">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2237">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2238">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2238">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2239">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2239">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2244">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2244">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2245">Blend, pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2245">Blend pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2246">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2246">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2247">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2247">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2248">Bu hizmet, bir pixelmap 'i tuval arka planıyla karıştırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2248">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2249">Karıştırma oranı çağıran tarafından belirtilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2249">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2250">Alfa değeri 0 (tamamen saydam) ile 255 (tamamen opak) arasında değişebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2250">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2251">Pixelmap Ayrıca, gelen karıştırma değeriyle birleştirilmiş bir iç alfa kanalını da içerebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2251">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2252">Bu hizmet yalnızca 16 BPP renk derinliği ve üzeri sürümlerde çalışan ekran sürücüleri tarafından desteklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2252">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2253">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2253">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2254">**x_start** Pixelmap 'in x-Position ' i başlatılıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2254">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2255">**y_end** Pixelmap 'in y konumu başlatılıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2255">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2256">**pixelmap** Pixelmap işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2256">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2257">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2257">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pixelmap çizimi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2261">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) desteklenmez</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2261">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2262">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2262">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2263">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2263">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2264">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2264">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2311">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2311">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2312">Döndürülen pixelmap 'i çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2312">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2313">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2313">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2314">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2315">Bu hizmet, belirtilen açıyla bir pixelmap döndürür ve döndürme gerçekleştirildiğinde doğrudan bir pixelmap 'i tuvale işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2315">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2316">Bu hizmet, döndürme çıktısının doğrudan tuval belleğine işlendiğine ve döndürülen pixelmap 'in çağırana döndürüldüğünden gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate farklıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2316">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2317">Bu hizmetin gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate üzerinden avantajı, döndürülen pixelmap 'i barındırmak için ek bellek gerektirmeyecek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2317">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2318">Dezavantajı, piksel haritası her çizilirken döndürme kodunun yürütül olmasıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2318">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2319">Kırpma ve görünümport doğrulaması, döndürülmüş piksel haritasının işlanması sırasında uygulanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2319">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2320">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2320">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2321">**x_position** Piksel haritasının x konumunu başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2321">**x_position** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2322">**y_position** Piksel haritasının y konumunu başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2322">**y_position** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2323">**piksel haritası** Piksel haritası işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2323">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2324">**açı** Döndürülebilir açı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2324">**angle** Angle to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2325">**rot_cx** Döndürme merkezinin X-coord'ı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2325">**rot_cx** X-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2326">Bu değer -1 olarak ayarlanırsa, döndürme merkezi olarak görüntünün merkezi kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2326">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the rotation center.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2327">**rot_cy** Döndürme merkezinin Y-coord'ları.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2327">**rot_cy** Y-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2328">Bu değer -1 olarak ayarlanırsa, döndürmenin merkezi olarak görüntünün merkezi kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2328">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the center of rotation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2329">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2329">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2330">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı piksel haritası çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2330">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2331">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2331">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2333">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2333">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2334">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2334">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2335">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2335">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2336">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2336">Example</span></span>

```C
/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction and draw in on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(10, 20, &my_pixelmap, 30,
    -1, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rotated pixelmap “my_pixelmap” has been drawn. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2376">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2376">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
