## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2419">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2419">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2420">Bir orta nokta ile döndürülen metin çiz (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2420">Draw text rotated about a center point (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2421">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2421">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(
    const GX_CHAR *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2422">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2422">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2423">Bu API kullanım dışı bırakıldı veya gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2423">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2424">Hala desteklenirken, yeni uygulamalar bu API 'YI kullanmamalıdır ve bunun yerine gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext () kullanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2424">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2425">Bu hizmet, tuvale metin çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2425">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2426">Metin, istenen merkez noktası hakkında döndürülmüş olarak çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2426">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2427">Metni işlemek için geçerli çizim bağlamı yazı tipi ve çizim bağlam çizgisi rengi kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2427">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2428">Bu hizmet, metin dizesini yalnızca alfa değeri içeren geçici bir 8bpp pixelmap 'e işlemek için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap işlevini kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2428">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2429">Daha sonra hizmet, gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate işlevini kullanarak harflerden eşlemeyi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2429">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2430">Son alfamap tuvalde işlendikten sonra, bu hizmet geçici harfler eşlemesini ve ilişkili belleği serbest bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2430">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2431">Döndürülen metni işlemek için geçici bir alfamap gerektiğinden, döndürülen metni çizmeyi denemeden önce uygulamanın gx_system_memory_allocator çağıran gx_system_memory_allocator_set () API 'siyle yapılandırması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2431">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2432">Bu hizmet yalnızca "bir kez" döndürülen metni işlemek için kullanılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2432">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2433">Aynı metin dizesi farklı konumlarda veya farklı döndürme açılarında birden çok kez çizilip, bir kez metin harfler oluşturmak için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap () yardımcı program işlevini kullanmak daha verimlidir, sonra sonuçta elde edilen bir üst bilgi eşlemini sürekli olarak döndürmek için gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate birden çok kez kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2433">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2434">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2435">**metin** Çizilecek metin dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2435">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2436">**Xcenter** Metnin döndürüleceği, ortaya dönmüş ton.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2436">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2437">**Yılmerkez** Metnin çevresinde döndürüleceği konumu Ortala.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2437">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2438">**açı** İstenen metin döndürme açısı (derece cinsinden).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2438">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2439">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2439">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2440">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı metin işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2440">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2441">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2441">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2443">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) yeterli kullanılabilir bellek yok veya gx_system_memory_allocator atanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2443">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2444">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2444">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2445">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2446">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2446">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2447">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2447">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2455">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2455">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2456">Bir orta nokta hakkında döndürülmüş metin çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2456">Draw text rotated about a center point</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2457">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2457">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2458">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2458">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2459">Bu hizmet tuvale metin çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2459">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2460">Metin, istenen orta nokta hakkında döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2460">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2461">Metni işlemek için geçerli çizim bağlamı yazı tipi ve çizim bağlam çizgisi rengi kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2461">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2462">Bu hizmet, metin gx_utility_string_to_alphamap yalnızca alfa değeri içeren geçici bir 8bpp piksel haritasına işlemek için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap işlevini kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2462">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2463">Daha sonra hizmet, gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate işlevini kullanarak alfa haritayı gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2463">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2464">Tuvale son alfa haritası işlenen bu hizmet geçici alfa haritasını ve ilişkili belleği serbest bıraktırıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2464">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2465">Döndürülmüş metni işlemek için geçici bir alfa harita gerektiğinden, uygulamanın döndürülmüş metin çizmeye çalışmadan önce gx_system_memory_allocator API'sini ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** api'si tarafından yapılandırması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2465">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2466">Bu hizmet yalnızca döndürülmüş metni "bir kez" işlemek için kullanılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2466">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2467">Aynı metin dizesi farklı konumlarda veya farklı döndürme açıları için birden çok kez çizilecekse, metin alfa haritasını bir kez oluşturmak için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() yardımcı program işlevini kullanmak ve ardından elde edilen alfa haritayı tekrar tekrar döndürmek için gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate birden çok kez kullanmak daha verimlidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2467">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2468">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2468">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2469">**metin** Çizilecek metin dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2469">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2470">**Xcenter** Metnin döndürüleceği, ortaya dönmüş ton.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2470">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2471">**Yılmerkez** Metnin çevresinde döndürüleceği konumu Ortala.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2471">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2472">**açı** İstenen metin döndürme açısı (derece cinsinden).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2472">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2473">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2473">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2474">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı metin işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2474">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2475">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2475">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2476">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2476">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2477">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) geçersiz çizim bağlamı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2477">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid draw context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2478">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) yeterli kullanılabilir bellek yok veya gx_system_memory_allocator atanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2478">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2479">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2479">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2480">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2480">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2481">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2481">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2482">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2482">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2490">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2490">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2491">X, y için tuval kaydır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2491">Shift canvas by x,y</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2492">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2492">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_shift(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_VALUE x, GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2493">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2493">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2494">Bu hizmet, belirtilen tuval uzaklığını belirtilen miktara göre kaydırıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2494">This service shifts the specified canvas offset by the specified amount.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2495">Bu, tuvalin görünür çerçeve arabelleği içinde işlenecek konumunu etkiler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2495">This affects the position at which the canvas is rendered within the visible frame buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2496">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2496">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2497">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2497">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2498">**X** ekseninde kaydırmak için x Piksel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2498">**x** Pixels to shift on the X axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2499">**Y** ekseninde kaydırmak için y Piksel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2499">**y** Pixels to shift on the Y axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2500">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2500">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2501">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı tuval kaydırması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2501">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2502">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2502">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2503">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2503">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2504">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2504">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2505">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2505">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2506">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2507">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2507">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift canvas “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_shift(&my_canvas, 10, 15);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas has been shifted by 10 pixels
    on the X axis and 15 on the Y axis. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2526">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2526">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2538">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2538">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2539">Metin çiz (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2539">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2540">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2540">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2541">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2541">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2542">Bu hizmet, tuvalde metin çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2542">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2543">Bu API hala desteklenirken kullanım dışıdır ve yeni uygulamalar bunun yerine gx_canvas_text_draw_ext () kullanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2543">This API, while still supported, is deprecated and new applications should instead use gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2544">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2544">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2545">**x_start** Metin için x koordinatı başlatılıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2545">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2546">**y_start** Metin için y koordinatı başlatılıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2546">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2547">**string** Çizilen dize işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2547">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2548">**uzunluk** Uzunluk >= 0 ise, çizilen karakter sayısını sınırlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2548">**length** If length >= 0, limits the number of characters drawn to length.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2549">Uzunluk 0< ise NULL sonlandırıcı çizilene kadar dizenin tamamı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2549">If length < 0, the entire string until NULL terminator is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2550">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2550">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2551">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı metin çekme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2551">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2552">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Başarısız metin çekme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2552">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2553">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2553">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2555">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2555">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2556">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2556">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2557">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2557">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2558">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2558">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2559">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2559">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 20, “example”, 7);

/* Draw all of a string of unknown length on the current canvas */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2604">gx_checkbox_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2604">gx_checkbox_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2606">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2606">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT checkbox_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2607">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2608">Bu hizmet, belirtilen özelliklere sahip bir onay kutusu pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2608">This service creates a checkbox widget with the specified properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2609">GX_CHECKBOX, GX_TEXT_BUTTON türetilen ve tüm gx_text_button hizmetleri farklı pencere öğeleriyle GX_CHECKBOX kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2609">GX_CHECKBOX is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and all gx_text_button services may be used with GX_CHECKBOX widgets.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2614">**style (stil)** Onay kutusunun stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2614">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2615">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stiller içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2615">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2616">**checkbox_id** Onay kutusunun uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2616">**checkbox_id** Application-defined ID of checkbox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2621">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2621">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2634">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2635">Bu hizmet, belirtilen onay kutusunu çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2635">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2636">Bu işlev normalde Gux tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel onay kutusu pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevleri uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2636">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2637">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2637">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2639">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2640">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2640">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2641">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2641">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2642">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2642">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2643">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2643">Example</span></span>

```C

VOID custom_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox)
{
    /* Call default checkbox draw. */
    gx_checkbox_draw(checkbox);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2649">İşlem onay kutusu olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2649">Process checkbox event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2650">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2650">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2651">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2651">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2652">Bu hizmet, belirtilen onay kutusu için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2652">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2653">Bu hizmet, herhangi bir özel onay kutusu olay işleme işlevi tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2653">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2654">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2654">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2655">**onay kutusu** Onay kutusu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2655">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2656">**event_ptr** İşlemeye devam etmek için olayın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2656">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2657">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2657">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı onay kutusu olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2659">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2659">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2660">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2660">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2661">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2661">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2662">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2662">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2663">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2663">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2664">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2664">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_disabled_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_disabled_id);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2680">**checked_disabled_id** Bir devre dışı ve işaretli onay kutusu için pixelmap kullanıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2680">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and checked checkbox</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2823">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2823">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2909">**fill_color_id** Fill Color kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2909">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2910">**Ek B** önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2910">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2911">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2911">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2912">**Stil** Fırçanın stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2912">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2913">**Ek D** desteklenen fırça stillerini açıklar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2913">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2914">Fırça stilleri, bit düzeyinde OR işlemi kullanarak bir değişkende birleştirilebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2914">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2917">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2917">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2919">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2919">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2967">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2967">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2968">Geçerli çizim bağlamının fırça düzenlerini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2968">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2969">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2969">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2970">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2970">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2971">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamının fırça modelini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2971">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2972">Fırça deseninin kesik çizgili yatay ve kesik çizgili dikey çizgiler çizmek için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2972">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2973">Gx_canvas_line_draw () çağrıldığında ve çizgi yatay veya dikey olduğunda ve brush.gx_brush_line_pattern alanı sıfır değilse, bir kalıp çizgisi çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2973">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2974">Fırça deseninin maskesi Şu anda yalnızca yatay ve dikey çizgiler için desteklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2974">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2975">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2976">**örüntü** Fırça için kullanılacak model.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2976">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2977">Bu, desen çizgisi çizimi için kullanılacak basit bir onksimal açık/kapalı desendir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2977">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2978">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2978">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2979">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlam fırça kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2979">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2980">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Geçersiz çizim bağlamı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2980">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2981">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2981">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2982">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2982">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2983">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2983">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2997">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2997">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2998">Geçerli çizim bağlamının fırçalarını ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2998">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-2999">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-2999">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3000">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3000">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3001">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamının fırçalarını ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3001">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3002">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3003">**fırça** Geçerli bağlam için kullanılacak fırça işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3003">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3004">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3004">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3005">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bağlam fırçası kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3005">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3006">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3006">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3008">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3008">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3009">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3009">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3010">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3010">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```

```C
If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush width of the current context has been set to 10. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3080">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3080">gx_context_color_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3081">Geçerli çizim bağlamında renk kimliğiyle ilişkili renk değerini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3081">Get color value associated with color ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3082">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3082">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_color_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3083">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3083">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3084">Bu hizmet, belirtilen renk kimliğiyle ilişkili renk değerini verir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3084">This service retrieves the color value associated with the indicated color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3085">Renk değeri, etkin bağlam görüntülemenin renk biçiminde döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3085">The color value is returned in the color format of the active context display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3086">Bu hizmet yalnızca etkin bir çizim işlemi içinde çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3086">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3087">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3087">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3088">**color_id** İstenen rengin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3088">**color_id** Resource ID of color requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3089">**return_color** Döndürülen renk değerini tutmak için değişkenin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3089">**return_color** Address of variable to hold returned color value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3090">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3090">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3091">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı renk değeri get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3091">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color value get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3092">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3092">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3093">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3093">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3095">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3095">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3096">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3096">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3097">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3097">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR color_value;

/* Get the color vaue. */
status = gx_context_color_get(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID, &color_value);
```

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3112">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3112">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3113">Geçerli çizim bağlamının Fill rengini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3113">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3114">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3114">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3115">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3115">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3116">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamındaki etkin fırçanın dolgusu rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3116">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3117">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3117">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3118">**fill_color_id** Geçerli bağlamın Fill renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3118">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3119">**Ek B** önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3119">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3120">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3120">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3121">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bağlam dolgusu renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3123">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3123">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3124">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3124">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3125">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3125">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3126">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3126">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3127">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3127">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_fill_color_set(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3142">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3142">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3143">Geçerli çizim bağlamında yazı tipi kimliğiyle ilişkili yazı tipini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3143">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3144">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3144">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3145">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3145">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3146">Bu hizmet, belirtilen yazı tipi kimliğiyle ilişkili yazı tipi işaretçisini kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3146">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3147">Bu hizmet yalnızca etkin bir çizim işlemi içinde çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3147">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3148">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3148">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3149">**font_id** İstenen yazı tipinin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3149">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3150">**return_font** Döndürülen yazı tipi işaretçisini tutmak için değişkenin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3150">**return_font** Address of variable to hold returned font pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3151">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3151">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarıyla alınan yazı tipi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3155">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3155">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3156">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3156">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3157">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3157">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3158">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3158">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;

/* Get the font pointer. */
status = gx_context_font_get(MY_MIDSIZE_FONT, &my_font);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font that indicated with MY_MIDSIZE_FONT has been successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3173">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3173">gx_context_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3174">Geçerli çizim bağlamının yazı tipini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3174">Set font of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3175">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3175">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3176">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3176">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3177">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamının etkin fırçasının yazı tipini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3177">This service sets the font in the active brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3178">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3178">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3179">**font_id** Geçerli bağlamın yazı tipi kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3179">**font_id** Font resource ID of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3180">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3180">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3181">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlam yazı tipi kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3181">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context font set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3182">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3182">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3183">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3183">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3184">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3184">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3185">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3185">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3186">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3186">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the font of the current context to MY_FONT_ID. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3201">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3201">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3202">Geçerli çizim bağlamının çizgi rengini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3202">Set line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3203">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_line_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3204">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3205">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamındaki etkin fırçanın çizgi rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3205">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3206">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3206">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3207">**line_color_id** Geçerli bağlamın çizgi rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3207">**line_color_id** Line color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3208">**Ek B** önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3208">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3209">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3209">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3210">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3210">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3211">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bağlam çizgisi renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3211">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3212">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3212">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3213">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3213">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3214">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3214">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the line color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3231">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3231">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3232">Geçerli çizim bağlamında piksel haritası kimliğiyle ilişkili piksel haritasını al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3232">Get pixelmap associated with pixelmap ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3233">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3234">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3235">Bu hizmet, belirtilen piksel haritası kimliğiyle ilişkili piksel haritası işaretçisini alın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3235">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3236">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3237">**pixelmap_id** İstenen piksel haritasının kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3237">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3238">**return_map** Döndürülen piksel haritası adresini tutmak için değişkenin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3238">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3239">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3239">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3240">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Piksel haritası başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3240">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3241">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3241">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3242">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3242">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3243">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz piksel haritası işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3243">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3244">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3244">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3245">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3245">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3246">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3246">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *map;

/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_get(MY_PIXELMAP_ID, &map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3289">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3289">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3290">Geçerli çizim bağlamının ham fırçalarını tanımlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3290">Define raw brush of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3291">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_brush_define(
    GX_COLOR line_color,
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3292">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3293">Bu hizmet, geçerli ekran bağlamının ham fırçalarını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3293">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3294">32 bit ARGB renk değerleri renk kimlikleri yerine fırçaya geçiriken ham tanımlar kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3294">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3295">Ham renk tanımları, istenen renk geçerli sistem renk tablosunda mevcut değilken veya RGB renk değeri çalışma zamanında hesaplandı olduğunda kullanışlıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3295">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3296">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3296">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3297">**line_color** 32 bit ham ARGB renk biçiminde çizginin rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3297">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3298">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3298">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3299">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3299">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3300">**fill_color** 32 bit ham ARGB renk biçiminde dolgu rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3300">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3301">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3301">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3302">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3302">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3303">**style (stil)** Fırça stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3303">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3304">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3304">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3305">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3305">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3306">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlam ham fırça tanımlaması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3306">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3307">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3307">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3308">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3308">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3309">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3309">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3310">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3310">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the raw brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3360">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamında etkin fırçanın çizgi rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3360">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3361">Line_color parametresi, renk kimliği değeri yerine 32 bit ARGB biçimli ham renk değeridir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3361">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3362">Ham renk tanımları, istenen renk geçerli sistem renk tablosunda mevcut değilken veya RGB renk değeri çalışma zamanında hesaplandı olduğunda kullanışlıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3362">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3363">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3363">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3364">**line_color** Satır değerinin rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3364">**line_color** Color of line value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3365">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3365">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3366">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3366">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3367">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3367">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3368">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlam ham çizgisi renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3368">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3369">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3369">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3370">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3370">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3371">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3371">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C

status = gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw line color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3386">gx_context_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3386">gx_context_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3387">Dize KIMLIĞIYLE ilişkili dizeyi al (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3387">Retrieve string associated with String ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3388">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3388">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get(GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3389">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3389">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3390">Kullanım dışı bırakılan bu API, belirtilen dize KIMLIĞIYLE ilişkili dizeyi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3390">This deprecated API returns the string associated with the given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3391">Yeni uygulamalar gx_context_string_get_ext () kullanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3391">New applications should use gx_context_string_get_ext().</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3393">**string_id** GUX Studio uygulaması tarafından oluşturulan dize KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3393">**string_id** String ID generated by the GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3394">**return_string** Dize işaretçisinin döndürülme değişkeninin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3394">**return_string** Address of variable to return string pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3395">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3395">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bağlam ham çizgi renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3397">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3397">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3398">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3398">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3399">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3399">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3400">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3400">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string pointer has been returned. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3405">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3405">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3406">Verilen dize kimliğiyle ilişkili dizeyi alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3406">Retrieve string associated with given string ID.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3407">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3407">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get_ext(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3408">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3408">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3409">Bu hizmet, belirli bir dize kimliğiyle ilişkili dizeyi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3409">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3410">Bu hizmet yalnızca bir pencere öğesi çizim işlevinin içinde etkin bir çizim bağlamı olduğunda çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3410">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3411">Bu hizmet etkin tuvali tanımlar ve bulunan görüntüleme örneğinden dizeyi görüntüler ve alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3411">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3412">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3412">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3413">**string_id** Uygulama kaynak üst bilgisi dosyasında GUIX Studio tarafından oluşturulan dizeyi tanımlamak için kullanılan dize kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3413">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3414">**return_string** Dize GX_STRING dize uzunluğunun döndürülecek olduğu bir değişken adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3414">**return_string** Address of GX_STRING variable in which the string pointer and string length will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3415">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3415">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3416">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlam ham çizgisi renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3416">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3417">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3417">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3419">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3419">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3420">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3420">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3421">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3421">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3422">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3422">Example</span></span>


```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_string_get_ext(ID_ERROR, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string.gx_string_ptr and
string.gx_string_length values have been returned. */
```
