## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3437">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3437">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3438">Etkin görüntüleme dilini ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3438">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3439">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3439">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3440">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3440">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3441">Bu hizmet, belirtilen görünüm için şu anda etkin olan dili atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3441">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3442">Dil dizini, görüntüleme dili tablosunda tanımlanan dillere karşılık gelir ve ANSI dil tanımlayıcısı değildir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3442">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3443">Birden çok görüntü sisteminde farklı ekranlar, her biri farklı etkin diller çalıştırabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3443">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3444">Bu API kullanılmadan önce görüntüleme dili tablosu atanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3444">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3445">Bir ekran gx_studio_display_configure kullanılarak başlatıldığında, dil tablosu otomatik olarak yüklenir ve uygulama etkin dil dizininde geçirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3445">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3446">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3446">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3447">**görüntüleme** Görüntüleme denetimi bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3447">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3448">**dil** Etkin dil dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3448">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3449">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3449">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3450">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı dil ataması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3450">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz görüntüleme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3452">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz dil dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3452">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3453">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3453">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3454">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3454">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3455">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3455">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3459">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3459">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3460">Bir renk değerini yeniden atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3460">Re-assign one color value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3461">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3461">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id, 
    GX_COLOR new_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3462">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3462">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3463">Bu hizmet, belirtilen renk kimliğiyle ilişkili renk değerini yeniden atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3463">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3464">Bu, tamamen yeni bir renk tablosu sağlamadan bir ekranın renk tablosunda değişiklik yapmak için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3464">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3465">Sağlanan renk değeri, ekran tarafından desteklenen yerel biçimde olmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3465">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3466">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3466">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3467">**display (görüntüleme)** Denetim bloğu görüntüleme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3467">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3468">**color_id** Yeniden atama için Renk Kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3468">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3469">**new_color** Bu yuvaya atanan renk color_id değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3469">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3470">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı renk yeniden ataması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3472">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz renk kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3472">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid color ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3473">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3473">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3474">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Geçersiz görüntü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3474">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3475">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3476">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3477">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3477">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_color_set(&my_display, MY_COLOR_ID, 0x5454);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3478">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3478">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3479">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3479">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3480">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3480">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3481">Görüntü renk tablosu ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3481">Assign display color table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3482">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3482">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_COLOR *color_table, 
    INT color_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3483">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3483">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3484">Bu hizmet, ekran tarafından kullanılacak renk tablosunu yeniden atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3484">This service re-assigns the color table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3485">Bu hizmet normalde Gux Studio tarafından üretilen görüntüleme yapılandırma işlevi tarafından çağrılır, ancak uygulama yazılımı tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3485">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3486">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3486">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3487">**görüntüleme** Görüntüleme denetimi bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3487">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3488">**Color_Table** Yerel görüntü biçimindeki renk değerleri dizisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3488">**color_table** Array of color values in display native format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3489">**color_count** Renk tablosundaki giriş sayısını gösterir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3489">**color_count** Indicates number of entries in color table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3490">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3490">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3491">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı renk tablosu kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3491">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3492">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3492">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3494">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1d) geçersiz görüntüleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3494">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3495">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3495">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3496">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3496">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3497">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3497">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR default_table[32] = { … };

/* Change the color table */
status = gx_display_color_table_set(&my_display, default_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color table has been reassigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3500">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3500">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3501">Görüntü oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3501">Create display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3502">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3502">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_create(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_CONST CHAR *name,
    UINT (*display_driver_setup)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3503">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3503">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3504">Bu hizmet bir görüntü oluşturur ve görüntü sürücüsü kurulum işlevini çağırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3504">This service creates a display and calls the display driver setup function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3505">GUX bu görüntüyü alır ve kendi iç ekran listesine ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3505">GUIX takes this display and adds it to its internal list of displays.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3506">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3506">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3507">**görüntüleme** Görüntüleme denetimi bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3507">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3508">**ad** Ekran adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3508">**name** Name of the display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3509">**display_driver_setup** Görüntü sürücüsü kurulum işlevi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3509">**display_driver_setup** Pointer to display driver setup function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3510">**optional_driver_info** İsteğe bağlı sürücü bilgileri işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3510">**optional_driver_info** Pointer to optional driver information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3511">**color_format** Ek C'de tanımlandığı **gibi renk biçimi**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3511">**color_format** Color format, as defined in **Appendix C**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3512">**width (genişlik)** x ekseninde piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3512">**width** Number of pixels on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3513">**height (yükseklik)** Y ekseninde piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3513">**height** Number of pixels on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3514">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3514">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3515">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı görüntüleme oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3515">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3516">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Kurulum görüntüsü başarısız</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3516">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Fail to setup display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3519">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Geçersiz görüntü denetimi bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3519">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Invalid display control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3520">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3521">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3521">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3522">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3522">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DISPLAY my_display;

UINT my_driver_setup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Create screen “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_create(&my_display, “my display”,
    my_driver_setup_callback, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the screen “my_display” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3525">gx_display_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3525">gx_display_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3526">Ekranı yok etme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3526">Destroy display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3527">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3527">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_delete(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    VOID (*display_driver_cleanup)(GX_DISPLAY *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3528">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3528">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3529">Bu hizmet bir ekranı kapatır ve ayrılan kaynakları temizler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3529">This service shuts down a display, and cleans up allocated resources.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3530">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3530">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3531">**display (görüntüleme)** Denetim bloğu görüntüleme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3531">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3532">**display_driver_cleanup** Sürücü temizleme işlevini görüntüleme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3532">**display_driver_cleanup** Pointer to display driver cleanup function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3533">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3533">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3534">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı görüntüleme silme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3534">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3535">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Oluşturulan görüntüleme listesi NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3535">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Created display list is NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3536">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3536">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3537">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3537">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3538">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3538">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3539">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3539">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3540">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3540">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID driver_cleanup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Delete a display “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_delete(&my_display, driver_cleanup_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen “my_display” has been destroyed. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_font_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3550">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3550">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3551">Görüntüleme yazı tipi tablosu ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3551">Assign display font table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3552">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_font_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_FONT **font_table, 
    INT table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3553">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3554">Bu hizmet, ekran tarafından kullanılacak yazı tipi tablosunu yeniden atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3554">This service re-assigns the font table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3555">Bu hizmet normalde Gux Studio tarafından üretilen görüntüleme yapılandırma işlevi tarafından çağrılır, ancak uygulama yazılımı tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3555">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3556">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3556">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3557">**görüntüleme** Görüntüleme denetimi bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3557">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3558">**font_table** GX_FONT işaretçileri dizisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3558">**font_table** Array of GX_FONT pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3559">**table_size** Tablodaki yazı tipi sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3559">**table_size** Number of fonts in table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3560">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3560">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3561">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yazı tipi tablo kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3561">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3562">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3562">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3563">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3563">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3564">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3564">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3566">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3566">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = { … };

/* Assign font table */
status = gx_display_font_table_set(&my_display, font_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font table has been reassigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3571">gx_display_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3571">gx_display_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3572">Görüntüleme dili tablosu alma (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3572">Retrieve display language table (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3573">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3573">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_get(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE *language_count,
    UINT *string_table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3574">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3575">Bu hizmet, belirtilen görüntüden dil tablosu alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3575">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3576">Bu hizmet, çalışma zamanında dinamik olarak tanımlanmış dizeleri kullanarak görüntüleme dili tablosunda değişiklik yapmak için bir uygulama tarafından kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3576">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3577">Bu API kullanım dışıdır ve yalnızca eski stil dil tablosu kullanan uygulamalar için de kullanılabilir (studio tarafından oluşturulan kaynak dosyası, sürüm 5.6'dan önceki kitaplık sürümü için oluşturulur).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3577">This API is deprecated and supported only for applications using the old style language table (i.e. the Studio generated resource file is generated for library version prior to version 5.6).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3578">Yeni uygulamalarda gx_display_language_table_get_ext() gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3578">New applications should use gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3579">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3579">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3580">**display (görüntüleme)** Denetim bloğu görüntüleme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3580">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3581">**tablo** Tablo işaretçisini alacak adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3581">**table** Address to receive table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3582">**language_count** Dil sayısını alacak adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3582">**language_count** Address to receive language count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3583">**string_table_size** Dize tablosu boyutunu alacak adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3583">**string_table_size** Address to receive string table size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3584">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3584">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3585">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı yazı tipi tablosu kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3585">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3586">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3586">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3587">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3587">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3588">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3588">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3589">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3589">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3590">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3590">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR **language_table;
GX_UBYTE language_count;
UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve language table */
status = gx_display_language_table_get(&my_display,
        &language_table, &language_count, &string_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table has been retrieved.
```

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3618">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3618">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>

```C
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE number_of_languages, 
    UINT number_of_strings);
```

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3622">Bu hizmet kullanım dışıdır ve yeni uygulamaların gx_display_language_table_set_ext() kullanmaları gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3622">This service is deprecated and new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3623">Bu hizmet yalnızca sürüm 5.6'dan önceki kitaplık sürümlerini hedef alan Studio tarafından oluşturulan kaynak dosyalarıyla uyumluluk için de kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3623">This service is supported only for compatibility with Studio generated resources files targeting library versions prior to version 5.6.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3624">Bu hizmet, ekran tarafından kullanılacak dil tablosu atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3624">This service assigns the language table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3625">Bu hizmet normalde GUIX Studio tarafından oluşturulan işlev tarafından gx_studio_display_configure, ancak uygulama yazılımı tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3625">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated function gx_studio_display_configure, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3626">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3626">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3627">**display (görüntüleme)** Denetim bloğu görüntüleme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3627">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3628">**tablo** Dil tablosu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3628">**table** Language table</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3630">**number_of_strings** Her tablo sütunundaki dize sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3630">**number_of_strings** Number of strings in each table column</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3641">gx_display_language_table_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3641">gx_display_language_table_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3642">Görüntüleme dili tablosu atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3642">Assign display language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3643">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3643">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_set_ext(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_STRING **table, 
    GX_UBYTE number_of_languages,
    UINT number_of_strings);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3644">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3644">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3645">Bu hizmet, görüntü tarafından kullanılacak dil tablosunu atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3645">This service assigns the language table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3646">Bu hizmet normalde Gux Studio tarafından oluşturulan işlev gx_studio_display_configure tarafından çağrılır, ancak uygulama yazılımı tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3646">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated function gx_studio_display_configure, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3647">Çalışma zamanı dil tablosu ataması genellikle gx_binres_language_table_load () kullanılarak bir ikili kaynak dosyasından diller yüklendiğinde yapılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3647">Runtime language table assignment is usually done when languages are loaded from a binary resource file using gx_binres_language_table_load().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3648">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3648">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3649">**görüntüleme** Görüntüleme denetimi bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3649">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3650">**tablo** Dil tablosu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3650">**table** Language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3651">**number_of_languages** Belirtilen tablodaki sütun sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3651">**number_of_languages** Number of columns in the provided table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3652">**number_of_strings** Her tablo sütunundaki dize sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3652">**number_of_strings** Number of strings in each table column</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3653">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3653">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3654">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yazı tipi tablo kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3654">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3655">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3655">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3656">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3656">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3657">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3657">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3658">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3658">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3660">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3660">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Assign the language table */

    language_table, 5, 132);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table has been reassigned. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3696">**string** Dize işaretçisi değişkeninin adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3696">**string** Address of string pointer variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3697">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3697">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı dize alma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful string retrieval</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3701">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz görüntüleme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3701">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_theme_install"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3779">gx_display_theme_install</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3779">gx_display_theme_install</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3780">Temaları belirtilen görüntüye yükleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3780">Install themes to the specified display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3781">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3781">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_theme_install(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_THEME *theme_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3782">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3782">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3783">Bu hizmet temaları belirtilen görüntüye yüklür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3783">This service install themes to the specified display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3784">Bu hizmet normalde Studio tarafından oluşturulan görüntüleme yapılandırma işlevi tarafından çağrılır, ancak uygulama yazılımı tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3784">This service is normally invoked by the Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3785">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3785">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3786">**display (görüntüleme)** Denetim bloğu görüntüleme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3786">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3787">**theme_table** Yüklenmek için tema tablosu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3787">**theme_table** Theme table to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3788">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3788">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarıyla yüklenmiş tema tablosu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed theme table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz tema tablosu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid theme table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3792">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Geçersiz görüntü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3792">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3793">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3793">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3794">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3794">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3795">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3795">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_THEME theme_1;

&theme_table[1] = {
    &theme_1,
    …
}

/* Define resource tables. */
GX_COLOR color_table[32] = {…};
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = {…};
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Define scroll appearance. */
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE scroll_appearance;

memset(&scroll_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
scroll appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style =
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

theme_1.theme_color_table = color_table;
theme_1.theme_font_table = font_table;
theme_1.theme_pixlemap_table = pixelmap_table;
theme_1.theme_palette = GX_NULL;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scroll_style = GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scroll_style =
    GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_color_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_font_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_pixelmap_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_palette_size = 0;

/* Install theme table. */
status = gx_display_theme_install(&my_display, theme_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the theme table has been installed. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3819">gx_drop_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3819">gx_drop_list_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3821">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3821">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_create(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,

    GX_CHAR *name,
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3822">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3822">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3823">Bu hizmet bir bırakma listesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3823">This service creates a drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3824">Bırakma listesi, bırakma listesi pencere öğesinin bir birleşimidir ve açılan liste açıldığında görüntülenen bir açılan dikey liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3824">A drop list is a combination of the drop list widget, and a popup vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3825">Açılan liste pencere öğesi oluşturulduğunda açılan dikey liste otomatik olarak oluşturulur ve sırasıyla, açılan liste pencere öğesi açıldığında veya kapandığında görüntülenir veya gizlenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3825">The popup vertical list is created automatically when the drop-list widget is created, and displayed or hidden when the drop-list widget is opened or closed, respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3826">Bırakma listesi pencere öğesi iki ilişkili pixelmaps 'ı destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3826">The drop list widget supports two associated pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3827">İlk olarak, Studio Özellikler görünümünde "duvar kağıdı Listele" olarak açıklanan, açılan liste pencere öğesi açıldığında görüntülenen dikey listenin arka planı olarak görüntülenen isteğe bağlı duvar kağıdı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3827">The first, described as “List Wallpaper” in the Studio properties view, is the optional wallpaper pixelmap that is displayed as the background of the vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3828">Studio özellikleri görünümünde "arka plan görüntüsü" olarak tanımlanan ikinci pixelmap, açılan listenin arka planı olarak görüntülenecek isteğe bağlı bir görüntüdür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3828">The second pixelmap, described as the “Background Image” in the Studio properties view, is an optional image displayed as the background of the drop-list itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3829">Bırakma listesi pencere öğesinin, bırakma listesini açmak ve kapatmak için kullanılan bir alt pencere öğesi olabilir (ancak olması gerekmez).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3829">A drop-list widget can have (but is not required to have) a child widget that is used to open and close the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3830">Bu bir simge ya da düğme pencere öğesi geleneksel, ancak üst bırakma listesi için açık/kapatma geçişi olarak özel bir pencere öğesi kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3830">This is customarily an icon or button widget, but even a custom widget could be used as the open/close toggle for the parent drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3831">Bu alt pencere öğesinin bırakma listesini işlemesini sağlayan anahtar ayarı, bu alt pencere öğesinin ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON önceden tanımlanmış pencere öğesi kimliğine sahip olması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3831">The key setting which makes this child widget operate the drop list is that this child widget must have the pre-defined widget id ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3832">Bırakma listesine açılan liste, firhazırlama ve alt pencere öğesini açıp kapatan bir alt pencere öğesi tanımlamak için, bu alt öğesini istenen şekilde bırakma listesinde konumlandırın:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3832">To define a child widget which will open and close the drop-list, firstadd and child widget to the drop list, and position this child within the drop list as desired:</span></span>

![Bırakma listesinin ekran görüntüsü.](./media/guix/image6.jpg)

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3834">Daha sonra bu alt pencere öğesini, üst bırakma listesi tarafından tanınan bir iç tanımlı KIMLIK değeri olan ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON ID değerini atamak için Studio özellikleri görünümünü kullanın:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3834">Then use the Studio properties view to assign this child widget the ID value ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, which is an internally defined ID value recognized by the parent drop list:</span></span>

![Studio özellikleri görünümünün ekran görüntüsü.](./media/guix/image7.jpg)

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3840">**total_rows** Bırakma listesindeki toplam satır sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3840">**total_rows** Total number of rows in the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3841">**open_height** Bırakma listesi açıldığında görünen dikey listenin yüksekliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3841">**open_height** The height of the vertical list displayed when the drop list is opened.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3842">**geri arama** Liste kaydırıldığında dikey liste tarafından çağrılan işlev.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3842">**callback** Function called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3843">Daha fazla bilgi için GX_VERTICAL_LIST belgelerine bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3843">Refer to the documentation of GX_VERTICAL_LIST for more information.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3845">**drop_list_id** Bırakma listesinin uygulama tanımlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3845">**drop_list_id** Application-defined ID of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3846">**Boyut** Bırakma listesinin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3846">**size** Dimensions of the drop list</span></span>

```C
VOID list_row_create(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *list,
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3864">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3865">Bu hizmet, bırakma listesi için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3865">This service processes an event for the drop list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3866">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3866">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3867">**drop_list** Açılan liste pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3867">**drop_list** Drop list widget control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarıyla işlenen bırakma listesi olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed drop list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3871">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3871">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3872">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3872">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3873">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3873">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3874">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3874">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3875">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3875">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic drop list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_drop_list_event_process(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default drop list
            event processing */
        status = gx_drop_list_event_process(drop_list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3905">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3905">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3906">Bırakma listesine bir arka plan görüntüsü atayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3906">Assign a background image to the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3907">Bu pixelmap, liste açıldığında görüntülenen açılan dikey liste için değil, bırakma listesi pencere öğesinin kendisi için arka plan olarak kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3907">This pixelmap is used as the background for the drop list widget itself, and not for the popup vertical list that is displayed when the list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3908">Açılan liste açılır listesine bir pixelmap atamak için, önce açılan listeye bir işaretçi almak üzere gx_drop_list_popup_get çağırmanız ve sonra bu açılan listeye bir pixelmap atamak için gx_window_wallpaper_set () kullanmanız gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3908">To assign a pixelmap to the drop-list popup, you would need to first call gx_drop_list_popup_get to retrieve a pointer to the popup list, and then use gx_window_wallpaper_set() to assign a pixelmap to this popup list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3909">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3909">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3911">piksellimap 'e ait **kimlik** kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3911">**id** Resource ID to the pixlemap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3912">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3912">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3913">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bırakma listesi piksel haritası kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3913">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3914">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3914">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3915">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3915">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3916">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz pixlemap Kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3916">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid pixlemap ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3917">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3917">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3918">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3918">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3919">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3919">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST mylist;

/* create the drop list here */

    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_DROP_LIST_BACKGROND);

```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_popup_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3926">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3926">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3927">Açılan dikey listenin işaretçisini alma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3927">Retrieve pointer to popup vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3928">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3928">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_popup_get(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST **return_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3929">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3929">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3930">Açılan liste pencere öğesi, açılan liste pencere öğesi ve açılan liste pencere öğesi açıldığında gösterilen bir açılan dikey listeden oluşur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3930">A drop-list widget is composed of the drop-list widget itself, and a popup vertical list that is shown when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3931">Bu hizmet, uygulamanın API hizmetlerini doğrudan bu dikey listede çağırarak bırakma listesinin dikey liste bileşenine bir işaretçisi sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3931">This service retrieves a pointer to the vertical list component of the drop list, allowing the application to invoke API services directly on this vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3932">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3932">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3933">**drop_list** Bırakma listesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3933">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3934">**return_list** Açılan listede depolanan dikey listenin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3934">**return_list** Pointer to the vertical list stored in the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3935">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3935">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Açılan dikey liste başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved popup vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3938">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3939">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3939">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3940">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3940">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST drop_list;
GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list;

/* Retrieve the popup list of “drop_list”. */
status = gx_drop_list_popup_get(&drop_list, &vertical_list)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the popup list was successfully retrieved. */
```

```C
    GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel)
```

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3950">Bu işlev genel kaydırma tekerleği için alt kaydırma tekerleği satır yüksekliğine göre alt öğeleri konumlandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3950">This function positions the children for the generic scroll wheel according to the generic scroll wheel row height.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3951">Bu işlev, genel kaydırma tekerleği gösterildiğinde varsayılan olarak çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3951">This function is called by default when the generic scroll wheel is shown.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3955">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) genel kaydırma tekerleği için alt öğe başarıyla yerleştirildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3955">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully positioned the children for the generic scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3956">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3956">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3957">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3957">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3958">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3958">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3959">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3959">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3960">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3960">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3961">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3961">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Position children in the generic scroll wheel. */
status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_children_position (&wheel);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the generic scroll wheel are positioned. */
```

## <a name="gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3974">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3974">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3975">Genel kaydırma tekerleği oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3975">Create generic scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3976">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3977">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3978">Bu hizmet genel bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3978">This service creates a generic scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3979">Genel kaydırma tekerleği, alt pencere öğeleriyle oluşan bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi t t t'tir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3979">A generic scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is consisted of child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3980">Diğer kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türleri de mevcuttur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3980">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3981">Kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi hiyerarşisi, pencere öğesi türleri ve pencere öğesi türetme hakkında daha fazla bilgi için bkz. gx_scroll_wheel_create() API'si.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3981">For more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation, see the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3982">GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL, GX_SCROLL_WHEEL türetilen ve tüm gx_scroll_wheel destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3982">GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3983">Tüm kaydırma tekerleği türleri GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT kaydırma tekerleği kaydırıldıklarında üstlerine olay oluşturmalarını sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3983">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3984">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3984">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3985">**wheel (tekerlek)** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3985">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3986">**name** Genel kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3986">**name** Logical name of generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3987">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3987">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3988">**total_rows** Kaydırma tekerleğinin toplam satırları.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3988">**total_rows** Total rows of the scroll wheel.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3989">**geri arama** Pencere öğesi satırı oluşturmak için geri çağırma işlevi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3989">**callback** Callback function to create a widget row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3990">Toplam satır sayısı alt saymla eşleşiyorsa, bu GX_NULL olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3990">It can be GX_NULL if the number of total rows matches the child count.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3991">Alt öğe sayısı toplam satır sayısından az olduğunda veya GX_STYLE_WRAP stil ayarlandığında pencere öğesi yeniden kullanım için sağlanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3991">It should be provided for widget reuse when the child count is less than the number of total rows or GX_STYLE_WRAP style is set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3992">Bu durumda, alt sayının, görünür satır sayısından daha fazla 1 olduğundan emin olun.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3992">And in this case make sure the child count is 1 more than the number of visible rows.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3993">**Stil** Genel kaydırma tekerleğinin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3993">**style** Style of generic scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-3994">**Ek D** tüm pencere öğeleri ve pencere öğesine özgü stiller için önceden tanımlanmış genel stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-3994">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets and widget-specific styles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4006">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4006">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4007">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4007">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Define visible rows.  */
#define VISIBLE_ROWS 5

/* Define row memory.  */
GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT row_memory[VISIBLE_ROWS + 1];

/* Define callback function.  */
VOID row_create(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_WIDGET *widget, INT index)
{
GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *row = (GX_PROMPT *)widget;
GX_BOOL result;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

    gx_widget_created_test(widget, &result);

    if(!result)
    {
        gx_numeric_prompt_create(row, "", wheel, 0, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);
    }

    gx_numeric_prompt_value_set(row, index);
}

/* Create "generic_wheel” with 20 rows.  */
status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create(&generic_wheel, “generic_wheel”, &parent, 20, row_create,
                                       GX_STYLE_ENABLED, WHEEL_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the generic scroll wheel "generic_wheel”" has been created. */

/* Create children for generic scroll wheel.  */
for(index = 0; index <= VISIBLE_ROWS; index++)
{
    row_create(generic_wheel, (GX_WIDGET *)&row_memory[index], index);
}
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4060">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4060">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic generic scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                                               GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:

            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

        default:

            /* Pass all other events to the default generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
            status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
    INT total_rows);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4111">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) genel kaydırma tekerleği toplam satırını başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4111">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set generic scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4112">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4112">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4115">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) toplam satır sayısı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4115">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid number of total rows</span></span>

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4131">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4131">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4132">Altları yatay liste için konumlandırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4132">Position children for the horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4133">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4133">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_children_position(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4134">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4134">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4135">Bu işlev, altları yatay liste için konumlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4135">This function positions the children for the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4136">Bu işlev, liste bir olay GX_EVENT_SHOW otomatik olarak çağrılır, ancak liste görünür hale geldiğinde liste değiştirildikten sonra doğrudan çağrılmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4136">This function is called automatically when the list receives the GX_EVENT_SHOW event, but should be called directly if the list is modified after it has been made visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4137">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4137">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4138">**horizontal_list** Yatay liste denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4138">**horizontal_list** Pointer to the horizontal list control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4139">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4139">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4140">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Altları yatay liste için başarılı bir şekilde konumlandırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4140">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful positioned the children for the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4141">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4141">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4142">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4142">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4143">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4143">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4144">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4144">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4145">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4145">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Position children in the horizontal list */
status = gx_horizontal_list_children_position (&horizontal_list);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the horizontal list are positioned. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4154">gx_horizontal_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4154">gx_horizontal_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4155">Yatay liste oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4155">Create horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4156">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4156">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_create(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_columns,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT horizontal_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4157">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4157">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4158">Bu hizmet yatay bir liste oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4158">This service creates a horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4159">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4159">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4160">**horizontal_list** Yatay liste pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4160">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4161">**ad** Yatay listenin adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4161">**name** Name of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4162">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4162">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4163">**total_columns** Yatay listedeki toplam comumns sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4163">**total_columns** Total number of comumns in horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4164">**geri arama** Bu, uygulama tarafından sağlanmış bir geri çağırma işlevine yönelik bir işaretçidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4164">**callback** This is a pointer to a callback function provided by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4165">Yeni görünür liste öğelerini oluşturmak için yatay liste kaydırıldığında geri çağırma işlevi çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4165">The callback function is invoked when the horizontal list is scrolled, to create the newly visible list items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4166">Bu şekilde yatay liste, Kullanıcı tanımlı pencere öğesi türünü liste öğeleri olarak görüntüleyebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4166">In this way the horizontal list can display any user-defined widget type as the list items.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4167">**style (stil)** Kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4167">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4168">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4168">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4169">**horizontal_list_id** Yatay listenin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4169">**horizontal_list_id** Application-defined ID of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4170">**boyut** Horitzonal listesinin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4170">**size** Dimensions of the horitzonal list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4171">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4171">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4172">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Yatay liste başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4172">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the horizontal list</span></span>

```C
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4192">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4192">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4194">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4195">**liste** Yatay liste pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4195">**list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4196">**olay** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4196">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4197">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4197">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4198">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) yatay liste olayı başarıyla işlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4198">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed horizontal list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4199">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4199">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4200">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4200">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4201">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4201">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4202">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4202">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4203">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4203">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic horizontal list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default horizontal
        list event processing */
        status =
        gx_horizontal_list_event_process(list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```
