- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4270">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4270">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4271">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4271">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4272">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4272">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4273">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4273">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4275">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4275">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list entry of “my_list” to the child in line 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4284">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4284">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4285">Yatay listeden seçili girişi al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4285">Get selected entry from horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4286">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4286">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4287">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4287">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4288">Bu hizmet, yatay listenin seçili liste girişini döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4288">This service returns the selected list entry of the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4289">Yatay listede alt pencere öğelerinden daha fazla satır varsa ve seçilen giriş görünümden kaydırıldısa, alt pencere öğeleri liste içeriği kaydırıldı olarak yeniden kullanıldıklarından bu API GX_NULL geri döner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4289">Note that if the horizontal list has more rows than child widgets, and the selected entry has been scrolled from view, this API will return GX_NULL because the child widgets are re-used as the list content is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4290">Gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get işlevi, görünümden kaydırıldı olsa bile seçilen öğenin dizinini güvenilir bir şekilde geri verir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4290">The gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get function will reliably return the index of the selected item, even if that item has been scrolled from view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4291">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4291">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4292">**horizontal_list** Yatay liste pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4292">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4293">**return_list_entry** Dönüş listesi giriş pencere öğesi hedefi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4293">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4294">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4294">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4295">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Yatay liste girdisi başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4295">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4296">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Seçili pencere öğesi, istemci alt öğelerinden daha fazla satır içeren bir listede görünümden kaydırıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4296">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Selected widget has been scrolled from view in a list with more rows than client children.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4297">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4297">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4298">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4298">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4299">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4299">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4300">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4300">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4301">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4301">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the list entry at the current index of horizontal list “my_list”. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_list_entry);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */

    
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4310">gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4310">gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4313">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4314">Bu hizmet, yatay liste tarafından görüntülenecek toplam sütun sayısını atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4314">This service assigns the total number of columns to be displayed by the horizontal list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4317">**sayı** Görüntülenecek sütun sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4317">**count** Number of columns to display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4318">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4318">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4319">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı atanan sütun sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4319">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assigned column count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4320">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x10) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4320">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x10) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4322">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz sayı değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4322">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid count value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4323">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4324">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4324">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4325">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Tell my list to display 20 total columns. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set(&my_list, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the total colums of “my_list” was successfully set to 20. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4334">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4334">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4335">Yatay kaydırma çubuğu oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4335">Create horizontal scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4336">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4336">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4337">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4337">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4338">Bu hizmet yatay bir kaydırma çubuğu oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4338">This service creates a horizontal scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4339">Yatay kaydırma çubuğunun kimliği önceden tanımlanmıştır (bir pencerenin olayları nasıl yakalaması gerekir) ve boyut otomatiktir (üst pencerenin istemci genişliğini doldurması gerekir).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4339">The ID for a horizontal scrollbar is pre-defined (because a window has to know how to catch events from it), and the size is automatic (because it has to fill the parent window’s client width).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4340">İstemci alanı kaydırma çubuklarına izin vermek için kimlik ve boyut parametrelerine sahip başka bir create işlevi eklememiz gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4340">If we decide to allow client area scrollbars, we will need to add another create function with the id and size parameters.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4341">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4342">**kaydırma çubuğu** Kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4342">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4343">**name** Kaydırma çubuğunun adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4343">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4344">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4344">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4345">**görünüm** Görünüm yapısı, kaydırma çubuğunun görünümünü tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4345">**appearance** The appearance structure defines the appearance of the scroll bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4346">Bu değer GX_NULL, kaydırma çubuğu tarafından tanımlanan varsayılan kaydırma çubuğu görünümünü gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4346">If this value is GX_NULL, the scrollbar will use the default scrollbar appearance defined by gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4347">İlke **yapısının tanımı** için Ek I GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4347">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4348">**Stil** Kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4348">**Style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4349">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4349">**Appendix D** contains pre- defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4350">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4350">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4351">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yatay kaydırma çubuğu oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4351">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful horizontal scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4353">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4353">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4354">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4354">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4355">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4355">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4356">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4357">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4357">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4358">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4358">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
    “my_horizontal_scrollbar”, &my_parent, GX_NULL,
    GX_STYLE_SCROLLBAR_END_BUTTONS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4365">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4365">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4366">Simge Oluştur düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4366">Create icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4367">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4367">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_create(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4368">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4368">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4369">Bu hizmet, belirtilen simge düğmesi pencere öğesini oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4369">This service creates the specified icon button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4370">GX_ICON_BUTTON GX_BUTTON türetilir ve tüm gx_button API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4370">GX_ICON_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4371">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4371">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4372">**düğme** Simge düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4372">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4373">**ad** Simge düğmesi pencere öğesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4373">**name** Logical name of icon button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4374">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4374">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4375">**icon_id** Simgenin Kaynak Kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4375">**icon_id** Resource ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4376">**style (stil)** Simge stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4376">**style** Style of icon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4377">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4377">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4378">**icon_button_id** Simge düğmesinin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4378">**icon_button_id** Application-defined ID of icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4379">**boyut** Simge düğmesinin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4379">**size** Dimensions of icon button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4380">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4380">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarıyla oluşturuldu simgesi düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4384">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4384">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4385">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4385">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4386">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4386">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4387">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4387">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon_button”. */
status = gx_icon_button_create(&my_icon_button, “my_icon_button”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_ICON_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon button “my_icon_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4405">gx_icon_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4405">gx_icon_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4406">Bir simge düğmesi çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4406">Draw an icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4407">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4407">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_button_draw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4408">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4408">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4409">Bu hizmet, simge düğmesini çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4409">This service draws the icon button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4410">Bu işlev normalde bir tuval yenileme işleminin parçası olarak Gux tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel bir çizim işlevi sağlamak ve varsayılan simge düğme çizimini özel çizim temeli olarak çağırmak isteyebileceğiniz uygulamaya de sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4410">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4411">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4411">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4412">**düğme** Simge düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4412">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4413">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4413">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4414">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4414">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4415">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4415">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4416">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4416">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4417">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4417">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_icon_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4434">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4434">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4435">Piksel haritasını simge düğmesi pencere öğesi olarak ayarlayın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4435">Set pixelmap to the icon button widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4436">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4437">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4438">Bu hizmet, simge düğmesi pencere öğesine yeni bir piksel haritası atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4438">This service assigns a new pixelmap to the icon button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4439">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4439">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4440">**düğme** Simge işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4440">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4441">**icon_id** Piksel haritasının kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4441">**icon_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4442">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4442">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4443">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarıyla ayarla simge düğmesi piksel haritası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4443">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set icon button pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4444">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4444">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4445">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4445">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4446">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4446">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4447">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4447">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4448">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4448">Example</span></span>

```C

    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ICON);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap of the icon button “my_icon_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4465">gx_icon_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4465">gx_icon_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4466">Çizim simgesi arka planı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4466">Draw icon background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4467">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4467">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_background_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4468">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4469">Bu hizmet, belirtilen simge pencere öğesinin arka planını çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4469">This service draws background of the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4470">Bu hizmet, genellikle gx_icon_button_draw işlevi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çizim işlevleri yazma konusunda yardımcı olmak için uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4470">This service is normally called internally by the gx_icon_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4471">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4471">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4472">**simge** Simge pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4472">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4473">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4473">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4474">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4474">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4475">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4476">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4477">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4477">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON *icon)
{
    /* Call icon background draw. */
    gx_icon_background_draw(icon);

    /* Add custom drawing here */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(icon);
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4483">gx_icon_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4483">gx_icon_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4484">Oluştur simgesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4484">Create icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4485">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4485">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_create(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_id, 
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4486">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4486">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4487">Bu hizmet belirtilen simge pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4487">This service creates the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4488">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4488">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4489">**simgesi** Simge denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4489">**icon** Pointer to icon control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4490">**name** Simge pencere öğesi mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4490">**name** Logical name of icon widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4491">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4491">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4492">**pixelmap_id** Piksel haritasının kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4492">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4493">**style (stil)** Simge stili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4493">**style** Style of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4494">**icon_id** Simgenin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4494">**icon_id** Application-defined ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4495">**x** Başlangıç x koordinatı konumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4495">**x** Starting x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4496">**y** Y koordinat konumunu başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4496">**y** Starting y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4497">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı simgesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4499">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4499">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4500">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4500">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4501">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4501">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4502">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4502">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4503">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4503">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4504">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4504">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4505">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4505">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_create(&my_icon, “my_icon”, &my_parent,
    MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_ID,
    5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon “my_icon” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4510">gx_icon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4510">gx_icon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4511">Çizim simgesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4511">Draw icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4512">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4512">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4513">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4514">Bu hizmet, belirtilen simge pencere öğesini çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4514">This service draws the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4515">Bu hizmet, bir tuval yenileme işleminin parçası olarak normalde GUıDX tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel bir çizim işlevi sağlamak ve varsayılan simge çizimini özel çizim temeli olarak çağırmak isteyebileceğiniz uygulamaya de sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4515">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4516">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4516">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4517">**simge** Simge pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4517">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4518">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4518">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4519">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4519">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4520">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4521">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4521">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4522">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4522">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon drawing function. */

VOID my_icon_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default icon draw. */
    gx_icon_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4527">gx_icon_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4527">gx_icon_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4528">Simge pencere öğesi olay işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4528">Icon widget event processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4529">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4529">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_event_process(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4530">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4530">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4531">Bu hizmet GX_ICON bir pencere öğesine gönderilen olayları işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4531">This service handles events sent to a GX_ICON widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4532">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4532">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4533">**simge** Simge pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4533">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4534">**event_ptr** GX_EVENT yapısına yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4534">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4535">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4535">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4536">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı işlenen simge olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4536">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful processed icon event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4537">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4537">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4538">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4538">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4539">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4539">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4540">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4540">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4541">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4541">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
    /* Do default handling. */
    status = gx_icon_event_process(icon, event_ptr);

    /* add your own handling here */
    break;
}
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4566">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4566">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4567">Görüntü okuyucu modülü örneği oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4567">Create image reader module instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4568">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4568">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_create(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_CONST GX_UBYTE *data, 
    INT data_size,
    GX_UBYTE color_format, 
    GX_UBYTE mode);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4569">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4569">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4570">Bu işlev, bir çalışma zamanı Ham görüntü okuyucu/kod çözücü oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4570">This function creates a runtime raw image reader / decoder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4571">Şu anda yalnızca JPEG ve PNG RAW görüntü türleri desteklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4571">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4572">Bu hizmet için GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT tanımlanması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4572">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4573">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4573">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4574">**image_reader** Görüntü okuyucu denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4574">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4575">**veri** Ham giriş verilerine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4575">**data** Pointer to raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4576">**data_size** Ham giriş verilerinin boyutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4576">**data_size** Size of raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4577">**color_format** İstenen çıkış rengi biçimi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4577">**color_format** The requested output color format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4578">**mod** Sıkıştır, titrek ve alfa modları bayrakları.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4578">**mode** Compress, dither and alpha modes flags.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4579">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4579">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı görüntü okuyucu oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4581">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4581">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4582">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz veri boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4582">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid data size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4583">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4583">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4584">Başlatma ve Iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4584">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4585">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4585">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4609">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4609">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4610">Sıkıştırıcıyı ve dönüştürme işlemini başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4610">Start the decompress and conversion process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4611">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4611">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_start(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *outmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4612">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4612">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4613">Bu hizmet, bir ham görüntünün kodunu belirtilen renk biçimine verir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4613">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4614">Şu anda yalnızca jpeg ve png ham görüntü türleri de destektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4614">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4615">Bunun GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4615">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4616">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4616">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4617">**image_reader** Görüntü okuyucusu denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4617">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4618">**piksel haritası** Çıkış piksel haritası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4618">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4619">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4619">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4620">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı görüntü kodu çözme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4620">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image decoding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4621">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Bellek ayırma tanımlanmadı veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4621">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4622">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Giriş görüntüsü türü veya çıkış rengi biçimi desteklenmiyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4622">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4625">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4625">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4626">Başlatma ve Iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4626">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4627">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4627">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;
GX_PIXELMAP output_map;

/* Create my_image_reader here. */

/* Decoding a raw image according to the settings of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_start(&my_image_reader, output_map)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “output_map” have been loaded with the requested pixelmap. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_axis_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4631">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4631">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4632">Çizgi grafiği x, y ekseni çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4632">Draw line chart x,y axis</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4633">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4633">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_axis_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4634">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4635">Bu hizmet, çizgi grafiğinin x, y eksenini çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4635">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4636">Eksen renkleri ve çizgi genişliği parametreleri çizgi grafik bilgi yapısından alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4636">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4637">Bu hizmet, genellikle gx_line_chart_draw işlevi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çizim işlevleri yazma konusunda yardımcı olmak için uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4637">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4638">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4638">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4639">**grafik** Çizgi grafik denetim bloğu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4639">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4640">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4641">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4641">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4642">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4642">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4643">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4643">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4644">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4644">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_create(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_LINE_CHART_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4654">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4654">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4657">GX_LINE_CHART, GX_WINDOW tabanlıdır ve tüm GX_WINDOW API'leri destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4657">GX_LINE_CHART is based on GX_WINDOW, and supports all of the GX_WINDOW APIs.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4668">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı çizgi grafik oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4668">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line chart create</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4670">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4670">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4671">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4671">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4674">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4674">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4675">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4675">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_data_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4682">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4682">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4683">Çizgi grafik veri satırı çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4683">Draw line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4684">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4684">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_data_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4685">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4685">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4686">Bu hizmet çizgi grafik veri çizgisini çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4686">This service draws the line chart data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4687">Çizgi renkleri ve çizgi genişliği parametreleri çizgi grafik bilgi yapısından alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4687">The line colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4688">Bu hizmet, genellikle gx_line_chart_draw işlevi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çizim işlevleri yazma konusunda yardımcı olmak için uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4688">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4689">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4689">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4690">**grafik** Çizgi grafik denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4690">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4691">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4691">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4692">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4692">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4693">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4693">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4694">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4694">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4695">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4695">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(chart);

    /* Draw the data line. */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4742">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4742">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    INT *return_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4743">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4743">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4744">Bu hizmet, grafik Y ekseninde veri değerlerini çizmek için kullanılan sabit nokta ölçekleme değerini hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4744">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4745">Bu ölçekleme değerini hesaplamak için chart_info parametreleri ve grafik sınırlayıcı dikdörtgeni kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4745">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4746">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4746">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4747">**grafik** Çizgi grafik denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4747">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4748">**return_val** Sabit noktalı dönüş değerinin tutulacağı değerin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4748">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4749">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4749">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı y ölçek değeri hesaplaması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful y scale value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4752">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4752">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4753">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4753">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4754">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4754">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
INT y_scale;

/* Caluclate y scale value of “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(&chart, &y_scale);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, y scale value of “chart” has been calculated. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4760">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4760">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4761">Menü Oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4761">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4762">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4762">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_create(
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4763">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4763">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4764">Bu hizmet, belirtilen bir menü oluşturur ve menüyü sağlanan üst pencere öğesiyle ilişkilendirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4764">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4765">Alt menü öğesi olarak tüm pencere öğesi türlerini kabul eder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4765">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4766">Bir pencere öğesini bir alt menü öğesi olarak eklemek için **gx_menu_insert** çağırın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4766">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4767">GX_MENU GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT türetilir ve tüm gx_pixelmap_prompt API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4767">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4768">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4768">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4769">**menü** Menü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4769">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4770">**name** Menenin adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4770">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4771">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4771">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4772">**text_id** Metnin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4772">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4773">**fill_id** Dolgu kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4773">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4774">**style (stil)** Pencere öğesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4774">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4775">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stiller içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4775">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4776">**menu_id** Menenin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4776">**menu_id** Application-defined ID of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4777">**boyut** Menenin boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4777">**size** Size of the menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4778">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4778">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4779">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı menü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4779">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4780">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4780">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4782">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4782">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4783">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4783">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4786">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4786">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MENU my_menu;

/* Create “my_menu”. */
status = gx_menu_create(&my_menu, “my_menu”, parent, MY_TEXT_ID,

    &size);
```

## <a name="gx_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4798">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4798">gx_menu_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4800">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4800">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4801">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4802">Bu hizmet, belirtilen menüyü çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4802">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4803">Bu işlev normalde Gux tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel menü pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevleri uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4803">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4807">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4807">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4808">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4808">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4809">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4809">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4810">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4810">Example</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4825">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4825">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4826">Bu hizmet, belirtilen menü için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4826">This service processes an event for the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4827">Bu hizmet, herhangi bir özel menü olay işleme işlevi tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4827">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom menu event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4828">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4828">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4829">**menü** Menü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4829">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4830">**event_ptr** İşlemeye devam etmek için olayın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4830">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4831">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4831">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4832">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı menü olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4832">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4833">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4833">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4834">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4834">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4835">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4835">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4836">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4836">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4837">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4837">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4838">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4838">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4899">Menü metnini çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4899">Draw menu text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4900">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4900">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_text_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4901">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4901">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4902">Bu hizmet, bir menünün metnini çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4902">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4903">Bu işlev normalde Gux tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel menü pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevleri uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4903">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4904">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4904">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4905">**menü** Menü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4905">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4906">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4906">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4907">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4907">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4908">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4908">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4909">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4909">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4910">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4910">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4949">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4949">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4950">Çok satırlı metin oluştur düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4950">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4951">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4951">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4952">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4952">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4953">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı bir metin düğmesi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4953">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4954">Çok satırlı metin düğmesi, düğme metnini 1-n satır üzerinde görüntüler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4954">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4955">En fazla satır sayısı, varsayılan olarak 4 olan GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES sabit değer tarafından tanımlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4955">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4956">Satır sonları, çok satırlı metin düğmesine atanan metin dizesi içinde satır başı ve/veya satır başı + satır besleme çiftleri tarafından ayarlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4956">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4957">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON GX_TEXT_BUTTON türetilir ve tüm gx_text_button API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4957">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4958">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4958">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4959">**text_button** Metin düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4959">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4960">**ad** Metin düğmesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4960">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4961">**üst öğe** Düğmenin üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4961">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4962">**text_id** Metnin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4962">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4963">**Stil** Metin düğmesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4963">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4964">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4964">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4965">**text_button_id** Metin düğmesinin uygulama tanımlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4965">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4966">**Boyut** Düğmenin boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4966">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4967">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4967">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4968">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok satırlı metin düğmesi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4968">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4969">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4969">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4970">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4970">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4971">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4971">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4972">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4972">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4973">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4973">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4974">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4974">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4975">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4975">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi-line text button “my_text_button” was created. */
```
