## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4983">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4983">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4984">Çok satırlı metin çizme düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4984">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4985">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4985">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4986">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4986">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4987">Bu hizmet çok satırlı metin düğmesini çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4987">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4988">Bu işlev normalde tuval yenileme işlemi kapsamında GUIX tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel bir çizim işlevi sağlamak ve varsayılan çok satırlı metin düğmesi çizimini özel çizim tabanı olarak çağırmak isteyen uygulamaya da açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4988">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4989">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4989">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4990">**düğme** Metin işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4990">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4991">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4991">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4992">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4992">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4993">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4993">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4994">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4994">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-4995">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-4995">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5003">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5003">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5004">Çok satırlı metin düğmesi için varsayılan olay işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5004">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5005">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5005">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5006">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5006">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5007">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin düğmesi pencere öğesi için varsayılan olay işleme işlevidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5007">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5008">Bu işlev, bir metin düğmesi pencere öğesi için özel olay işleme sağlamak isteyen uygulamalar tarafından erişilebilir hale gelir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5008">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5009">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5009">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5010">**düğme** Metin işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5010">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5011">**event_ptr** İşlenecek olay</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5011">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5012">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5012">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5013">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) olay başarıyla işlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5013">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5014">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5014">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5015">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5015">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5016">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5016">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5017">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5017">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5018">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5018">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5029">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5029">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5030">Bu destek işlevi, çok satırlı bir metin düğmesinin metin bölümünü çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5030">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5031">Bu işlev, gx_multi_line_text_button_draw () tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır ve özel bir çok satırlı metin düğmesi çizim işlevi tanımlayan uygulamalar için kolaylık olarak ayrı bir API olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5031">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5032">Düğme arka plan çizimini özelleştirmek isteyen uygulamalar kendi özel çizim işlevlerini sağlayabilir ve multi_line_text_button_text_draw hizmetini özel çiziminin bir parçası olarak çağırarak arka plan üzerinde düğme metnini çizin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5032">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5033">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5033">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5034">**text_button** Metin düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5034">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5035">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5035">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5036">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5036">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5037">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5037">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5038">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5038">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5039">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5039">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5050">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5050">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5055">**string_id** Dizenin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5055">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5056">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5056">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5058">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5058">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5059">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5059">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button “my_text_button”. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5072">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5073">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5074">Bu hizmet gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext () kullanımı için kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5074">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5075">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dizeyi metin düğmesine atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5075">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5076">Text_button pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY ile oluşturulduysa pencere öğesi, atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur ve bu nedenle gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API 'SI bu hizmetin istenmediği bir kez çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5076">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5077">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz, bu nedenle dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani bu bir otomatik veya geçici değişken olmayabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5077">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5078">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5078">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5079">**text_button** Metin düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5079">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5080">NULL ile sonlandırılmış dizeye **metin** işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5080">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5081">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5081">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5082">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) metin düğmeye başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5082">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5084">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5084">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5085">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) bellek ayırıcısı tanımlı değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5085">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5086">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5086">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5087">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5087">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5088">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5088">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
UINT context_size;
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5262">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5262">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5263">Geçerli çok satırlı metin girişi imleç konumuna bir karakter dizesi Ekle (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5263">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5264">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5264">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5265">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5265">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5266">Bu API kullanım dışıdır ve gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext () ile değiştirilmiştir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5266">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5267">Bu hizmet, geçerli imleç konumundaki çok satırlı metin girişi dize arabelleğine bir karakter dizesi ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5267">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5268">Bu hizmet, belirli bir anahtar aşağı olayı alındığında dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5268">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5269">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5269">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5270">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5270">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5271">**insert_str** Eklenecek UTF-8 biçimi karakter dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5271">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5272">**insert_size** Eklenecek bayt sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5272">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5273">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5273">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5274">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) karakter dizesi başarıyla ekledi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5274">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5276">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5276">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5278">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz dize boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5278">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5279">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) geçersiz Yazı tipi veya arabellek boyutu dışında</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5279">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5280">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5280">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5281">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5281">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5282">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5282">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(&my_text_input,
    insert_text,
    GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5304">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5304">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = insert_text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(insert_text);

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext(&my_text_input, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully inserted the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5336">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5336">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5337">Çok satırlı metin girişi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5337">Create multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5338">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5338">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5339">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5339">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5340">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı bir metin girişi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5340">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5341">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT, GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW türetilen ve tüm gx_multi_line_text_view destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5341">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5342">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5342">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5343">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5343">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5344">**name** Metin girişi pencere öğesi adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5344">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5345">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5345">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5346">**input_buffer** Metin girişi arabelleği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5346">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5347">**buffer_size** Metin girişi arabelleğinin bayt cinsinden boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5347">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5348">**style (stil)** Metin girişi pencere öğesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5348">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5349">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5349">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5350">**text_input_id** Metin girişinin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5350">**text_input_id** Application-defined ID of text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5351">**boyut** Metin girişi pencere öğesi boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5351">**size** Dimensions of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5352">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5352">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5353">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok satırlı metin girişi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5353">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5354">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5354">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5355">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5355">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5356">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5356">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5357">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5357">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5358">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5358">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5359">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5359">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5360">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5360">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5361">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5361">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5440">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5440">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5442">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5442">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5450">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5450">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5587">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi için varsayılan olay işleme işlevidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5587">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5588">Bu işlev, çok satırlı bir metin girişi pencere öğesi için özel olay işleme sağlamak isteyen uygulamalar tarafından erişilebilir hale getirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5588">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5589">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5589">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5590">**düğme** Çok satırlı metin girişi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5590">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5591">**event_ptr** İşlenecek olay</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5591">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5592">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5592">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5593">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) olay başarıyla işlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5593">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5594">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5594">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5595">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5595">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5596">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5596">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5597">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5597">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5598">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5598">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5599">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5599">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5631">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5631">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5632">Çok satırlı metin girişi arka plan rengini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5632">Set multi line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5633">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5633">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5634">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5635">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi için Fill renkleri atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5635">This service assigns fill colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5636">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5637">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5637">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5638">**normal_fill_color_id** Normal durumda kullanılan normal Fill renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5638">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal fill color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5639">**selected_fill_color_id** Pencere öğesi odaklanıldığında kullanılan seçili Fill renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5639">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the selected fill color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5640">**disabled_fill_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED etkin olmadığında kullanılan devre dışı Fill renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5640">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled fill color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5641">**readonly_fill_color_id** Hem GX_STYLE_ENABLED hem de GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY etkin olduğunda kullanılan salt okuma dolgusu renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5641">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the read only fill color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY are active.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5642">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5642">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5643">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) çok satırlı metin girişi Için renkler başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5643">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5644">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5644">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5645">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5645">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5646">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5646">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5647">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5647">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5648">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5648">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5680">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5680">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5681">Metin girişi imlecini geçerli satırın başlangıcına taşı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5681">Move the text input cursor to the start of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5682">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5682">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_home(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5683">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5683">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5684">Bu hizmet, metin girişi imleç konumunu geçerli satırın başlangıcına taşımaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5684">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the current line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5685">Bu hizmet, ana anahtar aşağı olayı alındığında dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5685">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5686">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5686">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5687">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5687">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5688">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5688">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5689">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) imleci geçerli satırın başlangıcına başarıyla taşındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5689">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to start of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5690">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5690">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5692">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5692">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5693">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5693">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5694">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5694">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5695">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5695">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the start of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5727">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5727">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5728">Çok satırlı metin giriş imlecini sola bir karakter kaydır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5728">Move multi line text input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5729">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5729">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5730">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5730">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5731">Bu hizmet çok satırlı metin giriş imlecini bir karakter sola kaydırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5731">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5732">Bu hizmet, sol tuşu basılı bir olay alındığında dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5732">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5733">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5733">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5734">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5734">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5735">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5735">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5736">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Imleç sola başarıyla taşındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5736">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the left</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5737">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5737">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5738">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5738">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5739">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5739">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5740">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) geçersiz Yazı tipi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5740">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5741">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5741">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor one character to the left. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved one character to the left. */

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5775">gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5775">gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5777">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5777">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5778">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5778">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5779">Bu hizmet çok satırlı metin giriş imlecini bir karakter sağa kaydırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5779">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the right.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5780">Bu hizmet, doğru bir anahtar aşağı olayı alındığında dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5780">This service is called internally when a right key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5781">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5781">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5783">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5783">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5784">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Imleç sağa başarıyla taşındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5784">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the right</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5785">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5785">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5786">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5786">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5787">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5787">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5788">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5788">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor one character to the right. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input cursor has been moved one character to the right. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5822">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5822">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5823">Çok satırlı metin girişi stilleri ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5823">Add multi line text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5824">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5824">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5825">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5825">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5826">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı bir metin girişi pencere öğesine stiller ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5826">This service adds styles to a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5827">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5827">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5828">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5828">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5829">**Stil** Eklenecek stiller.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5829">**style** Styles to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5830">**Ek D** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stilleri içerir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5830">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5831">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5831">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5832">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok satırlı metin girişi stili ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5832">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5833">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5833">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5834">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5834">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5835">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5835">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5836">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5836">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5837">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5837">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style GX_STYTLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS to multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS has been successfully added. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5963">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5963">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5964">Çok satırlı metin girişi metin rengini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5964">Set multi line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5965">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5965">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5966">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5966">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5967">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi için metin renkleri atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5967">This service assigns text colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5968">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5968">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5969">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5969">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5970">**normal_fill_color_id** Normal durumda kullanılan normal metin renginin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5970">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5971">**selected_text_color_id** Pencere öğesi odağında kullanılan seçili metin renginin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5971">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5972">**disabled_text_color_id** Etkin değilken devre dışı bırakılmış metin renginin GX_STYLE_ENABLED kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5972">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5973">**readonly_text_color_id** Hem kaynak hem de kaynak etkin olduğunda kullanılan salt GX_STYLE_ENABLED GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5973">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the read only text color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5974">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5974">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Çok satırlı metin girişi için renkleri başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5977">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5977">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5978">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5978">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5979">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5979">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-5980">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-5980">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill colors of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6012">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6012">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6013">Metin seçme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6013">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6014">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6014">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6015">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6015">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6016">Bu hizmet, belirtilen başlangıç işareti ve bitiş işareti diziniyle çok satırlı metin girişi metnini seçer ve seçilen metni seçili dolgu ve metin renkleriyle vurgular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6016">This service selects multi line text input text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6017">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6017">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6018">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6018">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6019">**start_index** Seçilen ilk karakterin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6019">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6020">**end_index** Seçilen son karakterin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6020">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6021">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı çok satırlı metin girişi metin seçimi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6024">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6024">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6026">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Dizin değeri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6026">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6027">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6027">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6028">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6028">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6029">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6029">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
    0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between 
    index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6063">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6063">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6066">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dizeyi çok satırlı metin girişine atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6066">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6067">Bu multi_line_text_input pencere öğesi giriş arabelleği boyutu dize uzunluğundan küçükse dize kesilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6067">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6072">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Metni çok satırlı metin girişi olarak başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6072">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6129">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6129">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6130">Çok satırlı metin girişi imlecini önceki satıra taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6130">Move multi line text input cursor to the previous line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6131">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6131">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6132">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6132">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6133">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin girişi imlecini önceki metin satırına taşIar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6133">This service moves the multi line text input cursor to the previous line of text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6134">Bu hizmet, yukarı ok tuşu aşağı olayı alındığında dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6134">This service is called internally when an up arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6135">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6136">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6136">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6137">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6137">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6138">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) imleci önceki satıra başarıyla taşındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6138">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the previous line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6141">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6141">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6142">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6142">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor to the previous line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6176">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6176">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6177">Çok satırlı metin görünümü oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6177">Create multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6178">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6178">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT text_view_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6179">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6179">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6180">Bu hizmet bir GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6180">This service creates a GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6181">Bu pencere öğesi türü GX_WINDOW türetilir ve bu nedenle tüm gx_window API hizmetleri bu pencere öğesi türü ile de kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6181">This widget type is derived from GX_WINDOW, and therefore all gx_window API services may also be utilized with this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6182">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6182">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6183">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6183">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6184">**ad** Metin görünümü pencere öğesinin adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6184">**name** Name of the text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6185">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6185">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6186">**text_id** Metin dizesinin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6186">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6187">**Stil** Metin görünümü pencere öğesinin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6187">**style** Style of text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6188">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6188">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6189">**text_view_id** Uygulama tanımlı metin görünümü KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6189">**text_view_id** Application-defined ID of text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6190">**Boyut** Metin görünümü pencere öğesinin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6190">**size** Dimensions of text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6191">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6191">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created multi-line text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6195">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6195">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6196">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6196">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6197">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6197">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6198">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6198">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6199">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6199">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_create(&my_text_view,
    “my_text_view”, &my_parent,
    TEXT_STRING_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text view “my_text_view” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6231">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6231">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6232">Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6232">Draw a multi line text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6233">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW * text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6234">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6235">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı bir metin görünümü pencere öğesi çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6235">This service draws a multi line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6236">Bu hizmet, genellikle tuval yenilemesi sırasında dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çok satırlı metin görünümü çizim işlevlerinden de çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6236">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom multi line text view drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6237">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6237">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6238">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6238">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6239">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6239">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6240">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6240">**None**</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6275">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6275">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6276">Çok satırlı metin görünümü olayını işle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6276">Process multi-line text view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6277">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6277">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6278">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6278">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6279">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı bir metin görünümü pencere öğesi için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6279">This service processes an event for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6280">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6280">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6281">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6281">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6282">**olay** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6282">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6283">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6283">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6284">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok satırlı metin görünümü olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6284">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6285">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6285">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6286">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6286">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6288">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6288">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6289">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6289">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6290">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6290">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event handler. */
UINT my_event_handler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(view, event_ptr);
        /* Add custom actions here. */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process (view, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

```C
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6336">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6336">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set font ID FONT_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set(&my_text_view, FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text view “my_text_view” will use the specified font to display its text. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6368">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6368">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6369">Çok satırlı metin görünümü satır alanını ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6369">Set multi-line text view line space</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6370">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6370">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_BYTE line_space);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6371">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6371">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6372">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi için metin satırları arasındaki boşluğu ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6372">This service sets the spacing between lines of text for the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6373">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6374">**görüntüleme** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6374">**view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6375">**line_space** Ayarlanacak değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6375">**line_space** Value to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6376">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6376">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6377">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) çok satırlı metin görünümü için satır alanı değeri başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6377">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set line space value for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6378">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6378">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6379">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6379">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6380">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6380">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6381">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6381">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set line space of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line space of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```
