## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6413">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6413">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6414">Çok satırlı metin görünümü kaydırma bilgisi al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6414">Get multi-line text view scroll info</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6415">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6415">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6416">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6417">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin görünümü kaydırma bilgilerini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6417">This service gets the multi-line text view scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6418">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6418">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6419">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6419">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6420">**Stil** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL veya GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6420">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6421">**Bilgi** Kaydırma bilgisi için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6421">**Info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6422">**Ek ı** GX_SCROLL_INFO yapısına yönelik tanımı içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6422">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6423">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6423">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6424">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) metin görünümü kaydırma bilgisini başarıyla aldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6424">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved text view scroll info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6425">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) pencere öğesi görünür değil veya metin görünümü yazı tipi kimliği geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6425">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget is not visible or text view font id is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6426">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6426">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6427">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6427">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6428">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6428">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6429">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6429">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(&my_text_view,
    &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6461">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6461">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6462">Çok satırlı metin görünümü için metin rengini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6462">Set the text color for the multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6463">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6463">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6464">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6464">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6465">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesine metin rengi atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6465">This service assigns text color to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6466">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6466">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6467">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6467">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6468">**normal_text_color_id** Normal durumda kullanılan normal metin renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6468">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6469">**selected_text_color_id** Pencere öğesi odaklanıldığında kullanılan seçili metin renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6469">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6470">**disabled_text_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED kullanılan devre dışı metin renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI etkin değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6470">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6471">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6471">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6472">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) çok satırlı metin görünümü Için renkler başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6472">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6473">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6473">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6474">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6474">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6475">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6476">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6477">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6477">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(&my_text_view,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6509">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6509">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6510">Birden çok satırlı metin görünümünde sistem metin dizesi ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6510">Set system text string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6511">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6511">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6512">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6512">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6513">Bu hizmet, bir dizenin kaynak KIMLIĞINI çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesine ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6513">This service sets the resource ID of a string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6514">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6514">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6515">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6515">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6516">**text_id** Metin dizesinin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6516">**text_id** Resource ID for the text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6517">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) çok satırlı metin görünümü için dize kimliği başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string id for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6521">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6521">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6522">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6522">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6523">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6523">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6524">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6524">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string ID STRING_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(&my_text_view, STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text id of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6556">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6556">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6557">Çok satırlı metin görünümünde Kullanıcı tanımlı dizeyi ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6557">Set user-defined string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6558">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6558">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6559">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6559">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6560">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesine bir metin dizesi atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6560">This service assigns a text string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6561">Text_view pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY ile oluşturulduysa pencere öğesi, atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur ve bu nedenle gx_system_memory_allocate_set API 'SI bu hizmetin istenmediği bir kez çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6561">If the text_view widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6562">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz ve bu nedenle atanan dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani bu bir otomatik veya geçici değişken olmayabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6562">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the assigned string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6563">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6563">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6564">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6564">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6565">**metin** NULL ile sonlandırılmış metin dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6565">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6566">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6566">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6567">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) çok satırlı metin görünümü Için dize başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6567">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6568">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) bellek ayırıcısı tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6568">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6571">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6571">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6572">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6572">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6573">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6573">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string “my string” to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(&my_text_view, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6605">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6605">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6606">Çok satırlı metin görünümü boşluğu ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6606">Set multi-line text view whitespace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6607">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6607">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_UBYTE whitespace);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6608">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6608">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6609">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesi anahatları ve çok satırlı bir metin görünümü pencere öğesi için istemci alanı arasındaki aralığı ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6609">This service sets spacing between widget outlines and client area for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6610">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6611">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6611">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6612">**boşluk** Text_view pencere öğesi ile görüntülenmiş metin arasındaki kenar boşluğu genişliği (piksel cinsinden).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6612">**whitespace** Width of margin between text_view widget and the displayed text, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6613">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6613">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) çok satırlı metin görünümü Için boşluk başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set whitespace for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6615">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6615">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6651">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6651">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6652">Sayısal pixelmap istemi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6652">Create numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6653">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6653">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id,
    ULONG style, USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6654">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6654">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6655">Bu hizmet sayısal bir pixelmap istemi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6655">This service creates a numeric pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6656">Numeric_pixelmap_prompt, kendi arabelleğini tutan ve bir gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set (INT) API sağlayan bir pixelmap_prompt, arabellek boyutu sabit GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE tarafından tanımlanır, varsayılan olarak 16 ' dır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6656">A numeric_pixelmap_prompt is just a pixelmap_prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6657">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT türetilir ve tüm gx_pixelmap_prompt API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6657">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6658">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6658">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6659">**komut istemi** Sayısal pixelmap istem denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6659">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6660">**ad** İstem adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6660">**name** Name of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6661">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6661">**parent** Parent widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6662">**text_id** Kaynak dizesi kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6662">**text_id** Resource string id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6663">**fill_id** Dolgu alanı için piksel haritası kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6663">**fill_id** Pixelmap id for fill area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6664">**style (stil)** Sayısal piksel haritası istemi stili, **Ek D** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stiller içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6664">**style** Style of numeric pixelmap prompt, **Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6665">**pixelmap_prompt_id** İstem uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6665">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6666">**boyut** Sayısal piksel haritası isteminin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6666">**size** Dimensions of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6667">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6667">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6668">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sayısal pixlemap istemini başarıyla oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6668">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully create numeric pixlemap prompt</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6670">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6670">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6672">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6672">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */

    “my_numeric_pix_prompt”, &my_parent,
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6679">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6679">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6680">Sayısal piksel haritası isteminin format işlevini geçersiz kılma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6680">Override format function of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6681">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6681">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    OID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6682">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6682">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6683">Bu hizmet, sayısal pixlemap istemi pencere öğesi varsayılan biçim işlevini geçersiz kılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6683">This service overrides the default format function of the numeric pixlemap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6684">Varsayılan biçim işlevi, sayısal piksel haritası istemi değerini bir dizeye dönüştürür ve pencere öğesi özel arabelleğinde depolar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6684">The default format function converts the numeric pixelmap prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6685">Bu hizmet, uygulamanın sayısal piksel haritası istemi değerini biçimlendirmek ve pencere öğesi özel arabelleğinde depolamak için kendi biçim işlevini tanımlamasını sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6685">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric pixelmap prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6686">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6686">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6687">**komut istemi** Sayısal pixelmap istem denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6687">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6688">**format_func** Ayarlanacak biçimlendirme işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6688">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6689">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6689">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6690">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) sayısal piksellimap istem biçimi işlevini başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6690">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric pixlemap prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6692">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6692">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6693">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6693">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6694">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6694">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric pixelmap format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override default format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set(
    &my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been override. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6701">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6701">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6703">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6703">Parameters</span></span>

```C
    GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt,

    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6719">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6719">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6720">Bu hizmet sayısal bir istem pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6720">This service creates a numeric prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6721">Numeric_ istemi yalnızca kendi arabelleğini tutan ve gx_numeric_ prompt_value_set(INT) API'si sağlayan bir istemdir; arabellek boyutu varsayılan olarak 16 olan sabit GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE tarafından tanımlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6721">A numeric_ prompt is just a prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_ prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6722">GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT, GX_PROMPT türetilen ve tüm gx_prompt API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6722">GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT is derived from GX_PROMPT and supports all gx_prompt API services.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6743">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6743">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6744">Sayısal istem için biçim işlevini geçersiz kıl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6744">Override format function of numeric prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6745">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6745">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt,
    VOID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6746">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6746">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6747">Bu hizmet, sayısal istem pencere öğesinin varsayılan biçim işlevini geçersiz kılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6747">This service overrides the default format function of a numeric prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6748">Varsayılan biçim işlevi, sayısal istem değerini bir dizeye dönüştürür ve pencere öğesinin özel arabelleğinde depolar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6748">The default format function converts the numeric prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6749">Bu hizmet, uygulamanın, sayısal istem değerini pencere öğesinin özel arabelleğinde biçimlendirmek ve depolamak için kendi biçim işlevini tanımlamasına olanak sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6749">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6750">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6750">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6751">**komut istemi** Sayısal istem denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6751">**prompt** Numeric prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6752">**format_func** Ayarlanacak biçimlendirme işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6752">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6753">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6753">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6754">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) sayısal istem biçimi işlevini başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6754">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6755">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6755">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6756">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6756">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6757">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6757">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6758">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6758">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt, INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100, prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override the default format function of “my_numeric_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set(&my_numeric_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the format function of “my_numeric_prompt” has been override. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6784">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6784">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6785">Bu hizmet sayısal bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6785">This service creates a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6786">Sayısal kaydırma tekerleği, bir sayı aralığını görüntülemek için özel olarak kullanılan bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi t t değeridir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6786">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6787">Diğer kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türleri de mevcuttur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6787">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6788">Kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi hiyerarşisi, pencere öğesi türleri ve pencere öğesi türetme hakkında daha fazla bilgi için gx_scroll_wheel_create() API'sini kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6788">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6789">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL, GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL türetilen ve tüm gx_text_scroll_wheel ve gx_scroll_wheel destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6789">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_text_scroll_wheel and gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6790">Tüm kaydırma tekerleği türleri GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT kaydırma tekerleği kaydırıldıklarında üstlerine olay oluşturmalarını sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6790">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6791">Sayısal kaydırma tekerleği varsayılan olarak abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 satıra sahip olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6791">A numeric scroll wheel will default to having abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6792">Başka bir deyişle kaydırma tekerleği, her satırda start_val end_val 1 artırarak veya azaltarak arasındaki her değeri görüntüler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6792">In other words, the scroll wheel will display every value between start_val and end_val, incrementing or decrementing by 1 with each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6793">Uygulamanın start_val görünmesini istediği end_val büyük veya küçük bir değer olduğunu unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6793">Note that start_val can be greater or less than end_val, depending on which way the application wants the range to appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6794">Uygulama satır artışını değiştirmek istiyorsa bunu sayısal kaydırma tekerleğini oluşturduk gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() çağrısıyla yapar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6794">If the application wants to change the row increment, it can do this by calling gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() after creating the numeric scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6795">Örneğin, 1980 ile 2020 yıllarını 5 artırarak gösteren bir kaydırma tekerleği oluşturmak isteyen bir uygulama bunu yapar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6795">For example, an application wanting to create a scroll wheel that displays the values years 1980 to 2020, incrementing by 5, might do this:</span></span>

```C
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, GX_NULL, parent, 1980,
    2020, style, id, &size);

/* the years 1980 through 2020, inclusive, incrementing by 5 years,
yields 9 total rows */

gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 9);
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6814">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6814">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “year_wheel”. */
status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&year_wheel,
    “year_selector””, &parent,
    1980, 2040,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER |
    GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT | GX_STYLE_WRAP |
    GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    YEAR_WHEEL_ID,
    &size);

```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6832">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6832">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6833">Sayısal kaydırma tekerleğinin değer aralığını atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6833">Assign value range of numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6834">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6834">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT start_val, INT end_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6835">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6835">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6836">Bu hizmet, sayısal bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi tarafından izin verilen ve görüntülenen değer aralığını değiştiren bir hizmettir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6836">This service modifies the range of values allowed and displayed by a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6837">Sayısal kaydırma tekerleği, bir sayı aralığını görüntülemek için özel olarak kullanılan bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi t t değeridir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6837">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6838">Diğer kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türleri de mevcuttur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6838">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6839">Kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi hiyerarşisi, pencere öğesi türleri ve pencere öğesi türetme hakkında daha fazla bilgi için gx_scroll_wheel_create() API'sini kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6839">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6840">Bu API'nin çağrısı, kaydırma tekerleğinin toplam satırlarını abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 olarak sıfırlar. Başka bir ifadeyle kaydırma tekerleği her satır için 1 artacak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6840">Invoking this API resets the scroll wheel total rows to abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, meaning the scroll wheel will increment by 1 for each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6841">Bunu değiştirmek için uygulama gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() çağrısıyla toplam satır sayısını değiştirebilir ve satırlar arasındaki değer artışını etkili bir şekilde değiştirebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6841">To change this, the application can call gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() to change the total number of row, effectively changing the value increment between rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6842">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6842">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6843">**tekerlek** Sayısal kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6843">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6844">**start_val** Başlangıç sayısal değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6844">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6845">**end_val** Bitiş sayısal değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6845">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6846">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6846">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6847">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) sayısal kaydırma tekerleği aralığı başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6847">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric scroll wheel range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6848">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6848">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6850">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6850">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6851">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6851">Initialization and threads</span></span> 

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6852">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6852">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change range of “rate” scroll wheel. */

status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(&year_wheel, 0, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel range has been modified. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6874">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6874">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6875">Bu hizmet bir piksel haritası düğmesi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6875">This service creates a pixelmap button widget.</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_create(&my_pixelmap_button,
    “my_pixelmap_button”, &my_parent,
    MY_NORMAL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_DESELECTED_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_PIXELMAP_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button “my_pixelmap_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6918">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6918">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6919">Piksel haritası çiz düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6919">Draw pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6920">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6920">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6921">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6921">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6922">Bu hizmet bir piksel haritası düğme pencere öğesi çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6922">This service draws a pixelmap button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6923">Bu işlev normalde GUIX tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel piksel haritası düğme pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevlerini uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6923">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6924">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6924">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6925">**düğme** Piksel haritası düğme denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6925">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6926">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6926">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6927">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6927">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6928">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6928">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6929">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6929">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6930">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6930">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap button drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap button draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_button_draw(button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6952">gx_pixelmap_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6952">gx_pixelmap_button_event_process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6954">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6954">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6955">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6956">Bu hizmet, pixelmap düğmesi pencere öğesi türü için varsayılan olay işleme sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6956">This service provides default event handling for the pixelmap button widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6957">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6957">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6958">**düğme** Pixelmap Button denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6958">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6959">**event_ptr** GX_EVENT yapısına yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6959">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6960">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6960">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pixelmap düğmesi çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap button draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6964">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6964">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6965">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6965">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6966">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6966">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_button_event_process(icon, event_ptr);
    
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6988">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6988">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6989">Düğmeye pixelmaps ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6989">Assign pixelmaps to button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6990">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6990">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6991">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6992">Bu hizmet, pixelmaps 'i pixelmap düğmesine ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6992">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6993">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6993">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6994">**düğme** Pixelmap Button denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6994">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6995">**normal_id** Normal durum olarak kullanılacak pixelmap 'in kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6995">**normal_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6996">**selected_id** Düğme seçildiğinde kullanılacak pixelmap 'in kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6996">**selected_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is selected</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6997">**disabled_id** Düğme devre dışı bırakıldığında kullanılacak pixelmap 'in kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6997">**disabled_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is disabled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6998">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6998">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-6999">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı, düğmeye pixelmap 'i ayarlar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-6999">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7001">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7001">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7002">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7002">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7003">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7003">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7004">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7004">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_button,
    NORMAL_ID, SELECTED_ID,
    DISABLED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button is properly configured with the specified pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7026">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7026">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7027">Piksel haritası oluşturma istemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7027">Create pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7028">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7028">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_pixelmap_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7029">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7029">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7030">Bu hizmet bir piksel haritası istemi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7030">This service creates a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7031">Piksel haritası istemi, piksel haritalarını GX_PROMPT istemin arka planını boyaması için standart bir komut isteminden farklıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7031">A pixelmap prompt differs from a standard GX_PROMPT in that it paints the background of the prompt using pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7032">Create işlevi bir piksel haritası kimliği, normal durum dolgusu piksel haritasını kabul eder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7032">The create function accepts one pixelmap id, the normal state fill pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7033">Piksel haritası istemine en fazla altı piksel haritası atanabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7033">Up to six pixelmaps may be assigned to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7034">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7034">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7035">**komut istemi** Pixelmap istem denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7035">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7036">**ad** Pixelmap istem pencere öğesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7036">**name** Logical name of pixelmap prompt widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7037">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7037">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7038">**text_id** Metnin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7038">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7039">**fill_id** Dolgunun kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7039">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7040">**Stil** Onay kutusunun stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7040">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7041">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7041">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7042">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Pixelmap isteminin uygulama tanımlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7042">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7043">**Boyut** Pixelmap isteminin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7043">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7044">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7044">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bir pixelmap istemi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7046">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7046">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7047">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7047">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7048">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7048">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7049">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7049">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7050">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7051">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7052">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7052">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_prompt”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_pixelmap_prompt,
    “my_pixelmap_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_LEFT_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_FILL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_RIGHT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt “my_pixelmap_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7068">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7068">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7069">Piksel haritası istemi çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7069">Draw pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7070">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7070">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7071">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7072">Bu hizmet bir piksel haritası istemi pencere öğesi çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7072">This service draws a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7073">Bu işlev normalde GUIX tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel piksel haritası istemi pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevlerini uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7073">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap prompt widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7074">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7074">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7075">**istemi** Piksel haritası denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7075">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7076">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7076">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7096">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7096">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7097">İsteyecek pixelmaps ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7097">Assign pixelmaps to prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7098">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7098">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_right_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_right_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7099">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7099">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7100">Bu hizmet, pixelmap kodlarını pixelmap istemine atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7100">This service assigns pixelmap ids to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7101">Sol, Fill ve Right pixelmap kimlikleri, uygulamanın çeşitli genişlikler için bir dizi pixelmaps kullanmasına izin vermek için kullanılır, ancak depolama gereksinimlerine kaydetmek için ortak bir yükseklik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7101">The left, fill, and right pixelmap ids are used to allow the application to use one set of pixelmaps for prompts of various widths but a common height to save on storage requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7102">Sol ve sağ kimlikler kullanılmıyorsa, bunlar 0 olarak ayarlanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7102">If the left and right IDs are not used, they should be set to 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7103">İstem, giriş odağını kazandığında kendisini farklı çizirse, bu amaçla seçili pixelmap kimlikleri kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7103">If the prompt should draw itself differently when it gains input focus, the selected pixelmap ids are used for that purpose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7104">Seçilen kimlikler kullanılmıyorsa veya normal kimlikler ile aynıysa, bunları 0 olarak ayarlayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7104">If the selected ids are not used or are the same as the normal ids, set them to 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7105">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7105">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7106">**komut istemi** Pixelmap istem denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7106">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7107">**normal_left_id** Normal durumun sol tarafında kullanılacak olan pixelmap 'in kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7107">**normal_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7108">**normal_fill_id** Normal durumda kutucuk dolgusu olarak kullanılacak piksel haritasının kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7108">**normal_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7109">**normal_right_id** Normal durumda sağ tarafta kullanılacak piksel haritasının kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7109">**normal_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7110">**selected_left_id** Seçilen durumda sol tarafta kullanılacak piksel haritasının kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7110">**selected_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7111">**selected_fill_id** Seçili durumda kutucuk dolgusu olarak kullanılacak piksel haritasının kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7111">**selected_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7112">**selected_right_id** Seçilen durumda sağ tarafta kullanılacak piksel haritasının kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7112">**selected_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the selected state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7113">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7113">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7114">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı, piksel haritasını istemine ayarlar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7114">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7115">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7115">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7116">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7116">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7117">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Kaynak Kimliği geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7117">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Resource ID not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7118">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7118">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7119">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7119">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7120">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7120">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign pixelmap IDs to “my_prompt”. Only the normal state pixelmaps are used in this case */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set (&my_prompt,
    normal_left_id, normal_fill_id,
    normal_right_id, 0, 0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt is properly configured with pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7142">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7142">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7143">Pixelmap kaydırıcı oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7143">Create pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7144">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7144">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixelmap_info, ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7145">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7145">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7146">Bu hizmet bir pixelmap kaydırıcı pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7146">This service creates a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7147">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7147">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7148">**kaydırıcı** Pixelmap kaydırıcı denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7148">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7149">**ad** Pixelmap kaydırıcı pencere öğesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7149">**name** Logical name of pixelmap slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7150">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7150">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7151">**bilgi** Kaydırıcı minimum değeri, en büyük değer, geçerli değer ve iğne limitlerini tanımlayan değerleri içeren GX_SLIDER_INFO yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7151">**info** Pointer to a GX_SLIDER_INFO structure which contains values defining the slider minimum value, maximum value, current value, and needle limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7152">**Ek ı** GX_SLIDER_INFO yapısı için tanım içeriyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7152">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7153">**pixelmap_info** Kaydırıcı arka planını ve iğne çizmek için kullanılan pixelmaps 'i tanımlayan GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7153">**pixelmap_info** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7154">**Ek I,** veri yapısı için GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7154">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7155">Kaydırıcı arka planı bir veya iki piksel haritası kullanabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7155">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7156">Varsa, iğne hareket ettiyse arka plan değişmez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7156">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7157">İki arka plan tanımlanmışsa, iğneden önceki arka plan ilk arka plan piksel haritasını, iğneden sonra gelen arka plan ikinci arka plan piksel haritasını kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7157">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7158">**style (stil)** Kaydırıcının stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7158">**style** Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7159">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7159">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7160">**pixelmap_slider_id** Piksel haritası kaydırıcının uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7160">**pixelmap_slider_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7161">**boyut** Piksel haritası isteminin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7161">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7162">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7162">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7163">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Piksel haritası kaydırıcısı başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7163">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7164">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7164">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7165">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7165">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7167">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7167">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7170">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7170">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate slider information structure. */
info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_max_tralvel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_pixelmap_slider”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider_create(&my_pixelmap_slider,
                            “my_pixelmap_slider”, &my_parent,
                            &info, &pixelmap_info,
                            GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                            MY_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider “my_pixelmap_slider” has been created. */
```

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7193">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7193">Description</span></span>
