## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7223">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7223">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7224">Piksel haritası kaydırıcı olayı işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7224">Process pixelmap slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7225">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7225">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7226">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7227">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pixelmap kaydırıcı pencere öğesi için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7227">This service processes an event for the specified pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7228">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7228">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7229">**kaydırıcı** Pixelmap işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7229">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7230">**kaydırıcı** denetimi olay işaretçisini işlenecek olaya engel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7230">**slider** control block event Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7231">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7231">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pixelmap kaydırıcı olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7233">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7233">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7236">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7236">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7237">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7237">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7238">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7238">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */
UINT my_event_hanlder(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                    event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                  event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7262">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7263">Bu hizmet piksel haritalarını piksel haritası kaydırıcısı olarak ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7263">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7264">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7264">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7265">**kaydırıcı** Piksel haritası kaydırıcısı denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7265">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7266">**pixinfo** Kaydırıcı arka planını GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO piksel haritalarını tanımlayan bir uygulama yapısına işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7266">**pixinfo** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7267">**Ek I,** veri yapısı için GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7267">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7268">Kaydırıcı arka planı bir veya iki piksel haritası kullanabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7268">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7269">Varsa, iğne hareket ettiyse arka plan değişmez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7269">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7270">İki arka plan tanımlanmışsa, iğneden önceki arka plan ilk arka plan piksel haritasını, iğneden sonra gelen arka plan ikinci arka plan piksel haritasını kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7270">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7271">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7271">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7272">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı, piksel haritasını kaydırıcıya ayarlar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7272">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7274">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7274">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7275">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7275">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7276">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7276">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7277">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7277">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider _pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_slider,
                                &pixelmap_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider is properly configured with “pixelmap_info”. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7299">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7299">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7300">İlerleme çubuğu arka planını çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7300">Draw progress bar background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7301">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7301">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7302">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7303">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ilerleme çubuğunun arka planını çiziyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7303">This service draws the background of the specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7304">Bu işlev, gx_progress_bar_draw() işlevinin bir parçası olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulamanın özel bir ilerleme çubuğu çizim işlevi tanımladığı bu örnekleri desteklemek için uygulamaya açık olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7304">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7305">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7306">**ilerleme çubuğu** İlerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7306">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7307">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7308">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7308">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7309">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7309">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7310">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7310">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7311">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7311">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7322">gx_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7322">gx_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7323">İlerleme çubuğu oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7323">Create a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7324">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7324">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_create(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *progress_bar_info,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT progress_bar_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7325">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7325">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7326">Bu hizmet bir ilerleme çubuğu pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7326">This service creates a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7327">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7327">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7328">**progress_bar** İlerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7328">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7329">**ad** Mantıksal ad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7329">**name** Logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7330">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7330">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7331">**progress_bar_info** GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7331">**progress_bar_info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7332">**Ek ı** GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO yapısı için tanım içeriyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7332">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7333">**Stil** İlerleme çubuğu stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7333">**style** Style of progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7334">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7334">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7335">**progress_bar_id** Uygulama tanımlı ilerleme çubuğu KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7335">**progress_bar_id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7336">**Boyut** İlerleme çubuğunun boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7336">**size** Dimensions of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7337">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7337">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7338">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ilerleme çubuğu oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7338">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7339">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7339">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7340">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7340">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7341">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7341">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7342">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7342">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7344">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7344">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7345">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7345">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7346">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7346">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

size.gx_rectangle_left = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_top = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_right = 110;
size.gx_rectangle_bottom = 140;

/* Create a progress bar with the specified information. */
status = gx_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar, GX_NULL, GX_NULL,
                        &info, GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN,
                        0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCSESS the progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been successfully created. */
```


## <a name="gx_progress_bar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7380">gx_progress_bar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7380">gx_progress_bar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7381">İlerleme durumu çubuğu olayını ilerleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7381">Progress a progress bar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7382">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7382">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_event_process(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7383">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7383">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7384">Bu hizmet bir ilerleme çubuğu olayını işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7384">This service processes a progress bar event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7385">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7385">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7386">**progress_bar** İlerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7386">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7387">**event_ptr** GX_EVENT yapısına yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7387">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7388">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7388">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7389">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı istem oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7389">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7390">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7390">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7391">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7391">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7392">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7392">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7393">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7394">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7394">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7395">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7395">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7431">gx_progress_bar_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7431">gx_progress_bar_info_set</span></span>

```C
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7434">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7434">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7435">Bu hizmet, bir ilerleme çubuğu pencere öğesinin bilgi yapısını sıfırlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7435">This service resets the information structure of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7436">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7436">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7437">**progress_bar** İlerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7437">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7438">**bilgi** GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7438">**info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7439">**Ek ı** GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO yapısı için tanım içeriyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7439">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7440">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7440">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7441">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ilerleme çubuğu bilgilerini başarıyla sıfırladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7441">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully reset progress bar info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7443">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7443">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7444">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7444">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7445">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7445">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7446">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7446">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

status = gx_progress_bar_info_set(&progress_bar, &info);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar info was re-assigned. */
```

```C
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7535">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7535">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7536">Çizim ilerleme çubuğu metni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7536">Draw progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7537">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7537">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7538">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7539">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ilerleme çubuğunun metnini çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7539">This service draws the text of specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7540">Bu işlev, gx_progress_bar_draw () bir parçası olarak dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulamanın özel bir ilerleme çubuğu çizim işlevini tanımladığı bu durumları desteklemek için uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7540">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7541">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7542">**ilerleme çubuğu** İlerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7542">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7543">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7544">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7544">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7545">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7546">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7546">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7547">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    INT value);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7584">gx_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7584">gx_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7585">İstem oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7585">Create prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7586">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7586">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_create(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7587">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7588">Bu hizmet bir istem pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7588">This service creates a prompt widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7589">GX_PROMPT, GX_WIDGET türetilen ve tüm gx_widget destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7589">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7590">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7590">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7591">**Üst** pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7591">**Pointer** to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7592">**text_id** İstem metninin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7592">**text_id** Resource ID of prompt text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7593">**Stil** İstem stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7593">**style** Style of prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7594">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7594">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7595">**prompt_id** Uygulama tanımlı istem KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7595">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7596">**Boyut** İstem boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7596">**size** Dimensions of prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7597">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7597">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7598">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı istem oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7598">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7601">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7601">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7602">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7602">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7603">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7604">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7604">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7605">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7605">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_create(&my_prompt, “my_promPt”, &my_parent,
                    MY_PROMPT_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PROPMT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the prompt “my_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7617">gx_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7617">gx_prompt_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7619">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7619">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7620">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7620">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7621">Bu hizmet bir istem pencere öğesi çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7621">This service draws a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7622">Bu hizmet tuval yenilemesi sırasında GUIX tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çizim işlevleri tarafından da çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7622">This service is called internally by GUIX during canvas refresh, but can also be called by custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7629">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7629">Example</span></span>

## <a name="gx_prompt_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7641">gx_prompt_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7641">gx_prompt_event_process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7643">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7643">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7644">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7644">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7645">Bu hizmet, belirtilen istem için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7645">This service processes an event for the specified prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7646">Bu hizmet, özel istem olayı işleme işlevleri tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7646">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom prompt event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7647">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7647">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7648">**komut istemi** İstem denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7648">**prompt** Pointer to prompt control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7653">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7653">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7654">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7654">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7656">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7656">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7657">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7657">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic prompt event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default prompt event processing */
        status = gx_prompt_event_process(prompt, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7696">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7696">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7697">İstem metni rengini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7697">Set prompt text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7698">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7698">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_color_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7699">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7699">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7700">Bu hizmet, bir istem pencere öğesinin metin rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7700">This service sets the text color of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7701">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7701">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7702">**komut istemi** İstem öğesi denetim bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7702">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7703">**normal_color** Normal metnin renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7703">**normal_color** Resource ID of color for normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7704">**Ek A** , önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7704">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7705">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7705">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7706">**selected_color** Seçili metin için rengin kaynak KIMLIĞI, pencere öğesi odaklanıldığında kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7706">**selected_color** Resource ID of color for selected text, used when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7707">**Ek A** , önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7707">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7708">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7708">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7709">**disabled_color** GX_STYLE_ENABLED etkin olmadığında kullanılan, devre dışı bırakılan metnin renk kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7709">**disabled_color** Resource ID of color for disabled text, used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7710">**Ek A** , önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7710">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7711">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7711">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7712">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7712">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7713">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı istem metin rengi kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7713">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7714">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7714">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7715">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7715">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7716">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) geçersiz pencere öğesi boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7716">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) Invalid widget size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7717">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7717">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7718">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7718">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7719">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7719">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text color of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_color_set(&my_prompt,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_BLACK,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_LIGHTGRAY,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color for prompt “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7731">gx_prompt_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7731">gx_prompt_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7732">Çizim destek işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7732">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7733">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7733">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_text_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7734">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7734">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7735">Bu destek işlevi, bir istemin metin bölümünü çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7735">This support function draws the text portion of a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7736">Bu işlev, gx_prompt_draw() tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır ve özel bir istem çizim işlevi tanımlayan uygulamalara kolaylık sağlamak için ayrı bir API olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7736">This function is called internally by gx_prompt_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom prompt drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7737">İstem arka plan çizimini özelleştirmek isteyen uygulamalar kendi özel çizim işlevini sağlar ve komut istemi metnini arka planda çizmek için özel çizimlerinin bir parçası olarak gx_prompt_text_draw hizmetini çağırabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7737">Applications that want to customize the prompt background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_prompt_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the prompt text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7738">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7738">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7739">**istemi** İstem denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7739">**prompt** Pointer to the prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7740">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7740">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7741">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7741">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7742">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7742">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7743">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7743">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7744">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7744">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* insert code here to draw prompt background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_prompt_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) prompt);
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7758">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7758">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7759">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7759">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7760">Bu hizmet gx_prompt_text_get_ext () kullanımı için kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7760">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7761">Bu hizmet bir istem pencere öğesinin metnini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7761">This service gets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7764">**return_text** Metin için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7764">**return_text** Pointer to destination for text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7765">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7765">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7767">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7767">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7836">gx_prompt_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7836">gx_prompt_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7837">İstem metnini ayarla (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7837">Set prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7838">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7838">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7839">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7839">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7840">Bu hizmet gx_prompt_text_set_ext () kullanım dışı bırakılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7840">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7841">Bu hizmet bir istem pencere öğesinin metnini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7841">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7842">İstem pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY ile oluşturulduysa pencere öğesi, atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7842">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7843">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz, bu nedenle dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani bu bir otomatik veya geçici değişken olmayabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7843">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7844">GX_PROMPT GX_WIDGET türetilir ve bu nedenle tüm gx_widget API hizmetleri GX_PROMPT ile kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7844">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7868">gx_prompt_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7868">gx_prompt_text_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7869">İstem metnini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7869">Set prompt text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7870">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7870">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set_ext(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7871">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7871">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7872">Bu hizmet, bir istem pencere öğesi metnini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7872">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7873">İstem pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, pencere öğesi atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7873">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7874">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz ve bu nedenle dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani otomatik veya geçici bir değişken olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7874">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7875">GX_PROMPT, GX_WIDGET türetilen ve bu nedenle gx_widget API hizmetlerinin hepsi GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7875">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7876">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7876">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7877">**komut istemi** İstem öğesi denetim bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7877">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7878">**metin** Metin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7878">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7879">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7879">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7880">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı istem metin kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7880">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7881">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7881">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7882">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7882">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7883">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) bellek ayırma işlevi tanımlı değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7883">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7884">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7884">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7885">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7885">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7886">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7886">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7887">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7887">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING new_string;
new_string.gx_string_ptr = “my_text”;
new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Set the text of “my_prompt” to “new_string”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7899">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7899">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7902">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7903">Bu hizmet radyal ilerleme çubuğu için başlangıç açısını ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7903">This service sets the starting angle for radial progress bar.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7906">**açı** Döngüsel yay başlangıç açısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7906">**angle** Starting angle of the circular arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7907">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7907">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7908">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı radyal ilerleme çubuğu sabit noktası kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7908">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar anchor set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7909">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7909">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7912">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7912">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Set the start angle of “my_progress_bar” to 90 degree. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7925">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7925">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7926">Arka plan çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7926">Draw background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7927">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7927">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7928">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7928">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7929">Bu hizmet bir radyal ilerleme çubuğu arka planı çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7929">This service draws a radial progress bar background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7930">Bu hizmete gx_radial_progress_bar_draw işlevi tarafından dahili olarak başvuruluyor, ancak uygulamanın özel bir radyal ilerleme çubuğu çizim işlevini tanımladığı durumlarda uygulama tarafından kullanıma sunuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7930">This service is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7931">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7931">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7932">**ilerleme çubuğu** Radyal ilerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7932">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7933">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7933">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7934">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7934">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7935">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7935">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7936">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7936">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7937">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7937">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar background draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7948">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7948">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7949">Radyal ilerleme çubuğu oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7949">Create radial progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7950">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7950">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_create(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info,
    ULONG style
    USHORT id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7951">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7951">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7952">Bu hizmet bir radyal ilerleme çubuğu oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7952">This service creates a radial progress bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7953">Pencere öğesi stili GX_STYLE_ENABLED ilerleme çubuğuna uygulanmışsa, ilerleme çubuğu geçerli değeri değiştirmek için pen_down, pen_drag ve pen_up girişi kabul eder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7953">If the widget style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is applied to the progress bar, the progress bar will accept pen_down, pen_drag, and pen_up input to modify the progress bar current value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7954">GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW pencere öğesi stili, ilerleme çubuğu değerini ilerleme çubuğu alanı içinde metin olarak çizmeyi etkinleştirmek için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7954">The widget style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW can be used to enable drawing the progress bar value as text within the progress bar area.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7955">Bu stil GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT stille birlikte kullanılırsa, ilerleme çubuğu değeri yüzde olarak görüntülenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7955">If this style is used in combination with the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, the progress bar value is displayed as a percentage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7956">Aksi takdirde ilerleme çubuğu değeri geçerli angular değer olarak görüntülenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7956">Otherwise the progress bar value is displayed as the current angular value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7964">**style (stil)** Radyal ilerleme çubuğu stili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7964">**style** Style of radial progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7974">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7974">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Create a radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar,
                    “my_progress_bar”, parent, &info,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT |
                    GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW,
                    ID_MY_RADIAL_PROGRESS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7988">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7988">Description</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-7997">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-7997">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8025">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
        case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8068">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8068">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8070">**info (bilgi)** Radyal ilerleme çubuğu bilgi yapısının işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8070">**info** Pointer to radial progress bar information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8071">**Ek I,** veri yapısı için GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8071">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8072">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8072">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8073">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı radyal ilerleme çubuğu bilgi kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8073">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8074">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8074">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8075">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8075">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8076">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8076">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8077">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8077">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8078">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8078">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8079">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8079">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Set appearance information for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(&my_progress_bar, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the appearance information of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8125">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8125">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8126">Radyal ilerleme çubuğu metni çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8126">Draw radial progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8127">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8128">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8129">Bu hizmet, belirtilen radyal ilerleme çubuğunun metnini çiziyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8129">This service draws the text of specified radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8130">Bu işlev, gx_radial_progress_bar_draw() işlevinin bir parçası olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulamanın özel bir ilerleme çubuğu çizim işlevi tanımladığı bu örnekleri desteklemek için uygulamaya açık olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8130">This function is called internally as part of the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8131">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8131">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8132">**ilerleme çubuğu** Radyal ilerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8132">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8133">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8134">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8134">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8135">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8135">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8136">Başlatma ve İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8136">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8137">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8137">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw (&my_progress_bar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_progress_bar” has been drawn. */

/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */
VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default radial progress bar text draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8148">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8148">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8149">Radyal ilerleme çubuğu değerini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8149">Set radial progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8150">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8150">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8151">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8151">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8152">Bu hizmet radyal ilerleme çubuğu değerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8152">This service sets radial progress bar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8153">Atanan değer [-360, 360] aralığıyla sınırlıdır ve ilerleme çubuğu geçerli konumu için olası angular değer aralığını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8153">The assigned value is limited to the range [-360, 360], defining the possible range of angular values for the progress bar current location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8154">Uygulamanın, ilerleme çubuğu pencere öğesine angular değer atamak için gösterilen gerçek dünya değerini ölçeklendirmesi gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8154">The application must scale the real-world value being indicated to assign an angular value to the progress bar widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8155">İlerleme çubuğu, geçerli değerin yer işareti konumu ile üst yay bitiş noktası arasındaki angular deltayı işaret eden şekilde çizilir. Negatif değerler, yaynın sabit noktası konumundan başlayarak saat yönünde çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8155">The progress bar is drawn such that the current value indicates the angular delta between the anchor position and the end point of the upper arc. Negative values cause the arc to be drawn in a clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8156">Pozitif geçerli değer, yayın sabit noktası konumundan başlayarak saat yönünün tersine doğru çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8156">Positive current value causes the arc to be drawn in a counter-clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8157">Örneğin, yay üst kısmından başlayarak (saat 12 o'saat konumu) ve sağdan (üç o'clock konumu) biten bir yay çizmek için, 90 derece sabit noktası değeri ve geçerli bir -90 derece değeri atatın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8157">For example, to draw an arc starting at the top of the arc (12 o’clock position) and ending at the right (three o’clock position), assign an anchor value of 90 degrees and a current value of -90 degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8158">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8158">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8159">**ilerleme** çubuğu Radyal ilerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8159">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8160">**value (değer)** Yeni ilerleme çubuğu değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8160">**value** New progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8161">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8161">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8162">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı radyal ilerleme çubuğu değer kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8162">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8163">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8163">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8164">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçiler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8164">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8165">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8165">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8166">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8166">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8167">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8167">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8168">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8168">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE new_value = 180;

/* Set value for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(&my_progress_bar,
                                        new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8179">gx_radio_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8179">gx_radio_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8180">Radyo düğmesi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8180">Create radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8181">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8181">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_create(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, ULONG style,
    USHORT radio_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8182">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8182">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8183">Bu hizmet bir radyo düğmesi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8183">This service creates a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8184">GX_RADIO_BUTTON GX_TEXT_BUTTON türetilir ve bu nedenle tüm gx_text_button hizmetleri de bu pencere öğesi türü tarafından desteklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8184">GX_RADIO_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and therefore all gx_text_button services are also supported by this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8185">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8185">Parameters</span></span>
