- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8187">**ad** Radyo düğmesi pencere öğesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8187">**name** Logical name of radio button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8188">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8188">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8189">**text_id** Radyo düğmesinin Kaynak Kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8189">**text_id** Resource ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8190">**style (stil)** Radyo düğmesinin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8190">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8191">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8191">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8192">**radio_button_id** Radyo düğmesinin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8192">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8193">**boyut** Radyo düğmesinin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8193">**size** Dimensions of radio button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8194">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8194">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı radyo düğmesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radio_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8219">gx_radio_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8219">gx_radio_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8220">Çizim radyo düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8220">Draw radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8221">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8222">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8223">Bu hizmet bir radyo düğmesi pencere öğesi çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8223">This service draws a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8224">Bu hizmet, Gux tuvali yenilemesi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak geçersiz kılınan çizim işlevleri tarafından çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8224">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8225">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8225">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8226">**düğme** Radyo düğmesi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8226">**button** Pointer to radio button widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8227">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8228">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8228">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8229">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8229">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8230">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8230">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8231">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8231">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radio button drawing function. */

VOID my_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *radio_button)
{
    /* Call default radio button draw. */
    gx_radio_button_draw(radio_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radio_button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8246">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8246">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8247">Radyo düğmesi için piksel haritalarını ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8247">Set pixelmaps for radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8248">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8248">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_disabled_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8249">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8249">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8250">Bu hizmet, her düğme durumu için belirtilen radyo düğmesi tarafından görüntülenecek piksel haritalarını atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8250">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified radio button for each button state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8251">Kaynak kimlikleri çoğaltılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8251">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8252">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8252">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8253">**off_id** Radyo düğmesi kapalı durumu için kullanılan piksel haritası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8253">**off_id** Pixelmap used for radio button off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8254">**on_id** Durumla ilgili radyo düğmesi için kullanılan piksel haritası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8254">**on_id** Pixelmap used for radio button on state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8255">**off_disabled_id** Radyo düğmesi devre dışı ve kapalı durum için kullanılan piksel haritası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8255">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8256">**on_disabled_id** Radyo düğmesi devre dışı ve durum için kullanılan Piksel Haritası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8256">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and on state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8257">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8257">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı radyo düğmesi piksel haritaları kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button pixelmaps set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8261">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8261">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8262">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8262">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8263">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8263">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8264">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8264">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(&my_radio_button,
                                MY_OFF_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_OFF_DISABLED_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_DISABLED_PIXELMAP);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps for radio button “my_radio_button” has been set. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8296">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8296">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE anchor_angles[]={0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180};
USHORT anchor_count = 7;

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                anchor_angles, anchor_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been set for “my_radial_slider”. */

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                GX_NULL, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been removed from “my_radial_slider”. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8307">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8307">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8309">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8309">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_angle_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE new_angle);
```

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8311">Bu hizmet radyal kaydırıcı için yeni açı değeri ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8311">This service sets new angle value for radial slider.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8333">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8333">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8334">Radyal kaydırıcı animasyon bilgisi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8334">Create radial slider animation info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8335">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8335">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    USHORT steps, USHORT delay, 
    USHORT animation_style,
    VOID (*animation_update_callback)(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8336">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8336">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8337">Bu hizmet, radyal kaydırıcı iğne animasyonu için animasyon adımlarını, gecikme süresini ve animasyon stillerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8337">This service sets animation steps, delay time and animation styles for radial slider needle animation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8340">**adımlar** Bir animasyon için toplam adım sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8340">**steps** Total steps for one animation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8341">**gecikme süresi** Her animasyon adımı için gecikme süresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8341">**delay** Delay time for each animation step</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8342">**animation_style** Easing işlev türü, şunları içerir:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8342">**animation_style** Easing function type, includes:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8343">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8343">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8344">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8344">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8345">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8345">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8346">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8346">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8347">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8347">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8348">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8348">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8349">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8349">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8350">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8350">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8351">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8351">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8352">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8352">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8353">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8353">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8354">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8354">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8355">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8355">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8356">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8356">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8357">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8357">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8358">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8358">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8359">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8359">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8360">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8360">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8361">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8361">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8362">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8362">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8363">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8363">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8364">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8364">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8365">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8365">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8366">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8366">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8367">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8367">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8368">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8368">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8369">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8369">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8370">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8370">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8371">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8371">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8372">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8372">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8373">**animation_update_callback** Her animasyon adımından sonra çağrılacak Kullanıcı tanımlı geri çağırma işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8373">**animation_update_callback** User-defined callback function that will be called after each animation step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8374">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8374">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8375">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı radyal kaydırıcı animasyon kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8375">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider animation set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8376">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8376">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8379">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8379">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8380">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8380">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8381">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8381">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID animation_callback(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* This function will be called after each animation step,
    add custom code here. */
}

/* Set animation info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 15, 2,
                                GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT,
                                animation_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move with specified animation. */

/* Disable animation for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 0, 0,
                                        0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move without animation. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8418">gx_radial_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8418">gx_radial_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8419">Radyal kaydırıcı oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8419">Create radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8420">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8420">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_create(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT slider_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8421">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8421">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8422">Bu hizmet bir radyal kaydırıcı pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8422">This service creates a radial slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8423">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8423">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8424">**kaydırıcı** Radyal kaydırıcı denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8424">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8425">**ad** Radyal kaydırıcı pencere öğesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8425">**name** Logical name of radial slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8426">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8426">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8427">**bilgi** Radyal kaydırıcı görünüm tanımı, **ek i** GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO tanım içeriyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8427">**info** Radial slider appearance definition, **Appendix I** contains definition to GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8428">**Stil** Radyo düğmesinin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8428">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8429">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8429">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8430">**radio_button_id** Radyal kaydırıcının uygulama tanımlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8430">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radial slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8431">**Boyut** Radyal kaydırıcı boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8431">**size** Dimensions of radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8432">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8432">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı radyal kaydırıcı oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8434">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8434">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8435">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8435">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8436">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8436">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8437">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8437">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8438">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz üst pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8438">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8439">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8439">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8440">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8440">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8441">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8441">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 200, 200);

/* Create “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_create(&my_radial_slider,
                                “my_radial_slider”, &my_parent,
                                &info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                MY_RADIAL_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider “my_radial_slider” has been created. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8492">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8492">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
                    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8543">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8543">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Reset radial slider info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_set(&my_radial_slider, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider info of “my_radial_slider” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8581">gx_rich_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8581">gx_rich_text_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8582">Zengin metin görünümü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8582">Create a rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8583">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8583">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_rich_text_view_create(
    GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS *fonts,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8584">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8584">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8585">Bu hizmet, belirtilen şekilde zengin metin görünümü oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8585">This service creates a rich text view as specified.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8586">**Biçimlendirme etiketleri metin için özel türleri göstermek için kullanılır:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8586">**Formatting tags are used to display special types for text:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8587">**\<b>\</b>** Metin yazı tipini Kullanıcı tarafından belirtilen kalın yazı tipi kimliğiyle ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8587">**\<b>\</b>** Set text font with user specified bold font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8588">**\<i>\</i>** Metin yazı tipini Kullanıcı tarafından belirtilen italik yazı tipi kimliğiyle ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8588">**\<i>\</i>** Set text font with user specified italic font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8589">**\<u>\</u>** Metin alt çizgisini etkinleştirme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8589">**\<u>\</u>** Enable text underline</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8590">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Belirtilen yazı tipi kimliğiyle metin yazı tipini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8590">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Set text font with specified font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8591">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Belirtilen renk kimliğiyle metin yazı tipini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8591">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Set text font with specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8592">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Metin vurgulama rengini belirtilen renk kimliğini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8592">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Set text highlight color specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8593">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Metin hizalamasını ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8593">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Set text alignment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8594">**Etiket kullanımını biçimlendirme örnekleri:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8594">**Examples of formatting tag usage:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8595">\<b>Bu kalın metin<\b></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8595">\<b>This is bold text<\b></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8596">\<i>Bu, italik metin<\i></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8596">\<i>This is italic text<\i></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8597">\<u>Bu metin,<\u></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8597">\<u>This is text with underline<\u></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8598">\<f 0>Bu metin yazı tipi kimliği 0<\f olarak></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8598">\<f 0>This text font id is set to 0<\f></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8599">\<c 1>Bu metin rengi kimliği 1<\c></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8599">\<c 1>This text color id is set to 1<\c></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8600">\<hc 2>Bu metin vurgulama renk kimliği 2<\hc></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8600">\<hc 2>This text highlight color id is set to 2<\hc></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8601">\<align left> Bu metin,<\align></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8601">\<align left> This text is left aligned<\align></span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8602">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8602">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8603">**text_view** Zengin metin görünümü denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8603">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8604">**name** Zengin metin görünümünün adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8604">**name** Name of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8605">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8605">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8606">**text_id** Metin dizesinin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8606">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8607">**yazı tipleri** Zengin metin görünümü yazı tipi bilgileri işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8607">**fonts** Pointer to the rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8608">**Apendix I,** bir GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8608">**Apendix I** contains definition to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8609">**style (stil)** Pencere öğesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8609">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8610">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8610">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8611">zengin metin görünümünün **kimlik** uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8611">**id** Application-defined ID of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8612">**Boyut** Zengin metin görünümü boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8612">**size** Size of the rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8613">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8613">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı zengin metin görünümü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8615">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8615">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8617">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8617">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8618">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8618">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8619">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8619">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8620">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8620">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8621">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8621">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW rich_view;
GX_RCIH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Defined widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

/* Define font information. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Create rich text view widget. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_create(&rich_view, “my_rich_view”,
                                  parent, GX_STRING_ID_TEST_STRING,
                                  &fonts,
                                  GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_RICH_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rich text view was successfully created. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8622">GUX Studio yüklemesinin bir parçası olarak sağlanan demo uygulaması demo_guix_widget_types, zengin metin görünümü pencere öğesini kullanma hakkında ayrıntılı bir örnek sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8622">The demo application demo_guix_widget_types, provided as part of the GUIX Studio installation, provides a complete example of using the rich text view widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8628">Zengin metin görünümü çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8628">Draw rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8629">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8629">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8630">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8630">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8631">Bu hizmet, belirtilen zengin metin görünümü pencere öğesini çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8631">This service draws the specified rich text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8632">Bu hizmet, genellikle bir tuval yenileme işleminin parçası olarak Gux tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel bir çizim işlevi sağlamak ve varsayılan zengin metin görünümü çizimini özel çizim temeli olarak çağırmak isteyebileceğiniz uygulamaya de sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8632">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default rich text view drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8633">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8633">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8634">**text_view** Zengin metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8634">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8635">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8635">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8636">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8636">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8637">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8638">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8638">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8639">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8639">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Call default rich text view draw. */
    gx_rich_text_view_draw(text_view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;

/* Replace the font ids as needed. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Set the font of “my_rich_view”. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set(&my_rich_view, &fonts);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font for rich text view “my_rich_view” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8665">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8665">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8666">Zengin metin görünümü metni çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8666">Draw rich text view text</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_text_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8668">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8668">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8669">Bu destek işlevi bir zengin metin görünümünün metin bölümünü çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8669">This support function draws the text portion of a rich text view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8670">Bu işlev, gx_rich_text_view_draw () tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır ve özel bir zengin metin görünümü çizim işlevi tanımlayan uygulamalar için kolaylık olarak ayrı bir API olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8670">This function is called internally by gx_rich_text_view_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom rich text view drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8671">Zengin metin görünümü arka plan çizimini özelleştirmek isteyen uygulamalar özel çizim işlevlerini sağlayabilir ve zengin metin görünümü metnini arka plan üzerine çizmek için gx_rich_text_view_text_draw hizmetini özel çiziminin bir parçası olarak çağırabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8671">Applications that want to customize the rich text view background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_rich_text_view_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the rich text view text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8672">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8672">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8673">**text_view** Zengin metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8673">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8674">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8674">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8675">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8675">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8676">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8676">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8678">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8678">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw rich text view background. */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing. */
    gx_rich_text_view_text_draw();

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) rich_text_view);
}
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8683">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8683">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8684">Ekran yığını başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8684">Initialize a screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8685">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8685">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_create(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET **memory_buffer, 
    INT buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8686">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8686">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8687">Bu hizmet bir ekran yığınını başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8687">This service initializes a screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8688">Uygulamanın, ekran yığını özelliğini uygulamak için kullanılan bellek bloğunu ve arabellek boyutunu tanımlamanız gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8688">The application must define the memory block and buffer size used to implement the screen stack feature.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8689">*Bu API kullanım dışı bırakılmış ve gx_system_screen_stack_create () ile değiştirilmiştir. Bu sürüm yalnızca önceki kitaplık sürümleriyle geriye dönük uyumluluk için sağlanır.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8689">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_create(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8690">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8690">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8691">**Denetim** Ekran yığını denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8691">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8692">**memory_buffer** Ekran yığını olarak kullanılan bir bellek arabelleği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8692">**memory_buffer** Pointer to a memory buffer that used as a screen stack</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8693">**Buffer_size** Bayt cinsinden bellek boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8693">**buffer_size** Memory size in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8694">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8694">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8695">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ekran yığını oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8695">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8696">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8696">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8697">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz arabellek boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8697">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8698">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8698">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8699">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8699">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8700">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8700">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_SIZE 10

GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL my_stack_control;
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_SIZE];

/* Initialize “my_stack_control”. */
status = gx_screen_stack_create(&my_stack_control, screen_stack,
                        SCREEN_STACK_SIZE * sizeof(GX_WIDGET *));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen control block “my_stack control” has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8705">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8705">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8706">Ekran yığınından en üstteki girişi kaldırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8706">Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8707">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8707">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_pop(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8708">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8708">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8709">Bu hizmet, ekran yığınından en üstteki girişi kaldırır ve ekranı önceki üst öğeye iliştirer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8709">This service removes the topmost entry from the screen stack, and attaches the popped screen to its previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8710">Bu API ayrıca var olan tüm altları üst öğeden ayırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8710">This API also detaches any existing children from the parent.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8711">*Bu API artık kullanılmıyor ve gx_system_screen_stack_pop() ile değiştirildi. Bu sürüm yalnızca önceki kitaplık sürümleriyle geriye dönük uyumluluk için sağlanır.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8711">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8712">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8712">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8713">**denetim** Ekran yığını denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8713">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8714">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8714">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8715">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı ekran yığını pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8715">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8716">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8716">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8717">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8717">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8718">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8718">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8719">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8719">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8720">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8720">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack. */
status = gx_screen_stack_pop(&my_stack_control);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the topmost entry has been removed from the screen stack, 
    and the popped screen has been attached to its parent. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8724">gx_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8724">gx_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8725">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8725">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8726">Anında görüntü ekranı ve üstleri yığına</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8726">Push screen and its parents to stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8727">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8727">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_push(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET *screen,
    GX_WIDGET *new_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8728">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8729">Bu hizmet ekranı üst öğesinden ayırır ve ekran işaretçisini ve üst işaretçiyi ekran yığınına iletir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8729">This service detaches screen from its parent, and pushes the screen pointer and the parent pointer onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8730">Yeni ekran işaretçisi daha sonra üst öğeye eklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8730">The new screen pointer is then attached to the parent.</span></span>


> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8731">*Bu API kullanım dışı bırakılmış ve gx_system_screen_stack_pop () ile değiştirilmiştir. Bu sürüm yalnızca önceki kitaplık sürümleriyle geriye dönük uyumluluk için sağlanır.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8731">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8732">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8732">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8733">**Denetim** Ekran yığını denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8733">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8734">**ekran** Gönderim için ekran işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8734">**screen** Screen pointer to push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8735">**new_screen** Yeni ekranın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8735">**new_screen** Pointer of the new screen</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8736">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8736">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8737">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ekran yığını gönderimi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8737">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8738">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8738">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8739">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8739">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8740">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8740">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8741">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8741">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8742">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8742">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Push “screen” and its parent to screen stack, Dettach “screen” from its parent, and attach “new screen” to the parent. */
status = gx_screen_stack_push(&my_stack_control,
                                screen, new_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “screen” and its parent have been pushed to screen stack, “screen” has been detached from its parent, “new_screen” has been attached to the parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8747">gx_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8747">gx_screen_stack_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8748">Tüm girişleri ekran yığınından kaldırır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8748">Removes all entries from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8749">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8749">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_reset(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8780">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8780">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8781">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8781">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8782">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8782">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8806">İşlem kaydırma parmak izi olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8806">Process scroll thumb event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8807">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8807">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8808">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8808">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8809">Bu hizmet, bir ScrollBar parmak tekerinin gönderdiği olayları işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8809">This service handles events sent to a scrollbar thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8810">Bu hizmet normalde Gux tarafından dahili olarak kullanılır, ancak özel kaydırma çubuğu davranışları uygulamaya yardımcı olmak için genel kullanıma açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8810">This service is normally used internally by GUIX, but is made public to assist with implementing custom scrollbar behaviors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8811">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8812">**scroll_thumb** Kaydırma kutusu pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8812">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8813">**olay** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8813">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8814">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8814">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı kaydırma parmak izi olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8819">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8820">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8821">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8821">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8825">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8825">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8826">Temel kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8826">Create a base scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8827">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8827">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_create( 
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8828">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8828">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8829">Bu hizmet bir temel kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8829">This service creates a base scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8830">Temel kaydırma tekerleği, gx_numeric_scroll_wheel ve gx_string_ scroll_wheel pencere öğelerinin temeli olan **gx_generic_scroll_wheel** ve **gx_text_scroll_wheel** dahil  olmak üzere tüm kaydırma gx_numeric_scroll_wheel **temel pencere öğesidir.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8830">A base scroll wheel is the base widget for all scroll wheel widget types, including the **gx_generic_scroll_wheel** and **gx_text_scroll_wheel** which is the base for **gx_numeric_scroll_wheel** and **gx_string_ scroll_wheel** widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8831">Temel kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi, tüm kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türleri için olay işleme, kaydırma animasyonu ve seçili satır hesaplaması sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8831">The base scroll wheel widget provides event handling, scrolling animation, and selected row calculation for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8832">Bu pencere öğesi türü hiçbir çizim işlevi sağladığından uygulamalar normalde genel kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi örneği oluşturmaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8832">Applications would not normally create an instance of a generic scroll wheel widget, since this widget type provides no drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8833">Ancak özel kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türü oluşturması gereken uygulamalara yardımcı olmak için bu API'ye erişim sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8833">However access to this API is provided to assist applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8834">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL, GX_WINDOW tabanlıdır ve bu nedenle tüm GX_WINDOW API'leri, GX_SCROLL_WHEEL'den türetilen pencere öğeleriyle GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8834">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL is based on GX_WINDOW, and therefore all GX_WINDOW APIs may be used with GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and widgets derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8835">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8835">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8836">**wheel (tekerlek)** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8836">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8837">**name** Uygulama tarafından atanan pencere öğesi adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8837">**name** Application assigned widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8838">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi veya GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8838">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8852">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8852">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic create function during custom widget createl. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_create(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
                    GX_WIDGET *parent,
                    INT total_rows, ULONG style,
                    USHORT id,
                    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* create base widget as part of custom create */
    status = gx_scroll_wheel_create(wheel, name, parent,
                            total_rows, style, id, size);

    /* If status is GX_SUCCESS the base scroll wheel has been created. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8872">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8872">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8873">Genel kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi için olay işleme işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8873">Event processing function for generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8874">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8874">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8875">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8875">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8876">Bu hizmet, tüm kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türleri için temel giriş olay işlemesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8876">This service provides the basic input event handling for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8877">Bu işlev, özel bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türü oluşturması gereken uygulamalara yardımcı olmak için uygulama yazılımına açık olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8877">This function is exposed to the application software to assist with applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8878">Uygulamalar genellikle kendi olay işleme işlevini sağlar, ancak özelleştirmeleri gerek olmayan olaylar için tekerlek pencere öğeleri için genel olay işlemeyi çağırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8878">Applications would often provide their own event processing function, but invoke the generic event processing for wheel widgets for events that they do not need to customize.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8879">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8879">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8880">**wheel (tekerlek)** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8880">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8881">**event (olay)** GX_EVENT işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8881">**event** GX_EVENT pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8882">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8882">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8883">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarıyla kaydırma tekerleği olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8883">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8884">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8884">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8885">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8885">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8886">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8886">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8887">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8887">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8888">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8888">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8889">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8889">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic scroll wheel event processing 
    as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_event_process(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
        gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8909">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8909">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8910">İsteğe bağlı kaplama gradyanı için gradyan alfa değerleri atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8910">Assign gradient alpha values for optional overlay gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8911">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8911">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha,
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8912">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8912">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8913">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesinin isteğe bağlı gradyan kaplaması için başlangıç ve bitiş Alfa değerlerini tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8913">This service defines the starting and ending alpha values for an optional gradient overlay of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8914">Tüm kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğeleri, kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesinin üst ve alt kenarının yakınında bulunan satırlar olarak kaydırma tekerleği satırlarının "belirme" efektini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8914">All scroll wheel widgets support a “fade” effect of the scroll wheel rows as the rows near the top and bottom edge of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8915">Bu geçişli efekt, kaydırma tekerleği satırları üzerinde bir gradyan pixelmap çizerek, satırlar, kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesinin üst ve alt kısmına yakın bir şekilde çizilerek satırları soluklaştırmak üzere çizerek gerçekleştirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8915">This fade effect is accomplished by drawing a gradient pixelmap over the scroll wheel rows, which make the rows appear to fade out as the rows are drawn near the top and bottom of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8916">Bu API hizmeti, uygulamanın soluk etki yoğunluğunu değiştirmesini veya başlangıç ve bitiş alfa değerlerini 0 olarak ayararak bu etkiyi tamamen devre dışı bırakmasını sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8916">This API service allows the application to modify the fading effect intensity, or disable this effect entirely by setting the start and end alpha values to 0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8917">Kaydırma tekerleği başlangıçta görünür hale geldiğinde çalışma zamanında gradyan piksel haritası oluşturulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8917">The gradient pixelmap is created at runtime when the scroll wheel initially becomes visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8918">Bunun için bir çalışma zamanı bellek ayırma hizmetinin _gx_system_memory_allocator_set() gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8918">This requires that a runtime memory allocation service has been defined using _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8919">Hiçbir bellek yalıtıcı işlevi tanımlanmamışsa gradyan görüntü oluşturulmaz ve hiçbir soldurma etkisi kullanılamaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8919">If no memory allocator function has been defined, the gradient image will not be created and no fade effect will be available.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8920">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8920">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8921">**wheel (tekerlek)** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8921">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8922">**start_alpha** Katman gradyan başlangıç alfa değeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8922">**start_alpha** The overlay gradient starting alpha value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8923">**end_alpha** Katman gradyan bitişi alfa değeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8923">**end_alpha** The overlay gradient ending alpha value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8924">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8924">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8925">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Kaydırma tekerleği gradyan alfayı başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8925">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the scroll wheel gradient alpha</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8926">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8926">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8927">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8927">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
