## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8951">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8951">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8952">Her bir tekerlek satırı için satır yüksekliğini ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8952">Assign the row height for each wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8953">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8953">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_VALUE row_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8954">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8954">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8955">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleğinin her bir satırı için satır yüksekliğini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8955">This service assigns the row height for each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8956">Kaydırma tekerleğinin stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND varsa, satır yüksekliği, ekranın üst veya alt kenarına yaklaştığında satır yüksekliğini etkin bir şekilde azaltacak bir dönüşümden geçer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8956">Note that if the scroll wheel has style GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, the row height passes through a transform which effectively reduces the row height as the row nears the top or bottom edge of the wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8957">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8957">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8958">**tekerlek** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8958">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8959">**row_height** Piksel cinsinden satır yüksekliği değeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8959">**row_height** Row height value, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8960">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8960">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kaydırma tekerleği yüksekliğini başarıyla ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8965">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8966">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8966">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8967">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8967">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(&wheel, 40);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel row height has been set to 40
pixels. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8987">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8987">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8988">Tekerlek seçili satırı için arka plan görüntüsü ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8988">Assign background image for wheel selected row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8989">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8989">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL*wheel, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID image_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8990">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8990">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8991">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleğinin seçili satırının arkasında çizilen isteğe bağlı bir pixelmap KIMLIĞI atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8991">This service assigns an optional pixelmap ID that is drawn behind the selected row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8992">Bu, kullanıcının kaydırma tekerleğinin hangi satırının seçili olduğunu kolayca ayırabilmesi için seçili satırı vurgulamak üzere kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8992">This can be used to highlight the selected row so that the user can easily distinguish which row of the scroll wheel is selected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8993">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8993">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8994">**tekerlek** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8994">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8995">**image_id** Seçilen satır arka plan görüntüsü olarak kullanılacak pixelmap KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8995">**image_id** Pixelmap ID to use as the selected row background image.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8996">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8997">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kaydırma tekerleği arka planını başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8997">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel background</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8998">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8998">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-8999">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-8999">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9000">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9000">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9001">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9001">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9002">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9002">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9003">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9003">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(&wheel,
GX_PIXELMAP_ID_SELECTED_ROW);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the background image has been
assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9023">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9023">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9024">Seçili olan tekerlek satırı alma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9024">Retrieve the currently selected wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9025">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9025">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT *row);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9034">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9034">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9059">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9059">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9061">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9061">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9062">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9062">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9063">Bu hizmet, seçili kaydırma tekerleği satırına atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9063">This service assigns the currently selected scroll wheel row.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9064">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9064">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9065">**wheel (tekerlek)** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9065">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9067">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9067">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9068">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Seçilen tekerlek satırı başarıyla ayarlanır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9068">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9069">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9069">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9070">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9070">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9071">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9071">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9094">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9094">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9095">Kaydırma hızı ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9095">Assign scrolling speed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9096">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_FIXED_VAL start_speed_rate,
    GX_FIXED_VAL end_speed_rate,
    GX_VALUE max_steps,
    GX_VALUE delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9097">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9098">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi için kaydırma hızını atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9098">This service assigns the scrolling speed for the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9099">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9099">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9100">**tekerlek** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9100">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9101">**start_speed_rate** Hızlı hareket hızını kaydırma hızı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9101">**start_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling start speed to flick speed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9102">**end_speed_rate** Hareket hızına yönelik kaydırma bitiş hızı oranı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9102">**end_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling end speed to flick speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9103">**max_steps** Kaydırma için en fazla adım.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9103">**max_steps** Max steps for scrolling.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9104">**gecikme** Her adımın gecikme süresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9104">**delay** Delay time of each step.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9105">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9105">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9106">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) tekerlek hızını başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9106">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set wheel speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9108">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9108">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9109">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9109">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9110">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Geçersiz değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9110">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9111">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9111">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9112">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9112">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9113">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9113">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(&wheel, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(2),
                                GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2, 10, 2);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel speed has been
successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9133">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9133">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9134">Kullanılabilir toplam kaydırma tekerleği satırını ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9134">Assign the total scroll wheel rows available</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9135">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9135">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT total_rows);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9136">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9136">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9137">Bu hizmet, belirtilen kaydırma tekerleğindeki kullanılabilir satır sayısını atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9137">This service assigns the number of rows available in the indicated scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9138">Kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi genellikle, bir dize dizisi veya Kullanıcı tarafından sağlanan dize verileri biçiminde uygulamadan alınan satır içeriğini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9138">The scroll wheel widget usually receives the row content from the application in the form of an array of strings or user supplied string data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9139">Bu API, kullanıcıya sunulması gereken toplam satır sayısının kaydırma tekerleğini bilgilendirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9139">This API informs the scroll wheel of the total number of rows that should be presented to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9140">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9140">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9141">**tekerlek** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9141">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9142">**total_rows** Kullanıcıya sunmak için toplam tekerlek satırı sayısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9142">**total_rows** Total number of wheel rows to present to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9143">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9143">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9144">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kaydırma tekerleği toplam satırını başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9144">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9145">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9145">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9146">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9146">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9147">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9147">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9148">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9148">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9149">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9149">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9150">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9150">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9151">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9151">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 100);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel has been changed to
display 100 total rows */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9170">gx_scrollbar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9170">gx_scrollbar_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9172">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9172">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9173">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9173">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9174">Bu hizmet bir kaydırma çubuğu çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9174">This service draws a scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9175">Hem dikey hem de yatay kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğeleri için ortak bir çizim işlevi kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9175">A common drawing function is used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9176">Bu hizmet GUIX tuval yenilemesi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak geçersiz kılma çizim işlevleri tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9176">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9177">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9177">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9178">**kaydırma çubuğu** Çizilen kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9178">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9179">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9179">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9180">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9180">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9181">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9181">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9182">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9182">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9183">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9183">Example</span></span>

```C

{
    /* Call default scrollbar draw. */
    gx_scrollbar_draw(thumb);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9190">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9190">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9191">İşlem kaydırma çubuğu olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9191">Process scrollbar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9192">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9192">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_event_process(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9193">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9193">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9194">Bu hizmet bir ScrollBar olayını işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9194">This service processes a scrollbar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9195">Hem dikey hem de yatay kaydırma çubuğu öğeleri için kullanılan ortak bir olay işleme işlevi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9195">A common event handling function used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9196">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9197">**kaydırma çubuğu** ScrollBar pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9197">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9198">**olay** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9198">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9199">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9199">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9200">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı kaydırma çubuğu olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9200">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9201">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9201">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9202">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9202">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9203">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9203">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9204">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9204">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9205">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9205">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9206">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9206">Example</span></span>

```C
Call generic scrollbar event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scrollbar_event_process(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
                                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scrollbar
            event processing */
        gx_scrollbar_event_process(scrollbar, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_limit_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9213">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9213">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9214">Kaydırma çubuğu sınırını denetleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9214">Check scrollbar limit</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9215">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9215">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_limit_check(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9216">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9216">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9217">Bu hizmet, kaydırma çubuğunun sınırını denetler ve kaydırma çubuğunun parmak tekerleğinin önceden tanımlanmış sınırların ötesine seyahatini önler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9217">This service checks the limit of the scrollbar and prevents the scrollbar thumbwheel from traveling beyond the predefined limits.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9218">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9218">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9219">**kaydırma çubuğu** Kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9219">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9220">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9220">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9234">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9234">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9235">Kaydırma çubuğunu sıfırlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9235">Reset scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9236">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9236">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_reset(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9237">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9237">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9238">Bu hizmet kaydırma çubuğunu sıfırlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9238">This service resets the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9239">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9239">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9240">**kaydırma çubuğu** ScrollBar pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9240">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9241">**bilgi** Kaydırma çubuğu sınırlarını, geçerli değeri ve adım veya artışı tanımlayan GX_SCROLL_INFO yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9241">**info** Pointer to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure that defines the scrollbar limits, current value, and step or increment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9242">**Ek ı** GX_SCROLL_INFO yapısına yönelik tanımı içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9242">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9243">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ScrollBar sıfırlaması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9247">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9247">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9248">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) kaydırma bilgileri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9248">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9249">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9249">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9250">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9250">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9251">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9251">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Reset scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

GX_SCROLL_INFO my_info;

my_info.gx_scroll_value = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_minimum = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_maximum = 100;
my_info.gx_scroll_visible = 10;
my_info.gx_scroll_increment = 1;

status = gx_scrollbar_reset(&my_scrollbar, &my_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been reset. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9431">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9431">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9432">Geçerli imleç konumunda bir karakter dizesi ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9432">Insert a character string at current cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9433">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9433">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9434">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9434">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9435">Bu hizmet, geçerli imleç konumundaki metin girişi dizesi arabelleğine bir karakter dizesi ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9435">This service inserts a character string into the text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9436">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9436">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9437">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9437">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9438">**insert_str** Eklenecek karakter dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9438">**insert_str** Character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9439">**insert_size** Eklenecek bayt sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9439">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9440">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9440">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9441">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) karakteri başarıyla ekledi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9441">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9443">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9443">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9444">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9444">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9445">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9446">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9446">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9447">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9447">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */

GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(&my_text_input,
                                            insert_text,
                                            GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9469">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9469">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9470">Metin girişi pencere öğesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9470">Create a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9471">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9471">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_create(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    UINT style, USHORT text_input_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9472">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9472">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9473">Bu hizmet bir metin girişi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9473">This service creates a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9474">Çağıranın giriş dizesi için depolama alanı sağlaması ve dizenin maksimum uzunluğunu belirt olması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9474">The caller must provide storage for the input string and indicate the maximum length of the string.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9475">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT, GX_PROMPT türetilen ve bu nedenle gx_prompt tüm GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9475">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_PROMPT and therefore all gx_prompt services may be used with GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9476">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9477">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9477">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9478">**name** İsteğe bağlı pencere öğesi mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9478">**name** Optional widget logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9479">**parent** İsteğe bağlı üst pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9479">**parent** Optional parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9480">**input_buffer** Giriş dizesi için depolama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9480">**input_buffer** Storage for input string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9481">**buffer_size** Giriş dizesi depolama alanı boyutu (bayt cinsinden).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9481">**buffer_size** Size of input string storage area, in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9482">**style (stil)** Metin girişi stil bayrakları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9482">**style** Text input style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9483">**text_input_id** Giriş pencere öğesinin isteğe bağlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9483">**text_input_id** Optional ID of the input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9484">**Boyut** İlk pencere öğesi boyutunu tanımlayan dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9484">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9485">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9485">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9486">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı tek satırlık metin girişi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9486">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9487">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9487">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9488">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9488">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9489">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9489">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9490">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9490">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9492">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9492">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9493">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9493">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9494">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9494">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
static GX_CHAR           text_input_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE             size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 110, 40);

/* Create single-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
                        “text_input”, GX_NULL, text_input_buffer, 100,
                        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input widget has been created. */
```

```C
VOID gx_single_line_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

```C
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9550">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9550">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9551">Metin çizme başlangıç konumunu al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9551">Retrieve text draw start position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9552">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_VALUE *xpos, GX_VALUE *ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9553">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9554">Bu hizmet, metin giriş metninin çizim başlangıç konumunu alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9554">This service retrieves the draw start position of text input text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9555">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9555">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9556">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9556">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9557">**xpos** x koordinatta çizim başlangıç konumu alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9557">**xpos** Retrieved draw start position in x coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9558">**ypos** y koordinatı içinde çizim başlangıç konumu alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9558">**ypos** Retrieved draw start position in y coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9559">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9559">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9560">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Metin girişi imlecini başarıyla sona taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9560">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9561">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9561">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9562">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9562">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9563">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9563">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9564">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9564">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9565">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9565">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
GX_VALUE xpos;
GX_VALUE ypos;

    /* Draw background. */
    gx_widget_border_draw(input, border_color, upper_fill_color,
                          lower_fill_color, GX_TRUE);

    /* Retrieve text draw start position. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(input, xpos,
                                                ypos);

    /* Add your text drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9623">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9623">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9624">Metin girişi pencere öğesi olay işleme işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9624">Text input widget event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9625">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9625">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9626">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9626">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9627">Bu hizmet tek satırlı bir metin girişi olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9627">This service processes a single line text input event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9628">Bu işleve gx_single_line_text_input_create işlevi tarafından dahili olarak başvurulur, ancak uygulamanın özel bir tek satırlık metin girişi olay işleme işlevi tanımladığı durumlarda uygulama tarafından kullanıma sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9628">This function is internally referenced by the gx_single_line_text_input_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom single line text input event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9629">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9630">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9630">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9631">**event_ptr** GX_EVENT yapısına yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9631">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9632">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9632">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9633">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) metin girişi olayını başarıyla işledi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9633">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed text input event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9634">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9634">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9635">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9635">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9636">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9636">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9637">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9638">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9638">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9639">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9639">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic single line text input event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_sl_text_input_event_process(
                                GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
                                GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default single line
            text input event processing */
        status =
        gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(input, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9664">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9665">Bu hizmet, tek satırlı metin girişinin dolgu rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9665">This service sets the fill color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9666">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9666">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9667">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9667">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9668">**normal_fill_color_id** Pencere öğesi dolgu renginin kaynak kimliği normal durumda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9668">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9669">**Ek A önceden** tanımlanmış renk Kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9669">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9670">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9670">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9671">**selected_fill_color_id** Pencere öğesi odağında pencere öğesi dolgu renginin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9671">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9672">**Ek A önceden** tanımlanmış renk Kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9672">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9673">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9673">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9674">**disabled_fill_color_id** Stil stili ayarlanmazken pencere öğesi dolgu renginin GX_STYLE_ENABLED kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9674">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9675">**Ek A** , önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9675">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9676">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9676">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9677">**readonly_fill_color_id** Stil GX_STYLE_ENABLED ve GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY her ikisi de ayarlandığında pencere öğesi dolgusu rengi kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9677">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9678">**Ek A** , önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9678">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9679">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9679">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9709">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9709">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9710">Metin girişi imlecini giriş konuma taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9710">Move the text input cursor to the home position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9711">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9711">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_home(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9712">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9712">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9713">Bu hizmet, metin girişi imleci konumunu giriş dizesinin başlangıcına taşır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9713">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9714">Bu hizmet, bir giriş anahtarı aşağı olayı alınca dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9714">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9715">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9715">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9716">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9716">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9717">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9717">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9718">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) İmleç giriş konuma başarıyla taşındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9718">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the home position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9719">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9719">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9720">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9720">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9721">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9721">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9722">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9722">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9723">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9723">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9724">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9724">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the input text. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the home position */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9785">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9785">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    INT pixel_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9786">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9786">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9787">Bu hizmet, metin giriş imlecini istenen piksel konumuna göre konumlandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9787">This service positions the text input cursor based on the requested pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9788">Metin girişi imleç dizini, piksel konumunun x değeri temel alınarak hesaplanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9788">The text input cursor index will be calculated based on the x value of the pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9789">Bu hizmet, bir kalem aşağı olayı alındığında dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9789">This service is called internally when a pen down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9790">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9790">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9791">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9791">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9792">**pixel_position** Piksel konumunun X değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9792">**pixel_position** X value of pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9793">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9793">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9794">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) İmleci istenen konuma başarıyla ayarlayın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9794">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the cursor to requested position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9796">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9796">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9797">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9797">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9798">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9799">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9799">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9800">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9800">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set cursor to requested position. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(&my_text_input,
                                                100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget cursor has been positioned */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9895">gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9895">gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9896">Stilleri kaldırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9896">Remove styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9897">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9897">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9898">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9898">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9899">Bu hizmet, belirtilen stili tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesinden kaldırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9899">This service removes the specified style(s) from the single line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9900">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9900">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9901">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9901">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9902">**style (stil)** Kaldır için stil(ler).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9902">**style** Style(s) to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9903">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stiller içerir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9903">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9904">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9904">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9905">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pencere öğesinden stil başarıyla kaldırıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9905">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed style(s) from widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9908">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9908">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9909">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9910">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9910">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9911">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9911">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove cursor blink style from “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove(&my_text_input,
GX_STYLE_CURSOR_BLINK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_CURSOR_BLINK style has been successfully removed. */
```

```C
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-9992">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-9992">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color “my_text_input” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10014">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10014">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10015">Metin Seç</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10015">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10016">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10016">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10017">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10017">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10018">Bu hizmet, belirtilen başlangıç işaretine ve bitiş işareti dizinine sahip metinleri seçer ve seçilen metni seçilen Fill ve Text renkleriyle vurgular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10018">This service selects text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10019">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10019">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10020">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10020">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10021">**start_index** Seçilen ilk karakterin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10021">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10022">**end_index** Son seçili karakterin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10022">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10023">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10023">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10024">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı tek satırlık metin girişi metin seçimi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10024">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10027">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10027">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10028">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) dizin değeri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10028">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10029">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10029">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10030">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10030">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10031">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10031">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */

                                                0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10109">gx_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10109">gx_slider_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10110">Kaydırıcı oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10110">Create slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10111">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10111">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_create(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, INT tick_count,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    ULONG style, USHORT slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10112">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10112">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10113">Bu hizmet bir kaydırıcı pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10113">This service creates a slider widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10114">GX_SLIDER GX_WIDGET türetilir ve bu nedenle tüm gx_widget API hizmetleri GX_SLIDER türü pencere öğeleri ile kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10114">GX_SLIDER is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_SLIDER type widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10115">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10115">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10116">**kaydırıcı**: kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10116">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10117">**ad**: kaydırıcının adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10117">**name**: Name of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10118">**Parent**: üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10118">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10119">**tick_count**: kaydırıcı işaretleri sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10119">**tick_count**: Number of slider ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10120">**slider_info**: kaydırıcı değeri sınırlarını, kaydırıcı iğne boyutunu ve konumunu ve diğer kaydırıcı parametrelerini geçirmek için kullanılan bir yapı olan kaydırıcı bilgisine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10120">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider info which is a structure used to pass the slider value limits, slider needle size and position, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10121">**Ek ı** GX_SLIDER_INFO yapısına yönelik tanımı içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10121">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10122">**Stil**: kaydırıcı stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10122">**style**: Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10123">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stilleri ve pencere öğesine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10123">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10124">**slider_id**: uygulama TANıMLı kaydırıcının kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10124">**slider_id**: Application-defined ID of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10125">**Boyut**: kaydırıcının boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10125">**size**: Dimensions of slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10126">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10127">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı kaydırıcı oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10127">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10128">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10128">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10129">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10129">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10130">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10130">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10131">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10131">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10132">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10132">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10133">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10133">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10134">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10134">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10135">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10135">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create slider “my_slider”. */

GX_SLIDER my_slider;
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;

info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

status = gx_slider_create(&my_slider, “my_slider”,
    &my_parent, 10, info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SLIDER, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider “my_slider” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10153">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10153">Description</span></span>
