## <a name="gx_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10177">gx_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10177">gx_slider_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10178">Kaydırıcıyı işleme olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10178">Process slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10179">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10179">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_event_process(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10180">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10180">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10181">Bu hizmet bir kaydırıcı olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10181">This service processes a slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10182">Bu işlev, gx_slider_create işlevi tarafından dahili olarak başvurulsa da, uygulamanın özel bir kaydırıcı olay işleme işlevi tanımladığı durumlarda uygulama tarafından kullanım için ortaya çıkar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10182">This function is internally referenced by the gx_slider_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom slider event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10183">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10183">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10184">**kaydırıcı:** Kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10184">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10185">**event:** İşlemeye olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10185">**event**: Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10186">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10186">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10187">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı kaydırıcı olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10187">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10189">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10189">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10190">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10190">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10191">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10191">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10192">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10192">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10193">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10193">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic slider event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_slider_event_process(GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default slider event processing */
            status = gx_slider_event_process(slider, event);
            break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10208">gx_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10208">gx_slider_info_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10209">Kaydırıcı bilgi bloğunu ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10209">Set slider information block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10210">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10210">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_info_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10211">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10211">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10212">Bu hizmet, kaydırıcı minimum, Slider maksimum ve kaydırıcı geçerli değeri gibi belirtilen kaydırıcı bilgilerini belirtilen kaydırıcıya atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10212">This service assigns the specified slider information such as slider minimum, slider maximum, and slider current value to the indicated slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10213">Kaydırıcı, yeni kaydırıcı bilgilerine göre iğne konumunu güncelleştirir ve yeniden çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10213">The slider will update the needle position and redraw based on the new slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10214">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10214">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10215">**kaydırıcı**: kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10215">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10216">**bilgi**: kaydırıcı bilgi yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10216">**info**: Pointer to the slider information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10217">**Ek ı** GX_SLIDER_INFO yapısına yönelik tanımı içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10217">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10218">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10218">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10219">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) kaydırıcı bilgilerini başarıyla ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10219">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set slider information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10220">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10220">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10221">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10221">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10222">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10222">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10223">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10223">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10224">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10224">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10225">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10225">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO my_slider_info;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;

my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

/* Set slider information for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_info_set (&my_slider, &my_slider_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_slider” is configured with my_slider_info. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10267">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10267">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10268">Kaydırıcı iğne konumunu al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10268">Get slider needle position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10269">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10269">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_needle_position_get(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10270">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10270">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10271">Bu hizmet, kaydırıcı iğne konumunu geçerli kaydırıcı değerine göre hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10271">This service computes the slider needle position based on the current slider value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10272">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10272">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10273">**kaydırıcı**: kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10273">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10274">**slider_info**: kaydırıcı sınırlarını, iğne boyutunu ve kaydırmayı ve diğer kaydırıcı parametrelerini tanımlayan kaydırıcı bilgi yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10274">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider information structure defining the slider limits, needle size and offset, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10275">**Ek ı** GX_SLIDER_INFO yapısına yönelik tanımı içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10275">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10276">**return_position**: iğne konumu için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10276">**return_position**: Pointer to destination for needle position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10277">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10278">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı kaydırıcı iğne konumu al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10278">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider needle position get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10279">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10279">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10280">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10280">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10281">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10281">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10282">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) kaydırıcı bilgisi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10282">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10283">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10284">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10284">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10285">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10285">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE needle_position;

/* Get the needle position for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_needle_posistion_get(&my_slider, &slider_info,
    &needle_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the needle position for slider “my_slider” has been retrieved. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10302">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10302">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10303">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10303">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10304">Bu hizmet kaydırıcı onay işaretlerini çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10304">This service draws the slider tickmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10305">Bu işlev, gx_slider_draw işlevi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel kaydırıcı çizim işlevi uygulayan uygulamalar tarafından kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10305">This function is called internally by the gx_slider_draw function, but is exposed for use by applications that might implement a custom slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10306">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10306">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10307">**kaydırıcı:** Kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10307">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10308">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10308">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10309">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10309">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10310">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10310">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10311">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10311">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10312">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10312">Example</span></span>

```C

{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_travel_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10327">gx_slider_travel_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10327">gx_slider_travel_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10328">Kaydırıcı gezmasını al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10328">Get slider travel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10329">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10329">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_travel_get(
    GX_SLIDER *widget,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT *return_min_travel, 
    INT *return_max_travel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10330">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10330">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10331">Bu hizmet kaydırıcı gezmasını alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10331">This service gets the slider travel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10332">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10332">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10333">**kaydırıcı**: kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10333">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10334">**bilgi**: kaydırıcı bilgi yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10334">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10335">**Ek ı** GX_SLIDER_INFO yapısına yönelik tanımı içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10335">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10336">**return_min_travel:** Minimum seyahat değeri için hedefin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10336">**return_min_travel**: Pointer to destination for minimum travel value</span></span></td>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10337">**return_max_travell:** Maksimum seyahat değeri için hedefin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10337">**return_max_travell**: Pointer to destination for maximum travel value</span></span></td>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10338">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10339">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı kaydırıcı seyahati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10339">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider travel get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10341">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10341">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10343">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Kaydırıcı bilgileri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10343">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10344">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10344">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10345">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10345">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10346">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10346">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get travel information for for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_travel_get(&my_slider, &info,
    &my_min_travel, &my_max_travel);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the travel max/min values for slider “my_slider” have been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10361">gx_slider_value_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10361">gx_slider_value_calculate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10362">Kaydırıcı değerini hesapla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10362">Calculate slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10363">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10363">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_calculate(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT new_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10364">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10364">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10365">Bu hizmet kaydırıcı değerini kaydırıcı iğne konumuna göre hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10365">This service calculates the slider value based on the slider needle position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10366">Bu işlev, Kullanıcı kaydırıcı iğne 'yi taşırken Gux tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel bir kaydırıcı pencere öğesi uygularken uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10366">This function is called internally by GUIX when the user moves the slider needle, but can also be invoked by the application when implementing a custom slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10367">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10367">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10368">**kaydırıcı**: kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10368">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10369">**bilgi**: kaydırıcı bilgisine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10369">**info**: Pointer to slider info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10370">**Ek ı** GX_LISDER_INFO yapısına yönelik tanımı içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10370">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LISDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10371">**new_position**: yeni kaydırıcı konumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10371">**new_position**: New slider position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10372">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10372">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10373">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı kaydırıcı değeri hesaplaması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10373">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10375">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10375">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10377">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) kaydırıcı bilgisi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10377">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10378">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10378">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10379">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10379">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10380">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10380">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Calculate new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_calculate(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_slider_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider value of “my_slider” has been calculated. */

```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10395">gx_slider_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10395">gx_slider_value_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10396">Kaydırıcı değerini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10396">Set slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10397">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10397">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info, 
    INT new_value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10398">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10398">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10399">Bu hizmet kaydırıcı değerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10399">This service sets the slider value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10400">Bu API, kaydırıcı iğnesini program denetimi altına taşımak için uygulama tarafından çağrılarak, kaydırıcı iğnesini sürüklemek için kullanıcı girişi ihtiyacı atlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10400">This API can be called by the application to move a slider needle under program control, bypassing the need for user input to drag the slider needle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10401">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10401">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10402">**kaydırıcı:** Kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10402">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10403">**info:** Kaydırıcı bilgi yapısının işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10403">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10404">**Ek I,** GX_SLIDER_INFO yapısının tanımını içerir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10404">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10405">**new_value:** Yeni kaydırıcı değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10405">**new_value**: New slider value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10406">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10406">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10407">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı kaydırıcı değer kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10407">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10410">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10410">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10411">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10411">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10412">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10412">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10413">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10413">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_set(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new value has been set for slider “my_slider”. */
```

##  <a name="gx_sprite_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10428">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10428">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10429">Bir sprite pencere öğesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10429">Create a sprite widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10430">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10430">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_create(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count,
    ULONG style, USHORT sprite_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10431">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10431">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10432">Bu hizmet bir GX_SPRITE pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10432">This service creates a GX_SPRITE widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10433">Sprite, bir dizi piksel haritasını bir animasyonda olduğu gibi görüntülemek için kullanılır veya çok durumlu piksel haritası görüntüleme pencere öğesi olarak kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10433">A sprite is used to display a sequence of pixelmaps as in an animation, or can be used as a multi-state pixelmap display widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10434">GX_SPRITE, api GX_WIDGET türetilen ve tüm gx_widget API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10434">GX_SPRITE is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10435">GX_SPRITE pencere öğesi, sprite animasyonunu GX_SPRITE_FRAME bir dizi farklı yapı gerektirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10435">The GX_SPRITE widget requires an array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures to define the sprite animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10436">**Ek I,** bu yapıya GX_PRITE_FRAME içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10436">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PRITE_FRAME structure.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10437">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10437">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10438">**sprite:** Sprite pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10438">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10439">**name:** İsteğe bağlı sprite adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10439">**name**: Optional sprite name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10440">**parent:** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10440">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10441">**frame_list:** Bir dizi GX_SPRITE_FRAME yapı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10441">**frame_list**: An array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10442">**frame_count:** çerçeve listesi dizisinde girdi sayısını belirtir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10442">**frame_count**: specifies the number of entries in the frame list array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10443">**style:** sprite stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10443">**style**: Style of sprite.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10444">**Ek D,** pencere öğelerine özgü stillerin yanı sıra tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stiller içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10444">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10445">**sprite_id:** Sprite'in uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10445">**sprite_id**: Application-defined ID of sprite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10446">**size:** sprite boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10446">**size**: Dimensions of sprite</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10447">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10447">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10448">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı sprite oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10448">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10449">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10449">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10450">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10450">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10451">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10451">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10452">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10452">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10453">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10453">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10454">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10454">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10455">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10455">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create sprite “my_sprite”. */

status = gx_sprite_create(&my_sprite, “my_sprite”,
    &my_parent,
    sprite_frame_list, frame_count,
    GX_STYLE_SPRITE_AUTO|GX_STYLE_SPRITE_LOOP,
    ID_MY_SPRITE, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_current_frame_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10461">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10461">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10462">Sprite çerçevesini ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10462">Assign sprite frame</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10463">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10463">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_current_frame_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10464">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10464">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10465">Bu hizmet, geçerli Sprite çerçevesini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10465">This service assigns the current sprite frame.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10466">GX_SPRITE pencere öğesi otomatik olarak çalışmıyorsa, bir program denetimli durum ışığı olarak kullanılabilir ve bu da commanded çerçeve pixelmap 'i görüntülüyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10466">If a GX_SPRITE widget is not auto-running, it can be used as a program controlled state light, displaying the commanded frame pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10467">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10467">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10468">**Sprite**: sprite pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10468">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10469">**çerçeve**: görüntülenecek Sprite çerçevesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10469">**frame**: Sprite frame to display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10470">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10471">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10471">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10473">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10473">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10474">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10474">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10475">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10476">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10477">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10477">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign frame number 3 as the current sprite frame */
status = gx_sprite_current_frame_set(&my_sprite, 3);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will display frame index 3. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_frame_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10483">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10483">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10484">Sprite çerçeve listesi atama veya değiştirme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10484">Assign or alter a sprite frame list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10485">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10485">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_frame_list_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10486">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10486">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10487">Bu hizmet, sprite pencere öğesi oluşturulduktan sonra bir sprite pencere öğesi tarafından kullanılan çerçeve listesini atamak veya yeniden atamak için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10487">This service can be used to assign or re-assign the frame list used by a sprite widget after the sprite widget has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10488">Sprite çerçeve listesinin içeriği hakkında bilgi için gx_sprite_create API belgelerine bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10488">For information about the contents of a sprite frame list, refer to the gx_sprite_create API documentation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10489">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10490">**sprite:** Sprite pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10490">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10491">**frame_list:** Çerçeve GX_SPRITE_FRAME veya çerçeve GX_NULL dizi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10491">**frame_list**: Array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures or GX_NULL if no frame list.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10492">**frame_count:** Çerçeve listesi dizisinde kare sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10492">**frame_count**: Number of frames in frame list array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10493">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10493">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10494">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı sprite çerçeve listesi kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10494">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite frame list set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10495">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10495">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10496">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10496">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10497">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10497">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10498">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10498">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10499">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10499">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10500">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10500">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign framelist_1, which has 10 frames, to my_sprite */
status = gx_sprite_frame_list_set(&my_sprite, framelist_1, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new frame list is now associated with this sprite */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10501">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10501">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10506">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10506">gx_sprite_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10507">Sprite çalıştırma sırası başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10507">Start a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10508">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10508">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_start(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10509">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10509">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10510">Bu hizmet bir sprite otomatik çalıştırma sırası başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10510">This service starts a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10511">Sprite pencere öğesi, son çerçeveye ulaşılana kadar veya GX_SPRITE_LOOP stili ayarlandıysa sürekli olarak çalışacak şekilde Sprite çerçeveleri boyunca geçiş yapar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10511">The sprite widget will cycle through the sprite frames until the last frame is reached, or will run continuously if the GX_SPRITE_LOOP style is set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10512">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10512">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10513">**Sprite**: sprite pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10513">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10514">**çerçeve**: görüntülenecek ilk Sprite çerçevesi, genellikle kare 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10514">**frame**: Initial sprite frame to display, usually frame 0</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10515">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10515">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10516">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Sprite çalıştırması başarıyla başlatıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10516">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully started sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10518">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10518">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10520">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10521">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10521">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10522">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10522">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start the sprite “my_sprite” */
status = gx_sprite_start(&my_sprite, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will start running */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10523">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10523">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10524">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10524">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10525">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10525">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10526">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10526">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10528">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10528">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10529">Bir sprite çalışma sırasını durdur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10529">Stop a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10530">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_stop(GX_SPRITE *sprite);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10531">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10532">Bu hizmet, bir sprite otomatik çalıştırma sırasını durduruyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10532">This service stops a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10533">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10533">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10534">**Sprite**: sprite pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10534">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10535">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10535">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10536">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Sprite çalıştırmasını başarıyla durdurdu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10536">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully stopped sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10537">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10537">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10538">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10538">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10539">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10539">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10548">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10548">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10549">Dize türü kaydırma tekerleği oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10549">Create a string type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10550">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10550">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string_list, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10551">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10551">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10552">Bu hizmet, bir dize türü kaydırma tekerleği oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10552">This service creates a string type scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10553">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL türetilen ve bu nedenle gx_text_scroll_wheel API işlevlerinin hepsi GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10553">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL, and therefore all gx_text_scroll_wheel API functions maybe be used with GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL widgets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10554">Uygulama, kaydırma tekerleği tarafından görüntülenecek dizeleri tanımlayan create işlevine basit bir dize dizisi iletir veya uygulama GX_NULL parametresi olarak string_list'yi iletir ve dize kimlikleri dizisi sağlamak için `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API'yi çağırabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10554">The application can pass in a simple string array to the create function which defines the strings that will be displayed by the scroll wheel, or the application can pass GX_NULL as the string_list parameter and call the `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API to provide an array of String IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10555">İkinci yöntem kullanılırsa, etkin uygulama dili değiştirilirse dize kaydırma tekerleği görüntülenen dizeleri otomatik olarak değiştirecek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10555">If the latter method is used the string scroll wheel will automatically switch the displayed strings if the active application language is modified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10556">Alternatif olarak, görüntülenecek dizeler statik olarak tanımlanmamışsa veya kaydırma tekerleği oluşturulduğunda bilinmese uygulama, dize listesi parametresi olarak GX_NULL'ı iletebilir ve gerektiğinde gerçek zamanlı olarak görüntülenecek dizeleri sağlayacak bir geri çağırma işlevi tanımlamak için gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() API işlevini çağırabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10556">As an alternative, if the strings to be displayed are not statically defined or not know at the time the scroll wheel is created, the application can pass GX_NULL as the string list parameter, and call the API function gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() to define a callback function which will provide the strings to be displayed in a real-time as-needed basis..</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10557">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10557">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10558">**wheel:** Dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10558">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10559">**name:** Uygulama tanımlı pencere öğesi adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10559">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10560">**parent:** Tekerlek üst veya GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10560">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10561">**total_rows:** Kullanıcıya sunulacak toplam satır sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10561">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10562">**string_list:** Statik olarak tanımlanmış dize dizisi veya GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10562">**string_list**: Statically defined string array, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10563">**style:** İstenen stil bayrakları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10563">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10564">**Kimlik:** Uygulama tanımlı tekerlek stili bayraklar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10564">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10565">**boyut:** İlk kaydırma tekerleği boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10565">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10566">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10566">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10567">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) dize kaydırma tekerleği başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10567">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created string scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10568">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10568">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10569">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10569">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10570">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10570">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10572">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10573">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10573">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10574">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10574">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Create the string scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “Day Wheel”,
    root, 7, days,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    ID_SCROLL_WHEEL_DAY, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string scroll wheel has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10593">gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10593">gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10594">İşlem dizesi kaydırma tekerleği olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10594">Process string scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10595">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10595">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_RESOURCE_ID *string_id_list, 
    INT id_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10596">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10596">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10597">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dize kaydırma tekerleği için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10597">This service processes an event for the specified string scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10598">Bu hizmet, herhangi bir özel dize kaydırma tekerleği olay işleme işlevleri tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrıl olmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10598">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom string scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10599">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10599">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10600">**wheel (tekerlek)** Dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10600">**wheel** Pointer to string scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10601">**event_ptr** İşlemeye devam etmek için olayın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10601">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10602">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10602">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10603">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı dize kaydırma tekerleği olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10603">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful string scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10604">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10604">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10605">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10605">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10606">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10606">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10607">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10607">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10608">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10608">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10609">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10609">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic string scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default string scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10628">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10628">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10629">Dize kimlikleri dizisi ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10629">Assign array of string IDs</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10630">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10630">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_RESOURCE_ID *string_id_list, INT id_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10631">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10631">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10632">Bu hizmet, bir dize bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesine dize kimlikleri dizisi atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10632">This service assigns an array of string IDs to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10633">Dizelerin statik olarak tanımlanması ve pencere öğesinin birden çok dilde çalışması gerekiyorsa, dize kaydırma tekerleği için dizeler atama yöntemi önerilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10633">This method of assigning strings to a string scroll wheel is recommended if the strings are statically defined and the widget must operate in multiple languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10634">Bu API kullanılacaksa, önce kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi bir GX_NULL dize listesi ile oluşturulmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10634">If this API is to be used, the scroll wheel widget should first be created with a GX_NULL string list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10635">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10635">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10636">**tekerlek**: dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10636">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10637">**string_id_list**: dize kimlikleri dizisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10637">**string_id_list**: Array of String IDs</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10638">**id_count**: kimlik listesinin boyutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10638">**id_count**: Size of the ID list.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10639">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10640">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Dize kimliği dizisini başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10640">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set string ID array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10643">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10643">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10644">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:** 0x22) Geçersiz Kimlik listesi boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10644">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: 0x22) Invalid ID list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10645">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10645">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10646">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10646">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10647">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10647">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST RESOURCE_ID wheel_ids[] = {
    GX_STRING_ID_SUNDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_MONDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_TUESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_WEDNESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_THURSDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_FRIDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_SATURDAY
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Stop the sprite sequence */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set(&wheel, wheel_ids, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ID list has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10666">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10666">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10667">Dize dizisi ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10667">Assign array of strings</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10668">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10668">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string_list, 
    INT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10669">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10669">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10670">Bu, dize kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesine bir dize dizisi atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10670">This assigns an array of strings to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10671">Pencere öğesi başlangıçta oluşturulduktan sonra görüntülenecek dizeleri değiştirmek için bu kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10671">This can be used to modify the strings displayed after the widget has initially been created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10672">String_scroll_wheel GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY desteklemediğini ve bu işleve geçirilen dizelerin dizisinin, uygulama tarafından statik olarak tanımlanması gerektiğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10672">Note that string_scroll_wheel does not support GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, and therefore the array of strings passed into this function should be statically defined by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10673">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10673">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10674">**tekerlek**: dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10674">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10675">**string_list**: dize işaretçileri dizisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10675">**string_list**: Array of string pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10676">**string_count**: dize dizisinin boyutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10676">**string_count**: Size of the string array.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10677">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10677">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10678">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) kaydırma tekerleği Için dizeleri başarıyla değiştirdi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10678">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully changed strings for scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10679">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10679">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10680">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10680">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10681">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10681">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10682">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) geçersiz dize listesi boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10682">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid string list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10683">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10683">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10684">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10684">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10685">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10685">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Set the array of strings to the scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(&wheel, days, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string array has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_studio_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10704">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10704">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10705">Studio tarafından oluşturulan belirtimler dosyasında tanımlanan pencere öğesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10705">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10706">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10706">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *gx_studio_widget_create(
    GX_BYTE *control,
    GX_CONST GX_STUDIO_WIDGET *definition, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10707">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10707">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10708">Bu hizmet, GUIX Studio tarafından oluşturulan belirtimler dosyasında tanımlanan bir pencere öğesi belirtimi kullanarak bir pencere öğesi ve pencere öğesi öğelerini oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10708">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10709">Bu işlev, benzer işlevin "adına göre" aramadan `gx_studio_named_widget_create()` kaçınıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10709">This function avoids the “by name” lookup of the similar function `gx_studio_named_widget_create()`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10710">GX_STUDIO_WIDGET yapısı, GUıDX Studio tarafından oluşturulan uygulama belirtimleri üstbilgi dosyasında tanımlanmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10710">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure is defined in the application specifications header file generated by GUIX Studio.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10711">Statik olarak ayrılan pencere öğeleri için pencere öğesi denetim bloğu, oluşturulan belirtimler. c dosyasında tanımlanır ve Gux Studio içinde tanımlanan pencere öğesi adı verilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10711">For statically allocated widgets, the widget control block is defined in the generated specifications.c file, and given the widget name defined within GUIX Studio.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10712">Dinamik olarak ayrılan pencere öğeleri için, uygulama pencere öğesi denetim bloğu adresi olarak GX_NULL geçirmeli ve işlev, `gx_system_memory_allocate()` tarafından da tanımlanan ve uygulama tarafından belirtilen işlevi kullanarak pencere öğesi denetim bloğunu dinamik olarak ayırmaya çalışır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10712">For dynamically allocated widgets, the application should pass GX_NULL as the widget control block address and the function will attempt to dynamically allocate the widget control block using the `gx_system_memory_allocate()` function, which is also defined by and provided by the application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10713">Bir uygulamanın, oluşturulan belirtimler dosyası içindeki Gux Studio pencere öğesi tanımına doğrudan başvurması için, GUI Studio kod üreticisi tarafından kullanılan adlandırma kuralını izlemeniz gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10713">For an application to directly reference the GUIX Studio widget definition within the generated specifications file, it is necessary to follow the naming convention utilized by the GUI Studio code generator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10714">Belirtimleri. c dosyasında oluşturulan GX_STUDIO_WIDGET yapısı şu kurala göre her zaman adlandırılır: pencere öğesi alt pencere öğesinin alt öğesi ise, <widget_name> alanının birden çok kez tekrarlanbildiği widget_name>_define <.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10714">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure generated within the specifications.c file is always named according to this convention: <widget_name>_define, where the <widget_name> field may be repeated multiple times if the widget is child of a child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10715">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10715">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10716">**Denetim** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi veya dinamik olarak ayrılmışsa GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10716">**control** Pointer to widget control block, or GX_NULL if dynamically allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10717">**tanım** Studio tarafından oluşturulan pencere öğesi tanım yapısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10717">**definition** Studio generated widget definition structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10718">varsa pencere öğesi üst öğesine ait **üst** işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10718">**parent** pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10719">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10719">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10720">Oluşturulan pencere öğesi denetim bloğuna yönelik işaretçi veya oluşturma işlemi başarılı olmazsa GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10720">Pointer to the created widget control block, or GX_NULL if the creation was not successful.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10721">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10721">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10722">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10722">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10723">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10723">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget “playlist_screen”, which is statically allocated. */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(&playlist_screen,
    &playlist_screen_define,
    root_window);

/* If widget != GX_NULL the widget was created. */

/* create the widget “songs_screen”, which is dynamically allocated */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(GX_NULL,
    &songs_screen_define, root_window);
```
