## <a name="gx_studio_named_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10726">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10726">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10727">Studio tarafından oluşturulan belirtim dosyasında tanımlı pencere öğesi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10727">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10728">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10728">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_named_widget_create(
    char *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **new_widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10729">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10729">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10730">Bu hizmet, bir pencere öğesi ve pencere öğesinin alt öğelerini Gux Studio tarafından üretilen belirtim dosyası içinde tanımlanan pencere öğesi belirtimini kullanarak oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10730">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10731">Bu API işlevi, pencere öğesi tanım tanımlayıcısı olarak Gux Studio uygulamasında belirtilen ekran adını kullanarak en üst düzey ekranları oluşturmak için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10731">This API function is used to create top-level screens using the screen name specified within the GUIX Studio application as the widget definition identifier.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10732">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10732">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10733">**ad**: ekran adı Gux Studio uygulaması içinde tanımlandığı şekilde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10733">**name**: Screen name as defined within GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10734">**Parent**: varsa pencere öğesi üst öğesine işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10734">**parent**: pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10735">**new_widget**: oluşturulan pencere öğesi işaretçisini döndürecek konum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10735">**new_widget**: location to return created widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10736">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10736">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10737">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10737">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10738">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x11) Adlandırılmış pencere öğesi bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10738">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Named widget could not be found</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10739">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10739">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10740">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10740">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10741">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10741">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”,
   which is a child of the top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_named_widget_create(“main_menu”,
    &root_window, &menu_screen);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the screen was created
   and linked to the root window. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10742">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10742">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10743">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10743">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_display_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10744">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10744">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10745">GUIX Studio projesinde tanımlanan ekranı yapılandırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10745">Configure display defined in GUIX Studio project</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10746">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10746">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_display_configure(
    USHORT display,
    UINT (*driver)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    USHORT language, 
    USHORT theme,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10747">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10747">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10748">Bu hizmet, GX_DISPLAY için bir hizmet başlatıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10748">This service initializes a GX_DISPLAY so that it is ready for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10749">Bu işlev, bir denetim bloğu GX_DISPLAY, görüntüye sığacak bir tuval oluşturmak ve tuval için bir kök pencere oluşturmak için işlevleri birleştirilmiştir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10749">This function consolidates the functions to initialize a GX_DISPLAY control block, create a canvas to fit the display, and create a root window for the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10750">Bu işlev, görüntü başlatıldıktan sonra istenen dili ve kaynak temasını da yüklür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10750">This function also installs the language and resource theme requested after the display has been initialized.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10751">Bu işlev, bir ekran kullanmak üzere hazırlamak için en yaygın olarak gereken programlama çabasını birleştirilmiştir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10751">This function consolidates the programming effort most commonly required to prepare a display for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10752">İşlev gx_display_create()), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create ve gx_window_root_create işlevlerini çağırır; bunların hepsi veya bazıları uygulama programı tarafından gerekli olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10752">The function invokes the gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create, and gx_window_root_create functions, all or some of which would otherwise be required by the application program.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10753">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10753">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10754">**display:** Studio proje dosyasındaki görüntüleme tanımlarına karşılık gelen görüntü tablosunda dizine alın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10754">**display**: Index into the display table, which corresponds to the display definitions in the Studio project file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10755">**driver**: sürücü başlatma işlevini görüntüleme işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10755">**driver**: pointer to display driver initialization function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10756">Bu işlev, denetim bloğunda dolaylı işlev işaretçilerini başlatmak GX_DISPLAY ve gerekli donanım kurulumunu gerçekleştirmek için çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10756">This function is invoked to initialize the indirect function pointers of the GX_DISPLAY control block, as well as perform any required hardware setup.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10757">**language**: ilk dil tablosu dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10757">**language**: initial language table index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10758">**language**: ilk tema dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10758">**language**: initial theme index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10759">**root:** kök pencere adresinin veya kök pencere adresinin iade GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10759">**root**: pointer to variable in which to return root window address, or GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10760">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10760">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10761">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10761">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10762">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x11) Görüntü başlatılamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10762">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Display could not be initialized</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10763">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10763">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10764">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10764">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10765">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10765">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”, which is a child of the
   top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_display_configure(MAIN_DISPLAY,
    my_driver_setup, LANGUAGE_ENGLISH, DEFAULT_THEME, GX_NULL);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the display was initialized, a canvas was
created for the display, a root window was created for the canvas, and
the requested language and theme have been installed.
*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10769">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10769">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10770">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10770">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10771">gx_system_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10771">gx_system_language_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10772">gx_system_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10772">gx_system_active_language_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10773">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10773">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10774">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10774">gx_canvas_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10775">gx_window_root_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10775">gx_window_root_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10776">gx_system_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10776">gx_system_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10777">Etkin dili ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10777">Set active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10778">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10778">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_active_language_set(GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10779">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10779">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10780">Bu hizmet geçerli dili ayarladı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10780">This service set the current language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10781">Dil dizini, uygulama dizesi tablosundaki sütun sayısından küçük olmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10781">The language index must be less than the number of columns in the application string table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10782">Bu işlev, gx_display_active_language_set kullanım dışı bırakılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10782">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_active_language_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10783">Tüm yeni uygulamalar gx_display_active_langauge_set kullanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10783">All new applications should use gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10784">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10784">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10785">**dil**: dil dizini, kaynak üst bilgi dosyasında tanımlı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10785">**language**: Language index, defined in resource header file.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10786">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10786">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10787">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) etkin Dili başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10787">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set active language</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10788">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \* \* (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10788">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \*\* (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10789">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \* \* (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10789">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \*\* (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10790">\*\*GX_INVALID_VALUE:\*\*\*\* (0x22) Geçersiz dil dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10790">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \*\* (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10791">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10791">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10792">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10792">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10793">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10793">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set active language and mark widget canvas as dirty. */
status = gx_system_active_language_set(ID_LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_animation_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10798">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10798">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10799">Sistem havuzundan animasyon denetim bloğu alma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10799">Obtain animation control block from system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10800">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_get(GX_ANIMATION **animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10801">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10802">Bu hizmet, bu tür denetim bloklarının bir havuzundan bir animasyon denetim bloğu almak için kullanılabilir ve gx_system kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10802">This service can be used to obtain an animation control block from a pool of such control blocks maintained by the gx_system component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10803">Animasyon denetim bloğu havuzu ve ilgili API hizmetleri yalnızca sabit GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE 0 değeriyle tanımlandığı zaman sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10803">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10804">Bu değer için varsayılan ayar 6'dır, yani sistem animasyon denetim bloğu havuzu, denetim bloğuna GX_ANIMATION içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10804">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10805">Animasyon tamamlanacak şekilde çalıştırılırsa, bu API kullanılarak ayrılan bir animasyon denetim bloğu otomatik olarak ücretsiz havuza döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10805">An animation control block allocated using this API is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10806">Animasyon, gx_animation_stop kullanılarak durdurulursa veya döndürülen bir hata nedeniyle başlatılamezse, animasyon denetim bloğu, gx_system_animation_free kullanılarak uygulama tarafından ücretsiz havuza döndürülebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10806">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10807">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10808">**animation:** İşaretçiyi almak için GX_ANIMATION adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10808">**animation**: Address of pointer to receive GX_ANIMATION pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10809">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10810">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Animasyon denetim bloğu başarıyla elde edildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10810">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully obtained animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10812">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz animasyon işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10812">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10813">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS:**(0x31) Sistem animasyon havuzu tükendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10813">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) System animation pool exhausted</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10814">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10815">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10815">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10816">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10816">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10817">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10817">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10821">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10821">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_animation_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10822">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10822">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10823">Sistem havuzuna bir animasyon denetim bloğu döndürme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10823">Return an animation control block to the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10824">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10824">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_free(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10825">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10825">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10826">Bu hizmet, sistem havuzuna bir animasyon denetim bloğu döndürmek için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10826">This service can be used to return an animation control block to the system pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10827">Animasyon denetim bloğu havuzu ve ilgili API hizmetleri yalnızca sabit GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE 0 değeri ile tanımlandığında sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10827">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10828">Bu değer için varsayılan ayar 6 ' dır, yani sistem animasyon denetim blok havuzu boyut GX_ANIMATION denetim bloğu içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10828">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10829">Animasyon tamamlanmayı çalıştırıyorsa, gx_system_animation_get () kullanılarak ayrılmış bir animasyon denetim bloğu otomatik olarak boş havuza döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10829">An animation control block allocated using gx_system_animation_get() is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10830">Boş havuza zaten döndürülen boş havuza bir animasyon denetim bloğu döndürme girişimi hiçbir etkiye sahip değildir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10830">Attempting to return an animation control block to the free pool that has already been returned to the free pool has no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10831">Animasyon gx_animation_stop kullanılarak durdurulmuşsa veya bazı döndürülen bir hata nedeniyle başlatılamıyorsa, gx_system_animation_get () kullanılarak edinilen animasyon denetim bloğu, uygulama tarafından gx_system_animation_free () kullanılarak boş havuza döndürülmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10831">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block that has been obtained using gx_system_animation_get() should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10832">Bir animasyon, ücretsiz havuza döndürülmeden önce boşta durumunda olmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10832">An animation must be in IDLE state before it can be returned to the free pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10833">Bir animasyon, başlatılmamışsa, durdurulduğunda veya tamamlanmaya çalıştırıldığında boşta durumundadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10833">An animation is in the IDLE state when it has not been started, when it is stopped, or when it runs to completion.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10834">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10834">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10835">**animasyon**: GX_ANIMATION denetim bloğuna yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10835">**animation**: Pointer to the GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10836">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10837">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully çıkarılan animasyon bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10837">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10839">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz animasyon işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10839">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10840">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) animasyon boşta değil veya sistem havuzundan ayrılmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10840">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) The animation is not IDLE, or it has not been allocated from the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10841">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10841">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10842">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10842">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10843">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10843">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    status = gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);

    if (status != GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* animation did not start, return it to the free pool */
        gx_system_animation_free(animation);
    }
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10844">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10844">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10846">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10846">gx_animation_start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10847">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10847">gx_animation_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10848">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10848">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_bidi_text_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10849">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10849">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10850">Dinamik çift yönlü metin desteğini devre dışı bırakma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10850">Disable dynamic bi-directional text support</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10851">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_bidi_text_disable(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10852">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10853">Bu hizmet dinamik çift yönlü metin desteğini devre dışı bırakıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10853">This service disables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10854">Bu hizmet GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT GUIX kitaplığını derleme sırasında tanımlanmalıdır ve yalnızca BiDi dize verilerini yeniden sıralamak için çalışma zamanı gerektiğinde gereklidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10854">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10855">Uygulamaların çoğu DOĞRU şekilde yeniden sıralandırilmiş BiDi metin dizeleri üretmek için GUIX Studio kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10855">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reorderd BiDi text strings.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10856">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10856">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10857">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10857">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10858">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10858">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10859">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Çift metin desteği başarıyla devre dışı bırakıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10859">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disabled bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10860">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10860">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10861">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10861">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10862">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10862">Example</span></span>

```C
/* GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT is defined. */

/* Diable bidi text support. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, bidi text support was disabled. */
```

```C
UINT gx_system_bidi_text_enable(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10868">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10868">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10869">Bu hizmet dinamik çift yönlü metin desteği sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10869">This service enables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10870">Bu hizmet GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT GUIX kitaplığını derleme sırasında tanımlanmalıdır ve yalnızca BiDi dize verilerini yeniden sıralamak için çalışma zamanı gerektiğinde gereklidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10870">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10871">Uygulamaların çoğu DOĞRU şekilde yeniden sıralandırmış BiDi metin dizeleri üretmek için GUIX Studio kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10871">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reordered BiDi text strings.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_canvas_refresh"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10881">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10881">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10882">Tüm kirli canvaonları Yenile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10882">Refresh all dirty canvases</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10883">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10883">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_canvas_refresh(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10884">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10884">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10885">Bu hizmet, tüm kirli pencere öğelerinin ve canvalerin hemen yeniden çizilmesini zorlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10885">This service forces an immediate redrawing of all dirty widgets and canvases.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10886">Bu hizmet normalde Gux sistem bileşeni tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından, bir sistem yeniden çizim işlemini zorlamak için çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10886">This service is normally invoked internally by the GUIX system component, but can be called by the application to force an immediate system redrawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10887">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10887">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10888">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10888">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10889">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10889">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10890">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) animasyon bloğunu başarıyla yayımladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10890">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10891">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) tuval oluşturulmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10891">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) No canvas created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10892">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10892">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10893">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10893">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10894">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10894">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10895">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10895">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Force immediate redraw operation. */
status = gx_system_canvas_refresh();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, canvas has been redraw. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_mark"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10920">gx_system_dirty_mark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10920">gx_system_dirty_mark</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10921">İşaret alanı kirli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10921">Mark area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10922">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10922">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_mark(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10923">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10924">Bu hizmet bu pencere öğesi için alanı kirli olarak işaretler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10924">This service marks the area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10925">Bu, sistem olayı işleme tamamlandığında pencere öğesi yeniden çizi için etkili bir şekilde kuyruğa eklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10925">This effectively queues the widget for redrawing when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10926">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10926">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10927">**pencere öğesi:** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10927">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10928">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10928">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10929">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarıyla işaretlenmiş pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10929">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully marked widget dirty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10930">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10930">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10931">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10931">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10932">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10932">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10933">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10933">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10934">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10934">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10935">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10935">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” as dirty. */
status = gx_system_dirty_mark(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the area associated
   with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_partial_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10960">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10960">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10961">Kısmi alanı kirli olarak işaretleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10961">Mark partial area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10962">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10962">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_partial_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10963">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10963">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10964">Bu hizmet bu pencere öğesi için kısmi alanı kirli olarak işaretler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10964">This service marks the partial area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10965">Bu, sistem olayı işleme tamamlandığında guiX tuval yenileme işlemi tarafından yeniden çizileme için pencere öğesi kuyruğa eklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10965">This queues the widget for redrawing by the GUIX canvas refresh operation when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10966">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10966">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10967">**pencere öğesi:** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10967">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10968">**dirty_area:** Kirli işaretlemek için pencere öğesi kirli alanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10968">**dirty_area**: Dirty area of widget to mark dirty</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10969">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10969">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10970">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı kısmi kirli alan işareti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10970">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful partial dirty area mark</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10971">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10971">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10972">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10972">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10973">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10973">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10974">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Geçersiz kirli alan boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10974">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid size of dirty area</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10975">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10975">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10976">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10976">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-10977">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-10977">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” partial area as dirty. */

status = gx_system_dirty_partial_add(&my_widget,
    &partial_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the partial area “partial_area”
associated with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_draw_context_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11002">gx_system_draw_context_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11002">gx_system_draw_context_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11003">Çizim bağlamını al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11003">Get drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11004">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11004">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_draw_context_get(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT **current_context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11005">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11005">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11006">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamına bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11006">This service returns a pointer to the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11007">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11007">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11008">**current_context:** Geçerli çizim bağlam işaretçisi için hedefin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11008">**current_context**: Pointer to destination for current drawing context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11009">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11009">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11010">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı geçerli bağlam get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11010">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful current context get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11011">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11011">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11012">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11012">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11013">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11013">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11014">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11014">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *current_context;

/* Get current drawing context. */

status = gx_system_draw_context_get(&current_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current drawing context
   is contained in “current_context”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_fold"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11039">gx_system_event_fold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11039">gx_system_event_fold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11040">Olayı gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11040">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11041">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11041">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_fold(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11042">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11042">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11043">Bu hizmet, aynı türdeki bir olay için Gux olay kuyruğu arar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11043">This service searches the GUIX event queue for an event of the same type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11044">Aynı türde bir olay varsa, olay yükü yeni olayla eşleşecek şekilde güncelleştirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11044">If an event of the same type exists, the event payload is updated to match the new event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11045">Eşleşen bir olay bulunamasa gx_system_event_send kuyruğun sonuna yeni olayı eklemek için gx_system_event_send işlevi çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11045">If no matching event is found, the gx_system_event_send function is called to add the new event to the end of the event queue.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11046">Bu işlev genellikle hızlı dokunma giriş sürücüleri tarafından olay kuyruğunda birden çok giriş olayıyla doldurmayı önlemek PEN_DRAG kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11046">This function is commonly used by fast touch input drivers to prevent filling the event queue with multiple PEN_DRAG events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11047">Bu işlev, aynı türde birden çok olayın GUIX olay kuyruğuna eklenmesini önlemek için uygulama tarafından da çağrılebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11047">This function can also be called by the application to prevent multiple events of the same type from being added to the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11048">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11048">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11049">**event**: Olayın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11049">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11050">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11050">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11051">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı olay gönderme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11051">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11052">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11052">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11053">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11053">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11054">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11054">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11055">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11055">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11056">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11056">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_EVENT my_event;

memset(&my_event, 0, sizeof(GX_EVENT));

my_event.gx_event_type = GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN;

my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_x = 100;
my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_y = 200;

/* Send “my_event” for processing. */
status = gx_system_event_fold(&my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11081">gx_system_event_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11081">gx_system_event_send</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11082">Olayı gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11082">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11083">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11083">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_send(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11084">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11084">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11085">Bu hizmet, belirtilen olayı Gux sistem olay kuyruğuna gönderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11085">This service sends the specified event into the GUIX system event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11086">Yeni olay sıranın sonuna yerleştirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11086">The new event is placed at the end of the queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11087">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11087">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11088">**olay**: olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11088">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11089">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11089">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11090">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı olay gönderme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11090">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11091">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11091">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11092">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11092">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11093">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11093">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11094">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11094">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11095">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11095">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send “new_event” for processing. */

GX_EVENT new_event;

new_event.gx_event_target = widget ->gx_widget_parent;
new_event.gx_event_type = MY_EVENT_TYPE;

/* Set optional param. */
new_event.gx_event_payload.xxxx = yyyy
new_event.gx_event_sender = widget->gx_widget_id;

/* Push the event to event pool. */
status = gx_system_event_send(&new_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_focus_claim"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11120">gx_system_focus_claim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11120">gx_system_focus_claim</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11121">Talep odaklı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11121">Claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11122">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11122">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_focus_claim(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11123">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11123">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11124">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere öğesi için odağı talep ediyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11124">This service claims the focus for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11125">Pencere öğesi daha önce odağa sahip değilse, GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED bir olay alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11125">If the widget did no previously have focus, it will receive a GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11126">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11126">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11127">**pencere öğesi**: odağı talep etmek için pencere öğesi denetim bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11127">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block to claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11128">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11128">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11129">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı odak talebi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11129">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful focus claim</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11130">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11130">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11131">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) zaten odağa sahip pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11131">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) Widget already owns focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11132">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11132">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11133">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12 pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11133">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12 Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11134">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11134">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11135">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11135">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11136">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11136">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Claim focus for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_claim_focus(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been claimed for
   “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11161">gx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11161">gx_system_initialize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11162">GUX 'i Başlat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11162">Initialize GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11163">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11163">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_initialize(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11164">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11165">Bu hizmet, GUıDX 'i başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11165">This service initializes GUIX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11166">Bu hizmetin diğer bir Gux API hizmetinden önce çağrılması ve sistem başlangıcında yalnızca bir kez çağrılması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11166">This service must be invoked before any other GUIX API service, and should only be invoked once at system startup.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11167">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11167">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11168">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11168">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11169">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11169">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11170">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı sistem başlatması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11170">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system initialize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11171">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) geçersiz GX_EVENT denetim bloğu boyutu veya olay kuyruğu/Mutex/iş parçacığı oluşturma başarısız oldu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11171">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) Invalid GX_EVENT control block size or event queue/mutex/thread create failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11172">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11172">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11173">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11173">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11174">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11174">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11175">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11175">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initialize GUIX. */
status = gx_system_initialize();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, GUIX has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11200">gx_system_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11200">gx_system_language_table_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11202">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11202">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_get( 
    GX_CHAR ****language_table,
    GX_UBYTE *languages_count, 
    UINT *string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11203">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11203">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11204">Bu hizmet etkin dil tablosu alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11204">This service retrieves the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11205">Bu işlev, kullanımdan gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11205">This function is deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11206">Tüm yeni uygulamalar, gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11206">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11207">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11207">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11208">**language_table:** Dönüş dili tablosuna işaretçinin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11208">**language_table**: Address of pointer to return language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11209">**languages_count:** Tablo sütunlarını iade etmek için değişkenin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11209">**languages_count**: Address of variable to return table columns.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11210">**string_count:** Tablo satırlarının dönüş işaretçisinin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11210">**string_count**: Address of pointer to return table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11211">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11211">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11212">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) etkin dil tablosu başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11212">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved active language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11213">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11213">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11214">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11214">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11215">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11215">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11221">gx_system_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11221">gx_system_language_table_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_memory_allocator_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11243">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11243">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11244">Bellek ayırma, ayırmayı geri alan işlevler atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11244">Assign functions for memory allocation, de-allocation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11245">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11245">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_memory_allocator_set(VOID *(allocate)(ULONG size),
    VOID(*release)(VOID *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11246">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11246">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11247">Bu hizmet, dinamik bellek ayırma ve ayırmayı geri alma için uygulama tarafından sağlanan geri çağırma işlevini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11247">This service assigns the application supplied callback function for dynamic memory allocation and de-allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11248">Uygulama tarafından dinamik bellek ayırma kullanan bir GUIX hizmetine ihtiyaç yoksa, bu hizmetin çağrılma ihtiyacı yoktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11248">If no GUIX service that uses dynamic memory allocation is needed by the application, this service does not need to be called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11249">Kullanılırsa, bu hizmet GUIX hizmet işaretçilerini temiz gx_system_initialize() sonra ve dinamik bellek ayırma kullanımını gerektiren herhangi bir GUIX hizmeti önce çağrıl kullanılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11249">If used, this service should be called after gx_system_initialize() which clears the GUIX service pointers, and before any GUIX service that requires use of dynamical memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11250">Çalışma zamanı bellek ayırma ve ayırmayı geri yükleme hizmeti gerektiren GUIX hizmetleri şunlardır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11250">GUIX services which require a runtime memory allocation and de-allocation service include:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11251">Dış depolamadan GUIX çalışma zamanı ortamına ikili kaynaklar yükleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11251">Loading binary resources from external storage into the GUIX runtime environment.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11252">Yazılım çalışma zamanı jpeg görüntü kod çözücü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11252">The software runtime jpeg image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11253">Yazılım çalışma zamanı png görüntü kod çözücü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11253">The software runtime png image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11254">Metin pencere öğelerini GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11254">Using text widgets with GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11255">Çalışma zamanı pixemap yeniden boyutlandırma ve döndürme yardımcı programı işlevleri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11255">Runtime pixemap resize and rotation utility functions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11256">Çalışma zamanı ekranı ve pencere öğesi denetimi blok ayırma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11256">Runtime screen and widget control block allocation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11257">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11257">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11258">**allocator:** Bellekocator işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11258">**allocator**: Memory allocator function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11259">**sürüm:** Bellek boş işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11259">**release**: Memory free function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11260">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11260">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11261">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarıyla atanan bellek ayırma işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11261">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned memory allocate function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11262">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11262">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11263">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11263">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11264">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11264">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11265">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11265">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11266">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11266">Example</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11267">Aşağıdaki örnek, bir ThreadX Byte havuzunu bir threadsafe dinamik bellek ayırma ve bellek ayırma hizmeti uygulamak için kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11267">The following example utilizes a ThreadX byte pool to implement a threadsafe dynamic memory allocation and memory de-allocation service.</span></span>

```C
TX_BYTE_POOL memory_pool;

#define SCRATCHPAD_SIZE (1024 * 4)

ULONG scratchpad[SCRATCHPAD_SIZE];

/* define memory allocation service */

VOID *memory_allocate(ULONG size)
{
    VOID *memptr;

    if (tx_byte_allocate(&memory_pool, &memptr, size, TX_NO_WAIT) == TX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return memptr;
    }
    return NULL;
}

/* define memory de-allocation service */
void memory_free(VOID *mem)
{
    tx_byte_release(mem);
}

/* create byte pool and install our dynamic memory services with GUIX
*/

VOID tx_application_define(void *first_unused_memory)
{
    /* create byte pool for GUIX to use */
    tx_byte_pool_create(&memory_pool, "scratchpad", scratchpad,
        SCRATCHPAD_SIZE * sizeof(ULONG));

    guix_setup();

    /* install our memory allocator and de-allocator */
    gx_system_memory_allocator_set(memory_allocate, memory_free);
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_pen_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11292">gx_system_pen_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11292">gx_system_pen_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11293">Kalem yapılandırmasını ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11293">Set pen configuration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11294">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11294">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_pen_configure(GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION *pen_configuration);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11295">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11295">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11296">Bu hizmet, olay türlerinin yeni nesilini tetiklemek için kullanılan kalem hızı ve uzaklık parametrelerini kontrol etmek GX_EVENT_FLICK ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11296">This service sets pen configuration to control the pen speed and distance parameters used to trigger the generation of GX_EVENT_FLICK event types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11297">gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist'nin GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION sabit bir nokta veri türü olduğu ve INT'den veri türüne dönüştürmek için GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(değer) GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11297">The gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION is a fixed point data type, and you should use GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11298">Örneğin, değer işareti başına minimum sürükleme mesafeyi 0,5 piksel olarak ayarlamak için, varsayılan değer gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2` gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11298">For example, if you want to set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel per tick, you have to set the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist to `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11299">GUIX 5.4.0 ve daha eski sürümlerde, GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION'nin gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist üyesi, GX_FIXED_VAL türü yerine (INT << 8) türündedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11299">In GUIX releases 5.4.0 and older, the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION was of (INT << 8) type rather than GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11300">Projeniz 5.4.0 sürümüne sahip GUIX kitaplığı bu API'yi kullanıyorsa GUIX kitaplığını oluştururken min_drag_dist parametresini veya #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY parametresini değiştirmeniz gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11300">If your project with 5.4.0 version GUIX library is using this API, you will need to modify the min_drag_dist parameter or #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY when building the GUIX library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11301">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11301">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11302">**pen_configuration** Kalem yapılandırma yapısına işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11302">**pen_configuration** Pointer to pen configuration structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11303">**Ek I,** GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION yapısının tanımını içerir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11303">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11304">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11304">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11305">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Kalem yapılandırmasını başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11305">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set pen configuration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11306">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11306">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11307">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11307">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11308">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11308">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11309">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11309">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define pen configuration, set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel
per tick, maximum pen speed to 10 ticks. That means GUIX will trigger
a vertical or horizontal flick event if the drag time is smaller than
10 ticks and the drag distance is bigger than 0.5 * drag_ticks. */

GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION pen_configuration;

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
Pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = (1 << 8)/ 2;
#else
pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_max_pen_speed_ticks = 10;

/* Set the pen configuration. */
status = gx_system_pen_configure(&pen_configuration);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the touch configure has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11310">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11310">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11311">Sistem ekran yığınını oluşturma ve başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11311">Create and initialize the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11312">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11312">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_create(
    GX_WIDGET **memory, 
    INT size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11313">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11314">Bu hizmet, sistem ekran yığını için kullanılacak bir bellek havuzunu tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11314">This service defines a memory pool to be used for the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11315">Sistem ekran yığını uygulama ekran akışı görünümünü yönetmek için uygulama tarafından kullanılabilen isteğe bağlı bir özelliktir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11315">The system screen stack is an optional feature that can be used by the application to manage application screen flow appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11316">Uygulama, ekran yığını hizmetlerini kullanmayı amaçladığında, önce ekran yığını bellek bölgesini ayarlamak için gx_system_screen_stack_create işlevin çağrılması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11316">If the application intends to utilize the screen stack services, the gx_system_screen_stack_create function must first be called to setup the screen stack memory region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11317">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11317">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11318">**bellek**: ayrılmış bellek bloğuna yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11318">**memory**: Pointer to the reserved memory block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11319">**Boyut**: ayrılan bellek bloğunun bayt cinsinden boyutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11319">**size**: Size, in bytes, of the reserved memory block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11320">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11320">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11321">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11321">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11323">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11323">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11324">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11324">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11325">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11325">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11326">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11326">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH 8
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2];

UINT status;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_screen_stack_create(screen_stack,
    sizeof(GX_WIDGET *) * SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack is initialized
and ready for use. */
```
