- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11331">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11331">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11332">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11332">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11333">En üstteki ekran yığını işaretçilerini aç</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11333">Pop the topmost screen stack pointers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11334">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11334">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_get(
    GX_WIDGET **popped_parent,
    GX_WIDGET **popped_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11335">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11335">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11336">Bu işlev en üstteki ekran yığını işaretçilerini ve bu işaretçileri çağırıcı için döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11336">This function pops the topmost screen stack pointers and returns those pointers to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11337">Bu işlev, pomış ekranın önceki üst öğeye otomatik olarak yeniden iliştirilmesi için gx_system_screen_stack_pop () öğesinden farklıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11337">This function differs from gx_system_screen_stack_pop() in that the popped screen is not automatically reattached to the previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11338">Bunun yerine, işaretçiler yığından alınır ve çağrıyı yapana döndürülür. Bu, çağıranın döndürülen ekranı eklemek veya atmak için istendiği gibi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11338">Instead, the pointers are popped from the stack and returned to the caller, allowing the caller to attach the or discard the returned screen as desired.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11339">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11339">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11340">**popped_parent:** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisini depolamak için konum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11340">**popped_parent**: Location to store the parent widget pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11341">**popped_screen:** Ekran işaretçisini depolamak için konum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11341">**popped_screen**: Location to store the popped screen pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11342">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11342">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11343">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Ekran yığını işaretçilerinin başarıyla alınması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11343">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11344">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11344">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11345">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11345">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11346">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x10) Geçersiz veya boş ekran yığını</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11346">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11347">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11347">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11348">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11348">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11349">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11349">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_WIDGET *parent_screen;

GX_WIDGET *popped_screen;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_get(&parent_screen, &popped_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, parent_screen and
popped_screen hold the topmost screen stack pointers. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11354">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11354">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11355">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11355">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11356">Sistem ekran yığınından en üstteki girişi aç</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11356">Pop the topmost entry from the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11357">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11357">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_pop();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11358">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11358">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11359">Bu işlev, ekran yığınının en üstteki girdisini açılır ve açılan ekranı otomatik olarak açılan üst pencere öğesine iliştirer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11359">This function pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11360">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11360">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11361">**yok**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11361">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11362">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11362">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11363">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Ekran yığını işaretçilerinin başarıyla alınması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11363">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfull retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11365">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11365">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11366">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x10) Geçersiz veya boş ekran yığını</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11366">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11367">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11368">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11368">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11369">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11369">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_pop();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the topmost screen stack entry has been
popped from the stack and re-attached to the previous parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11375">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11375">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11376">Ekran yığınına bir pencere öğesi ve üst işaretçi gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11376">Push a widget and parent pointer to the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11377">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11377">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_push(GX_WIDGET *screen)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11378">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11378">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11379">Bu hizmet, genellikle üst düzey bir ekran olan belirtilen pencere öğesine, ekran yığınına bir işaretçi koyar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11379">This service places a pointer to the indicated widget, which is usually a top-level screen, onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11380">Pencere öğesinin bir üst öğesi varsa üst öğeden ayrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11380">If the widget has a parent it is detached from the parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11381">Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi de ekran yığınına gönderilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11381">The parent widget pointer is also pushed to the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11382">Üst pencere öğesi NULL olabilir, yani görünmeyen veya herhangi bir üst öğeye bağlı olmayan bir ekran, ekran yığınına itilmiş olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11382">The parent widget may be NULL, meaning a screen that is not visible or attached to any parent may be pushed onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11383">Üst öğeye sahip olmayan bir pencere öğesi, ekran yığınına itilmiş ise, screen_stack_get () API 'sinin, screen_stack_pop () API 'sini kullanmak yerine, önceki üst öğeye yeniden iliştirmeye çalışır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11383">If a widget with no parent is pushed to the screen stack, the screen_stack_get() API should be used to retrieve the pushed screen pointer, rather than using the screen_stack_pop() API, which attempts to reattached the popped widget to its previous parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11384">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11384">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11385">**ekran**: ekran yığınına itilmiş pencere öğesinin işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11385">**screen**: Pointer to the widget to be pushed to the screen stack.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11386">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11386">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11387">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) kaydırma çubuğu görünümü başarıyla al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11387">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11388">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11388">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11389">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11389">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11390">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11390">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11391">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11391">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11392">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11392">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_push(window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget pointed to by “window” has
been pushed to the screen stack, along with the widget’s parent
ponter. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11398">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11398">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11399">Sistem ekran yığınını sıfırlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11399">Reset the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11400">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_reset();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11401">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11402">Bu işlev, sistem ekran yığınından tüm girişleri kaldırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11402">This function removes all entries from the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11403">Yığından çıkan ekranların GUIX Studio tarafından ayrılan dinamik olarak ayrılmış denetim blokları varsa, bu denetim bloklarının belleği serbesttir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11403">If the screens popped from the stack have dynamically allocated control blocks allocated by GUIX Studio, the memory for those control blocks is freed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11404">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11404">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11405">**yok**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11405">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11406">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11406">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11407">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Kaydırma çubuğu görünümünü başarıyla alın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11407">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11409">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11410">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11411">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11411">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11412">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11412">Example</span></span>

```C

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack has been cleared
of entries. */
```

```C
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *return_appearance);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11429">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11429">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11430">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11430">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11431">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11431">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11458">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11458">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11459">Kaydırma görünümünü ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11459">Set scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11460">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11461">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11462">Bu hizmet varsayılan kaydırma görünümünü ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11462">This service sets the default scroll appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11463">Bir kaydırma oluşturulduğunda, uygulama özel bir sürüm oluşturmadıkça bu görünüm yapısı kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11463">When a scroll is created, this appearance structure is used unless the application provides a custom version.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11464">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11465">**style:** Kaydırma stili `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` veya `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11465">**style**: Scroll style `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11466">**appearance:** Çeşitli kaydırma çubuğu görünüm öznitelikleriyle başlatılan görünüm yapısının işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11466">**appearance**: Pointer to appearance structure initialized with various scrollbar appearance attributes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11467">İlke **yapısının tanımı** için Ek I GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11467">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11468">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11468">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11469">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Kaydırma görünümü kümesi başarıyla ayarlanmış</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11469">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set scroll appearance set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11470">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11470">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11471">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11471">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11474">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11474">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

memset(&my_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

my_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;

my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style = GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

/* Set the scroll appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll appearance has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11498">gx_system_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11498">gx_system_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11499">GUIX'i başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11499">Start GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11500">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11500">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_start(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11501">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11501">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11502">Bu hizmet GUIX işlemeyi başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11502">This service starts GUIX processing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11503">Normal koşullarda bu işlev hiçbir zaman döndürür, ancak bunun yerine GUIX olay kuyruğu işlemeye başlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11503">Under normal circumstances this function never returns, but instead begins processing the GUIX event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11504">GUIX olay kuyruğu boş olduğunda, bu hizmet GUIX olay kuyruğuna yeni olaylar gelene kadar çağıran iş parçacığını askıya alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11504">When the GUIX event queue is empty, this service suspends the calling thread until new events arrive in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11505">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11505">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11508">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı sistem başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11508">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11510">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11510">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11511">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11511">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11512">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11512">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start GUIX. */
status = gx_system_start();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . GUIX has been started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11537">gx_system_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11537">gx_system_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11538">Dizeyi al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11538">Get string</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11539">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11539">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11540">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11540">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11541">Bu hizmet, belirtilen kaynak KIMLIĞI için dizeyi, ilk tanımlanan görüntüyü ve şu anda etkin dili kullanarak alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11541">This service gets the string for the specified resource ID, using the first defined display and the currently active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11542">Bu işlev, gx_display_string_get kullanım dışı bırakılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11542">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11543">Tüm yeni uygulamalar gx_display_string_get kullanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11543">All new applications should use gx_display_string_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11544">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11544">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11545">**string_id:** Dize kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11545">**string_id**: String resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11546">**return_string:** Dize hedef işaretçisine işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11546">**return_string**: Pointer to string destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11547">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11547">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11548">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı dize get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11548">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11549">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11549">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11550">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11550">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11551">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID:**(0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11551">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11552">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11552">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11553">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11553">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11554">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11554">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string associated with MY_STRING_ID. */

status = gx_system_string_get(MY_STRING_RESOURCE_ID, &my_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string is contained in “my_string”.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11559">gx_system_string_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11559">gx_system_string_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11560">Dize tablosu alır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11560">Retrieves the string table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11561">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11561">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_table_get(
    GX_UBYTE language,
    GX_CHAR ***string_table,
    UINT *get_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11562">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11562">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11563">Bu hizmet, istenen dil için dize tabloyu ilk görüntüden alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11563">This service retrieves the string table for the requested language from the first display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11564">Bu işlev, kullanımdan gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11564">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11565">Tüm yeni uygulamalar bir gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11565">All new applications should use gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11566">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11566">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11567">**language**: Dil dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11567">**language**: Language index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11568">**string_table:** Dize tablosu işaretçisinin depolama alanı işaretçisi veya çağıranın dize tablosu işaretçisini almak zorunda yoksa NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11568">**string_table**: Pointer to storage space of the string table pointer, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the pointer to the string table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11569">**get_size:** Dize tablosunda dize sayısı için depolama işaretçisi veya çağıranın dize tablosunda dize sayısını almak zorunda olmayan NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11569">**get_size**: Pointer to the storage for the number of strings in string table, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the number of strings in the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11583">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11583">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_width_get(
    GX_FONT *font, GX_CHAR *string,
    INT string_length,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11584">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11584">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11585">Bu hizmet gx_system_string_width_get_ext () kullanımı için kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11585">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11586">Bu hizmet, belirtilen yazı tipini kullanarak sağlanan dizenin piksel cinsinden görüntüleme genişliğini hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11586">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11587">String_length parametresi >= 0 ise, hesaplamaya yalnızca karakter istek sayısı dahil edilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11587">If the string_length parameter is >= 0, only the request count of characters are included in the calculation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11588">String_length parametresi-1 ise, hesaplamada, NULL sonlandırıcıya kadar olan tüm dize kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11588">If the string_length parameter is -1, the entire string up to the NULL terminator is used in the calculation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11589">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11589">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11590">**yazı tipi**: dizenin yazı tipine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11590">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11591">**dize**: dize işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11591">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11592">**string_length**: dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11592">**string_length**: Length of string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11593">**return_width**: dizenin genişliği için hedef</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11593">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11594">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11594">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11595">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı dize genişliği al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11595">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11596">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11596">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11597">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11597">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11598">**GX_INVALID_FONT:**(0x16) Geçersiz yazı tipi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11598">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11599">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11599">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11600">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11600">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11640">gx_system_timer_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11640">gx_system_timer_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11641">Zamanlayıcıyı Başlat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11641">Start timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11642">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11642">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_start(
    GX_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id,
    UINT initial_ticks,
    UINT reschedule_ticks);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11643">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11643">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11644">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere öğesi için bir süreölçer başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11644">This service starts a timer for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11645">Sabit GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS desteklenen en fazla etkin Zamanlayıcı sayısını tanımladı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11645">The constant GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS defined the maximum active timers supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11646">Bu değer için varsayılan ayar 32 ' dir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11646">The default setting for this value is 32.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11647">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11647">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11648">**sahip**: pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11648">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11649">**timer_id:** Süreölçer kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11649">**timer_id**: ID of timer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11650">**initial_ticks:** ilk sona erme saatlerinin işareti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11650">**initial_ticks**: initial expiration ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11651">**reschedule_ticks:** Düzenli süre sonu onayları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11651">**reschedule_ticks**: Periodic expiration ticks</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11652">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11652">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11653">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı zamanlayıcı başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11653">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11654">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS:**(0x04) Artık süreer yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11654">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) No more timers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11655">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11655">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11656">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11656">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11657">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11657">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11658">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Zamanlayıcı değerleri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11658">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Timer value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11659">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11659">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11660">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11660">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11661">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11661">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start a periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_start(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11679">gx_system_timer_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11679">gx_system_timer_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11680">Zamanlayıcıyı durdur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11680">Stop timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11681">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11681">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_stop(
    GW_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11682">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11682">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11683">Bu hizmet, çağırma pencere öğesiyle ilişkili belirtilen timer_id zamanlayıcıyı durduruyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11683">This service stops the timer with the specified timer_id associated with the calling widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11684">Belirli bir pencere öğesine bağlı tüm zamanlayıcıları durdurmak için, uygulama 0 ' ın timer_id değerini geçirebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11684">To stop all timers linked to a particular widget, the application can pass the timer_id value of 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11685">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11685">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11686">**sahip**: pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11686">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11687">**timer_id**: Zamanlayıcı kimliği veya tüm zamanlayıcılar için 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11687">**timer_id**: ID of timer, or 0 for all timers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11688">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11688">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11689">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı süreölçer durağı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11689">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11690">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Zamanlayıcı kimliği bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11690">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Timer ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11691">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11691">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11692">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11692">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11693">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11693">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11694">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11694">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11695">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11695">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11696">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11696">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_stop(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
stopped. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11768">gx_system_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11768">gx_system_widget_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11769">Pencere öğesi bul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11769">Find widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11770">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11770">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_widget_find(
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_level, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_search_result);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11771">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11771">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11772">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere öğesi KIMLIĞINI arar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11772">This service searches for the specified widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11773">Gx_widget_find () aksine, bu işlev sistemde tanımlanan tüm kök pencerelerin alt öğelerini arar, yani bu, tüm görünür pencere öğelerinin ayrıntılı bir aradır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11773">Unlike gx_widget_find(), this function searches the children of all root windows defined in the system, meaning this is an exhaustive search of all visible widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11774">Aradığınız pencere öğesinin üst öğesini biliyorsanız bunun yerine gx_widget_find () kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11774">If you know the parent of the widget you are searching for, use gx_widget_find() instead.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11775">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11775">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11776">**widget_id**: aranacak pencere öğesi kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11776">**widget_id**: Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11777">**search_level**: alt pencere öğelerinin aranacağı özyinelemeli iç içe geçme düzeyini tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11777">**search_level**: Defines the recursive nesting level into which child widgets are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11778">Bu değer 0 ise, her bir kök pencerenin yalnızca anlık alt öğeleri aranır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11778">If this value is 0, only immediate children of each root window are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11779">Bu değer GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE ise, işlev, istenen pencere öğesi KIMLIĞINI arayan tüm alt öğeleri arar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11779">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, the function nests down into all children searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11780">Başka herhangi bir değer > 0 ' da, arama düzeyi bu işlevin istenen pencere öğesi KIMLIĞI için ne kadar fazla arama yapılacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11780">For any other value > 0, the search level defines how deeply nested this function will go searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11781">**return_search_result**: pencere öğesi için hedef işaretçisi bulundu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11781">**return_search_result**: Pointer to destination for widget found</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11782">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11782">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11783">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi araması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11783">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful widget search</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11784">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) pencere öğesi kimliği bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11784">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11785">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11785">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11786">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11786">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11787">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11787">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11788">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11788">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Search recursively from the top level widget for the widget with
ID of MY_WIDGET_ID. */

status = gx_system_widget_find(MY_WIDGET_ID,
    GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE,
    &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the search was successful and
“my_widget” contains the pointer to the widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11813">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11813">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11814">Metin oluştur düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11814">Create text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11815">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11815">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_create(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11816">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11816">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11817">Bu hizmet bir metin düğmesi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11817">This service creates a text button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11818">GX_TEXT_BUTTON GX_BUTTON türetilir ve tüm gx_button API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11818">GX_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11819">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11819">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11820">**text_button**: metin düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11820">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11821">**ad**: metin düğmesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11821">**name**: Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11822">**Parent**: düğmenin üst pencere öğesine işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11822">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11823">**text_id**: METNIN kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11823">**text_id**: Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11824">**Stil**: metin düğmesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11824">**style**: Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11825">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11825">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11826">**text_button_id**: metin düğmesinin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11826">**text_button_id**: Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11827">**Boyut**: düğmenin boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11827">**size**: Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11828">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11828">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11829">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı metin düğmesi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11829">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11831">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11831">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11832">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11832">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11833">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11833">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11834">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11834">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11835">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11835">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11836">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11836">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11837">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11837">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON my_text_button;

GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Create text button “my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text button “my_text_button” was
created. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11855">gx_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11855">gx_text_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11856">Metin çizme düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11856">Draw text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11857">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11857">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11858">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11859">Bu hizmet metin düğmesini çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11859">This service draws the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11860">Bu hizmet normalde tuval yenilemesi sırasında dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel metin düğmesi çizim işlevlerinden de çağrılabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11860">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text button drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11861">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11861">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11862">**düğme:** Metin işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11862">**button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11863">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11863">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11885">gx_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11885">gx_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11886">İşlem metni düğmesi olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11886">Process text button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11887">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11887">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11888">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11889">Bu hizmet, belirtilen metin düğmesi için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11889">This service processes an event for the specified text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11890">Bu hizmet, özel metin düğmesi olay işleme işlevleri tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11890">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text button event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11891">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11892">**text_button** Metin düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11892">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11893">**event_ptr** İşlemeye devam etmek için olayın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11893">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11894">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11894">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11895">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı metin düğmesi olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11895">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11896">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11896">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11897">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11897">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11898">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11898">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11899">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11899">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11900">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11900">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11901">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11901">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text button event processing */
        status = gx_text_button_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11992">gx_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11992">gx_text_button_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11993">Düğme metni çizmek için destek işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11993">Support function to draw button text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11994">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11994">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_text_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11995">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11995">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11996">Bu destek işlevi, bir metin düğmesinin metin bölümünü çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11996">This support function draws the text portion of a text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11997">Bu işlev, gx_text_button_draw tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır ve özel düğme çizme işlevini tanımlayan uygulamalar için kolaylık olarak ayrı bir API olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11997">This function is called internally by gx_text_button_draw, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11998">Düğme arka plan çizimini özelleştirmek isteyen uygulamalar kendi özel çizim işlevini sağlar ve gx_text_button_text_draw hizmetini özel çizimlerinin bir parçası olarak çağırarak düğme metnini arka planda çizin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11998">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-11999">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-11999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12000">**text_button:** Metin işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12000">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12001">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12001">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12002">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12002">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12003">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12004">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12004">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12005">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */

VOID my_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw button background */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_text_button_text_draw(button);

    /* Draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12022">gx_text_button_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12022">gx_text_button_text_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12023">Metin düğmesinden metin al (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12023">Get text from the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12024">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12024">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_get(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12025">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12025">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12026">Bu hizmet gx_text_button_text_get_ext () kullanımı için kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12026">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12027">Bu hizmet, metin düğmesinden belirtilen dizeyi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12027">This service retrieves the specified string from the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12028">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12028">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12029">**text_button**: metin düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12029">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12030">**return_text**: metin düğmesinden alınan dizenin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12030">**return_text**: Pointer to the string retrieved from the text button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12031">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12031">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12032">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) düğmeden metin başarıyla alınır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12032">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get the text from the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12033">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12033">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12034">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12034">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12035">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12035">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12036">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12036">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12037">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12037">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12038">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12038">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *string;

/* Get the string from the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_get(&my_text_button, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string pointer from
“my_text_button” is retrieved and stored in string. */
```

```C
/* Get the string from the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_get_ext(&my_text_button, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string pointer and length from
“my_text_button” is retrieved and stored in string. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12105">gx_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12105">gx_text_button_text_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12106">Metin düğmesine metin atama (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12106">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12107">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12107">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12108">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12108">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12109">Bu hizmet, gx_text_button_text_set_ext() için kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12109">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12110">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dizeyi metin düğmesine atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12110">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12111">Text_button pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY oluşturulursa, pencere öğesi atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12111">If the text_button widget was created with style  GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12112">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz ve bu nedenle dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani otomatik veya geçici bir değişken olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12112">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12113">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12113">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12114">**text_button:** Metin işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12114">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12115">**text:** NULL ile sonlandırılan dizenin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12115">**text**: pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12116">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12116">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12117">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Metni düğme olarak başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12117">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12118">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12118">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12119">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12119">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12120">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12120">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12121">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) bellek ayırıcısı tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12121">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12122">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12122">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12123">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12123">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12124">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12124">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12125">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12125">Example</span></span>

```C

*/

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12130">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12130">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12132">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12133">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12134">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dizeyi metin düğmesine atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12134">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12135">Text_button pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY ile oluşturulduysa pencere öğesi, atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12135">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12136">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz, bu nedenle dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani bu bir otomatik veya geçici değişken olmayabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12136">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12139">**String**: GX_STRING değişkenine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12139">**string**: pointer to the GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12140">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12140">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12141">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) metin düğmeye başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12141">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12143">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12143">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12144">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12144">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12145">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Bellek ayırma tanımlanmadı veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12145">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12146">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12146">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12147">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12147">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12149">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12149">Example</span></span>

```C
new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

“my_text_button”. */

*/
```

```C
line text input widget. */

/* Set the blink interval value of “input_cursor” to 2. */

“input_cursor” has been successfully set to 2. */
```
