## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12220">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12220">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12221">Metin türü kaydırma tekerleğinin geri çağırma işlevini atama (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12221">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12222">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12222">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12223">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12223">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12224">Bu hizmet, gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext() kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12224">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12225">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleğinin her bir satırına görüntülenecek metin dizesini belirlemek için bir metin türü kaydırma tekerleğinin çağıracak olduğu geri çağırma işlevini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12225">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12226">Bu GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL için varsayılan geri çağırma işlevleri sağlanır ve uygulamanın bu varsayılan uygulamaları kullanmak için herhangi bir değişiklik yapmaları gerekmemektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12226">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12227">Bu API, uygulamanın, kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesinin her satırında görüntülenen biçimlendirme veya dizenin diğer parametrelerini özelleştirmesini sağlamak için sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12227">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12228">Geri çağırma işlevi, kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna ve görüntülenen satır numarasına bir işaretçi girişi olarak gönderilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12228">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12229">İşlev, bir metin dizesine bir işaretçi döndürmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12229">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12230">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12231">**tekerlek** Dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12231">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12232">**geri arama** Geri çağırma işlevine işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12232">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12233">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12233">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12234">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) geri çağırma başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12234">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12235">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12235">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12236">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12236">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12237">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12237">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12238">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12238">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12239">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12239">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

GX_CHAR *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
    }
    else
    {
        return(“Invalid”);
    }
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12256">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12256">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12257">Metin türü kaydırma tekerleğinin geri çağırma işlevini atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12257">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12258">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12258">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    UINT *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int, GX_STRING *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12259">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12259">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12260">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleğinin her bir satırına görüntülenecek metin dizesini belirlemek için bir metin türü kaydırma tekerleğinin çağıracak olduğu geri çağırma işlevini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12260">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12261">Bu GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL için varsayılan geri çağırma işlevleri sağlanır ve uygulamanın bu varsayılan uygulamaları kullanmak için herhangi bir değişiklik yapmaları gerekmemektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12261">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12262">Bu API, uygulamanın kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesinde görüntülenen dizenin biçimlendirmesini veya diğer parametrelerini özelleştirmesine izin vermek için sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12262">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12263">Geri çağırma işlevi, kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna bir işaretçi ve görüntülenen satır numarasını girdi olarak alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12263">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12264">İşlev, bir metin dizesi işaretçisi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12264">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12265">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12266">**wheel (tekerlek)** Dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12266">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12267">**geri çağırma** Geri çağırma işlevinin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12267">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12268">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12269">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Geri çağırma başarıyla ayarlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12270">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12271">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12271">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12272">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12272">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12273">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12273">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12274">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12274">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

UINT *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row,
    GX_STRING *return_string)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = string_buffer;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(string_buffer);
    }
    else
    {
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = “Invalid”;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(“Invalid”);
    }

    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12291">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12291">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12292">Metin kaydırma tekerleği oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12292">Create a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12293">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12293">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12294">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12294">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12295">Bu hizmet bir metin kaydırma tekerleği oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12295">This service creates a text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12296">Metin kaydırma tekerleği, GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL ve GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL türü pencere öğeleri için temel pencere öğesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12296">The text scroll wheel is a base widget for the GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL type widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12297">Bu işlev, gx_string_scroll_wheel_create ve gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır ve özel bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi tanımlayan uygulamalar için kolaylık olarak ayrı bir API olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12297">This function is called internally by gx_string_scroll_wheel_create and gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12298">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12298">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12299">**tekerlek**: metin kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12299">**wheel**: Text scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12300">**name:** Uygulama tanımlı pencere öğesi adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12300">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12301">**parent:** Tekerlek üst veya GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12301">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12302">**total_rows:** Kullanıcıya sunulacak toplam satır sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12302">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12303">**style:** İstenen stil bayrakları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12303">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12304">**Kimlik:** Uygulama tanımlı tekerlek stili bayraklar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12304">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12305">**boyut:** İlk kaydırma tekerleği boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12305">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12306">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12306">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12307">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Metin kaydırma tekerleği başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12307">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created text scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12308">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12308">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12309">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12309">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12310">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12310">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12312">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12312">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12313">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12313">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12314">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12314">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom scroll wheel widget. */
typedef MY_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRUCT
{
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL text_scroll_wheel;

    /* Add custom members here. */

} MY_SCROLL_WHEEL;

MY_SCROLL_WHEEL my_scroll_wheel;

UINT my_scroll_wheel_create(MY_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, ULONG style, USHORT Id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* Call base creation. */
    status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
        &wheel.text_scroll_wheel,
        ”my_text_scroll_wheel”, GX_NULL, 7,
        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SCROLL_WHEEL, &size);

    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Add custom initialization here. */
        if(parent)
        {
            gx_widget_link(parent, (GX_WIDGET *)wheel);
        }
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12333">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12333">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12334">Metin kaydırma tekerleği çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12334">Draw a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12335">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12335">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12336">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12336">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12337">Bu, GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL dayalı tüm tekerlek türleri için varsayılan çizim işlevidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12337">This is the default drawing function for all wheel types based on GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12338">Bu işlev, metin kaydırma tekerleği çizim görünümünü özelleştirmeyi gerektiren uygulamalar tarafından geçersiz kılınabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12338">This function can be overridden by applications that require customization of the text scroll wheel drawing appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12339">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL ve GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL, GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL dayanır veya türetilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12339">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL are both based on or derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12340">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12340">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12341">**tekerlek**: dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12341">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12342">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12342">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12343">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12343">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12344">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12344">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12345">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12345">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12346">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12346">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom wheel draw function. */
UINT my_wheel_draw(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw(wheel);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12363">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12363">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12364">İşlem metni kaydırma tekerleği olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12364">Process text scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12365">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12365">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12366">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12366">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12367">Bu hizmet, belirtilen metin kaydırma tekerleği için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12367">This service processes an event for the specified text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12368">Bu hizmet, herhangi bir özel metin kaydırma tekerleği olay işleme işlevi tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12368">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12369">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12370">**wheel (tekerlek)** Metin işaretçisi kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12370">**wheel** Pointer to text scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12371">**event_ptr** İşlemeye devam etmek için olayın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12371">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12372">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12372">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12373">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı metin kaydırma tekerleği olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12373">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12377">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12377">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12378">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12378">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12379">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12379">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12400">Metin kaydırma tekerleği tabanlı pencere öğesi metnini çizmek için kullanılan yazı tiplerini attayabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12400">Assign the fonts use to draw the text of a text scroll wheel based widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12427">gx_text_scroll_wheel_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12427">gx_text_scroll_wheel_text_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12428">Kaydırma tekerleği satırlarını çizmek için kullanılan renkleri atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12428">Assign colors used to draw scroll wheel rows</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12429">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12429">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_text_color_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12430">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12430">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12431">Bu işlev metin tabanlı bir kaydırma tekerleği satırları çizmek için kullanılan metin renklerini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12431">This function assigns the text colors used to draw a text based scroll wheel rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12432">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12432">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12433">**tekerlek**: dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12433">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12434">**normal_text_color**: seçili olmayan satırları çizmek için kullanılan renk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12434">**normal_text_color**: Color used to draw non-selected rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12435">**selected_text_color**: seçili satırı çizmek için kullanılan renk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12435">**selected_text_color**: Color used to draw selected row.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12436">**disabled_text_color**: devre dışı pencere öğesi için metin çizmek için kullanılan renk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12436">**disabled_text_color**: Color used to draw text for disabled widget.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12437">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12437">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12438">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) kaydırma tekerleği metin rengi başarıyla atandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12438">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned scroll wheel text color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12439">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12439">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12440">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12440">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12441">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12441">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12442">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12442">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12443">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12443">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12444">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12444">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

UINT status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_text_color_set(&wheel,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the colors used to draw the wheel text have been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12461">gx_tree_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12461">gx_tree_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12462">Ağaç görünümü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12462">Create a tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12463">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12463">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_create(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT tree_view_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12464">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12464">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12465">Bu hizmet, belirtilen şekilde bir ağaç görünümü oluşturur ve ağaç görünümünü sağlanan üst pencere öğesiyle ilişkilendirmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12465">This service creates a tree view as specified and associates the tree view with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12466">Tüm pencere öğesi türlerini alt menü öğesi olarak kabul eder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12466">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12467">Alt menü öğesi olarak GX_MENU pencere öğesinin kullanılması önerilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12467">It’s recommended to use GX_MENU type widget as its child menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12468">GX_TREE_VIEW, api GX_WINDOW türetilen ve tüm gx_window API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12468">GX_TREE_VIEW is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12469">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12469">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12470">**tree**: Ağaç görünümü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12470">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12471">**name:** Ağaç görünümünün adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12471">**name**: Name of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12472">**Parent**: üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12472">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12473">**Stil**: pencere öğesinin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12473">**style**: Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12474">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12474">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12475">**menu_id**: ağaç görünümünün uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12475">**menu_id**: Application-defined ID of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12476">**Boyut**: ağaç görünümünün boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12476">**size**: Size of the tree view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12477">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12477">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12478">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı ağaç görünümü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12478">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful tree view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12479">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12479">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12480">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12480">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12481">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12481">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12482">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12482">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12483">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12483">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12484">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12485">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12485">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12486">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12486">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_tree_view_create(&my_tree_view,
    “my_tree_view”, parent,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_TREE_VIEW_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the tree view was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12501">gx_tree_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12501">gx_tree_view_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12502">Ağaç görünümü çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12502">Draw tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12503">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12503">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12504">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12504">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12505">Bu hizmet belirtilen ağaç görünümünü çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12505">This service draws the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12506">Bu işlev normalde GUIX tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel ağaç görünümü pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevlerini uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12506">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom tree view widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12507">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12507">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12508">**ağaç** Ağaç görünümü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12508">**tree** Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12509">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12509">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12510">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12510">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12511">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12511">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12512">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12512">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12513">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12513">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom tree view draw function. */
UINT my_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_tree_view_draw(tree_view);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12528">gx_tree_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12528">gx_tree_view_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12529">İşlem Ağacı Görünümü olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12529">Process tree view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12530">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_event_process(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree, 
    GX_EVENT event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12531">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12532">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağaç görünümü için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12532">This service processes an event for the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12533">Bu hizmet özel ağaç görünümü olay işleme işlevleri tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12533">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom tree view event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12534">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12534">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12535">**ağaç**: ağaç görünümü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12535">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12536">**event_ptr**: işlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12536">**event_ptr**: Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12537">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12537">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12538">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı işlem ağacı görünümü olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12538">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful process tree view event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12539">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12539">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12540">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12540">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12541">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12541">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12542">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12542">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12543">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12543">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12544">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12544">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic tree view event processing as part of custom event
    processing function. */

UINT custom_tree_view_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
                event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
    }
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12737">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12737">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12738">Tuval anma resmini bit eşleme Dönüştür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12738">Convert canvas memort to bitmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12739">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12739">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *rect,
    UINT (*write_data)(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12740">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12740">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12741">Bu hizmet tuval belleğini bit eşlem dosyasına dönüştürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12741">This service converts canvas memory to bitmap file.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12742">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12742">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12743">**tuval**: tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12743">**canvas**: Canvas control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12744">**Rect**: dönüştürülecek dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12744">**rect**: Rectangle to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12745">**write_data**: verileri yazmak için geri çağırma işlev işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12745">**write_data**: Callback function pointer to write data to</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12746">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12746">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12747">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) tam sayı değeri dizeye başarıyla dönüştürüldü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12747">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12748">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz dönüş arabelleği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12748">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12749">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) geçersiz dönüş arabelleği boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12749">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12750">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12750">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12751">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12751">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12752">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12752">Example</span></span>

```C
FILE *fp = GX_NULL;

/* define call back function of how to write the data read from
canvas memory. */

UINT write_data_callback(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count)
{
    if (fp)
    {
        fwrite(byte_data, 1, data_count, fp);
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

VOID scroll_wheel_screen_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    UINT status;

    GX_RECTANGLE size = {31,31,610,450};
    gx_window_draw(window);
    if (screenshot)
    {
        fp = fopen("../screenshot.bmp", "wb");
        /* Convert canvas memory to bitmap format.
           Status GX_SUCCESS means operation succeed. */
        status = gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(root->gx_window_root_canvas,
            &size, write_data_callback);

        fclose(fp);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_circle_point_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12768">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12768">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12769">Dairenin üzerinde nokta hesaplama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12769">Calculate point on a circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12770">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12770">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_circle_point_get(
    INT xCenter, 
    INT yCenter,
    UINT radius, 
    INT angle, 
    GX_POINT *point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12771">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12771">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12772">Bu hizmet daire merkezine, yarıçapa ve açıya göre bir dairenin noktasını hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12772">This service calculates point on a circle given the circle center, radius, and angle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12773">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12773">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12774">**xCenter:** daire merkezinin x koordinatı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12774">**xCenter**: x coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12775">**YCenter**: Daire merkezinin y koordinatı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12775">**yCenter**: y coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12776">**yarıçap**: Daire yarıçapı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12776">**radius**: Circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12777">**açı**: Daire çevre noktasının derece cinsinden hesaplanacağı açı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12777">**angle**: Angle at which to calculate circle perimeter point, in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12778">**Point**: hesaplanan x, y koordinatını depolayacağınız GX_POINT değişkenin adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12778">**point**: Address of GX_POINT variable at which to store calculated x,y coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12779">**end_alpha**: bitiş alfa değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12779">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12780">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12780">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12781">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) gradyanı oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12781">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12782">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz dönüş noktası adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12782">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return point address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12783">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) geçersiz radius parametresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12783">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid radius parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12784">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12784">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12785">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12785">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12786">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12786">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point;
    UINT status;

        status = gx_utility_circle_point_get(100, 100,
20, 45,
&point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of point is the x,y coordinate of a point on the circle perimeter at an angle of 45 degrees, where the circle is centered at (100, 100), has a radius of 20 pixels */

```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12804">gx_utility_gradient_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12804">gx_utility_gradient_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12805">Gradyan piksel haritası oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12805">Create a gradient pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12806">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12806">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_create(
    GX_GRADIENT *gradient,
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height,
    UCHAR type, 
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha, 
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12807">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12807">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12808">Bu hizmet çalışma zamanında bir gradyan piksel haritası oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12808">This service creates a gradient pixelmap at runtime.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12809">Gradyan görüntü, soldurma etkilerini ve diğer ilgi çekici görsel değişiklikleri gerçekleştirmek için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12809">A gradient image can be used to accomplish fade effects and other interesting visual changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12810">İstenen gradyanın genişliği ve yüksekliği 2x2 pikselden az olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12810">The width and height of the requested gradient can be no less than 2x2 pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12811">GUIX, oluşturulan gradyanların listesini dahili olarak sürdürür ve bu işlev, yeni bir piksel haritası oluşturmadan önce eşleşen bir gradyan piksel haritası bulmak için gradyan listesini aratır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12811">GUIX internally maintains a list of created gradients, and this function will first search the gradient list to find a matching gradient pixelmap before creating a new pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12812">Başka bir deyişle, aynı gradyan piksel haritası birden çok kez gereklidir, aslında yalnızca bir piksel haritası oluşturulur ve bu piksel haritası gerektiren her gradyan oluşturulan piksel haritasını paylatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12812">In other words,  the same gradient pixelmap is needed multiple times, only one pixelmap is actually created, and each gradient that requires this pixelmap shares the created pixelmap.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12813">Bu API, gx_system_memory_allocator bellek ayırmaya izin vermek için gx_system_memory_allocator işlevinin tanımlanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12813">This API requires the gx_system_memory_allocator function be defined to allow runtime memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12814">Gradyan türü bayrakları, GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA ve GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12814">The gradient type flags include GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA and GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12815">Yalnızca GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA türü gradyanları de desteklemiştir (bu tür bayrağının ayarlanmış olması gerekir).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12815">Only  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA type gradients are currently supported (i.e. this type flag must be set).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12816">GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR bayrağı isteğe bağlıdır ve ayar olduğunda, gradyan oluşturma mantığına, start_alpha'den end_alpha'ye ve sonra yeniden start_alpha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12816">The  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR flag is optional, and when set  instructs the gradient creation logic to create a gradient that changes from start_alpha to end_alpha and back to start_alpha.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12817">Aksi takdirde doğrusal gradyan oluşturulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12817">Otherwise a linear gradient is created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12818">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12818">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12819">**gradyan:** Gradyan denetim bloğu yapısına işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12819">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12820">**width:** İstenen piksel haritası genişliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12820">**width**: Requested pixelmap width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12821">**Yükseklik**: istenen pixelmap yüksekliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12821">**height**: Requested pixelmap height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12822">**tür**: istenen gradyan türü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12822">**type**: Requested gradient type</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12823">**start_alpha**: alfa değeri başlatılıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12823">**start_alpha**: Starting alpha value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12824">**end_alpha**: bitiş alfa değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12824">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12825">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12825">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12826">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) gradyanı oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12826">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12827">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) gradyan en az 2x2 piksel değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12827">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradient is not at least 2x2 pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12828">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) gradyan türünde değil GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12828">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Gradient is not type GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12829">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) bellek ayırıcısı tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12829">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12831">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) gradyan işaretçisi geçerli değil<</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12831">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer not valid<</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12832">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) genişlik ve yükseklik değeri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12832">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width and height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12833">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) gradyan türü geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12833">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) Gradient type not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12834">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12834">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12835">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12835">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C

UINT status;

status = gx_utiity_gradient_create(&gradient, 3, 40,
    GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA, 240, 0);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the gradient pixelmap has been created */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12854">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12854">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12855">Önceden oluşturulmuş bir gradyan silme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12855">Delete a previously created gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12856">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12856">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_delete(GX_GRADIENT *gradient);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12857">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12857">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12858">Bu hizmet, önceden oluşturulmuş bir gradyan siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12858">This service deletes a previously created gradient.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12859">Bu gradyan ile ilişkilendirilmiş piksel haritası başka bir gradyan tarafından kullanımda yoksa, piksel haritası verileri de silinir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12859">If the pixelmap associated with this gradient is not in use by any other gradients, the pixelmap data will also be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12860">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12861">**gradyan:** Gradyan denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12861">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12862">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12862">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12863">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradyan silindi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12863">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12864">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12864">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12865">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Gradyan işaretçisi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12865">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12866">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12866">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12867">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12867">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12868">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12868">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

/* Delete previously created gradient. */
status = gx_utility_gradient_delete(&gradient);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS, the gradient has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_ltoa"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12886">gx_utility_ltoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12886">gx_utility_ltoa</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12887">Uzun tamsayıyı ASCII 'ye Dönüştür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12887">Convert long integer to ASCII</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12888">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12888">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_itoa(
    LONG value, 
    GX_CHAR *return_buffer,
    UINT seturn_buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12889">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12889">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12890">Bu hizmet uzun bir tamsayı değerini bir ASCII dizesine dönüştürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12890">This service converts a long integer value into an ASCII string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12891">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12892">**değer**: dönüştürülecek Long Integer değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12892">**value**: Long integer value to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12893">**return_buffer:** ASCII dizesi için hedef arabellek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12893">**return_buffer**: Destination buffer for ASCII string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12894">**return_buffer_size:** Hedef arabelleğin boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12894">**return_buffer_size**: Size of destination buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12895">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12895">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12896">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Tamsayı değeri başarıyla dizeye dönüştürüldi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12896">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12897">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz dönüş arabelleği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12897">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12898">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Geçersiz dönüş arabellek boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12898">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12899">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12899">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12900">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12900">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12901">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12901">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_value = 200;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[10];

UINT status;

/* Convert “my_value” into an ASCII string. */
status = gx_utility_ltoa(my_value, string_buffer, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “string_buffer” contains the ASCII
representation of “my_value”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_acos"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12917">gx_utility_math_acos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12917">gx_utility_math_acos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12918">İşlem yay kosinüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12918">Compute arc cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12919">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12919">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_acos(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12920">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12920">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12921">Bu hizmet, ark kosinüs x 'in açı değerini hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12921">This service computes the angle value of the arc cosine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12922">Giriş değeri sabit bir nokta veri türüdür, INT 'ten GX_FIXED_VAL türüne dönüştürmek için GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE çağırın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12922">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12923">Örneğin, 0,5 'in ark kosinüsünü hesaplamak istiyorsanız, girişi GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (1)/2 olarak yapın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12923">For example, if you want to calculate the arc cosine of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12924">5.4.0 veya daha düşük sürümde, bu işlevin giriş değeri türü INT 'tir ve değer [-256, 256] aralığıyla sınırlıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12924">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12925">Bu hizmeti çağırmak için uygulama [-1, 1] aralığından [-256, 256] aralığında değeri ölçeklendirmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12925">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12926">GUX sürümüne eşit veya daha küçük olan projeniz bu API 'ye başvuru içeriyorsa ve projenizi en son Gux kitaplığıyla yükseltmek istiyorsanız.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12926">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0 has reference to this API, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12927">İki seçenek sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12927">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12928">Bu API çağrısının giriş değerini, GX_FIXED_VAL veri türü değerini kullanacak şekilde düzeltir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12928">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12929">GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY tanımlayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12929">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12930">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12930">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12931">**x**: yay kosinüsü hesaplanan değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12931">**x**: Value whose arc cosine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12932">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12932">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12933">**açı**: ark kosinüs x 'in açı değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12933">**angle**: Angle value of arc cosine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12934">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12934">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12935">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12935">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12936">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12936">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc cosine of “0.5”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    x = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_acos(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc cosine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_asin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12954">gx_utility_math_asin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12954">gx_utility_math_asin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12955">İşlem ark sinüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12955">Compute arc sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12956">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12956">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_asin(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12957">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12957">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12958">Bu hizmet, ark sinüsü x'in açı değerini hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12958">This service computes the angle value of the arc sine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12959">Giriş değeri sabit bir nokta veri t GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE inT'den GX_FIXED_VAL çağrısıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12959">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL  type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12960">Örneğin, 0,5'in ark sinsini hesaplamak için girişi GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2 olarak edin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12960">For example, if you want to calculate the arc sin of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12961">5.4.0 veya daha küçük bir GUIX sürümünde, bu işlevin giriş değeri türü INT'tir ve değer [-256, 256] aralığıyla sınırlıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12961">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12962">Uygulama bu hizmeti çağırmadan önce değeri [-1, 1] aralığından [-256, 256] aralığına ölçeklendirmeli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12962">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12963">GUIX sürümü 5.4.0 veya daha küçük olan projeniz varsa ve projenizi en son guix kitaplığıyla yükseltmek istiyorsanız.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12963">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12964">İki seçenek sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12964">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12965">Veri türü değerini kullanmak için bu API çağrısının GX_FIXED_VAL düzeltin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12965">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12966">Veri GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12966">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12967">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12967">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12968">**x:** Ark sinüsü hesaplanan değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12968">**x**: Value whose arc sine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12969">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12969">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12970">**açı**: Ark sinüsü x açı değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12970">**angle**: Angle value of arc sine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12971">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12971">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12972">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12972">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12973">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12973">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc sine of “x”. */

#if defined GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    X = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_asin(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc sine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_cos"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12991">gx_utility_math_cos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12991">gx_utility_math_cos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12992">İşlem kosinüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12992">Compute cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12993">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12993">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_cos(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12994">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12994">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12995">Bu hizmet, sağlanan açının kosinüslerini hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12995">This service computes the cosine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12996">Giriş değeri sabit bir nokta veri t GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE INT'den GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12996">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12997">Örneğin, 90 derecenin kosinüs değerini hesaplamak için girişi GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90) olarak kullanabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12997">For example, if you want to calculate the cosine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12998">Dönüş değeri sabit bir nokta veri t değeridir ve GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT'den INT'ye GX_FIXED_VAL çağrısıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12998">The return value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-12999">5.4.0 veya daha küçük sürüm GUIX sürümünde, bu hizmetin giriş değeri ve dönüş değeri türü INT'tir, giriş değeri ve dönüş değeri 256 büyütülmüştür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-12999">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX version, the input value and return value type of this service is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13000">Bu nedenle, uygulamanın bu hizmeti çağırmadan önce açı değerini 256 olarak ölçeklendirmesi gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13000">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13001">GUIX sürümü 5.4.0 veya daha küçük olan projeniz ve projenizi en son guix kitaplığıyla yükseltmek için iki seçeneğiniz vardır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13001">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13002">Giriş değerini ve işlemeyi bu API çağrısının dönüş değerine göre düzeltin ve tarih GX_FIXED_VAL kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13002">Fix the input value and the handling to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL date type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13003">Veri GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13003">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13004">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13004">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13005">**açı:** İşlem kosinüs açısı:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13005">**angle**: Angle to compute cosine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13006">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13006">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13007">**kosinüs:** Sağlanan açının kosinüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13007">**cosine**: Cosine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13008">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13008">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13009">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13009">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13010">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13010">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute cosine of 90 degree. */

INT angle = 90;

#if defined (GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL scaled_angle = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(angle);
#endif

my_angle_cosine = gx_utility_math_cos(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_cosine” contains the cosine of “my_angle”. */
```
