## <a name="gx_utility_math_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13028">gx_utility_math_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13028">gx_utility_math_sin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13029">İşlem sinüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13029">Compute sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13030">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13030">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_sin(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13031">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13031">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13032">Bu hizmet, sağlanan açının sinüsünü hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13032">This service computes the sine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13033">Giriş değeri sabit bir nokta veri türüdür, INT 'ten GX_FIXED_VAL dönüştürmek için GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE çağırın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13033">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13034">Örneğin, 90 derecelik sinüsü hesaplamak istiyorsanız, girişi GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (90) olarak yapın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13034">For example, if you want to calculate the sine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13035">Dönüş değeri sabit bir nokta veri türüdür, GX_FIXED_VAL ' dan INT 'e dönüştürmek için GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT çağırın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13035">The return value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13036">5.4.0 veya daha düşük sürümde, giriş değeri ve dönüş değer türü INT 'tir, giriş değeri ve dönüş değeri 256 ile genişletilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13036">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value and return value type is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13037">Bu nedenle, uygulamanın bu hizmeti çağırabilmesi için açı değerini 256 ile Ölçeklendirmesi gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13037">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13038">GUX sürümüne eşit veya daha küçük bir sürüme sahip projeniz 5.4.0 ve projenizi en son Gux kitaplığıyla yükseltmek istiyorsanız iki seçeneğiniz vardır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13038">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13039">GX_FIXED_VAL veri türü değerini kullanmak için bu API çağrısının giriş değerini ve dönüş değerine teslim etme değerini onarın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13039">Fix the input value and the handing to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13040">GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY tanımlayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13040">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13041">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13041">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13042">**açı**: işlem sinüsü için açı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13042">**angle**: Angle to compute sine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13043">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13043">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13044">**Sinüs:** Sağlanan açının sinüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13044">**sine**: Sine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13045">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13045">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13046">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13046">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13047">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13047">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_angle = 80;

/* Compute sine of “my_angle”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = my_angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(my_angle);
#endif

my_angle_sine = gx_utility_math_sin(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_sine” contains the sine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_sqrt"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13065">gx_utility_math_sqrt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13065">gx_utility_math_sqrt</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13066">İşlem kare kökü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13066">Compute square root</span></span>

```C

```

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13092">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13092">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13093">BiDi metnini görüntüleme sırasına göre yeniden sırala</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13093">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13094">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13094">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO *input_info, 
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13095">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13095">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13096">Bu hizmet, BiDi metnini görüntüleme sırasına göre yeniden sıralar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13096">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13097">Metin çizme yazı tipi ve görüntüleme genişliği sağlanırsa, önce satır son çizgisi uygulanır, her satıra göre yeniden sıralama işlemi uygulanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13097">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13098">Sağlanan metin birden fazla paragraf içeriyorsa, hizmet metni paragraflara, her paragrafın satır sonu ve yeniden sıralama sonucu liste olarak bağlantılı hale gelecektir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13098">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13099">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13099">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13100">**input_info:** Satıra son dakika ve metin yeniden sıralama için bilgilerin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13100">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13101">**resolved_info_head:** Sağlanan metnin her paragrafı için satır hatasını ve yeniden sıralama sonuçlarını içeren bağlantılı listeye işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13101">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13102">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13102">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13103">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı çiftdi metni yeniden sıralama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13103">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13104">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz giriş işaretçileri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13104">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13105">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Bellek ayırma tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13105">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13106">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13106">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13107">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13107">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13108">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13108">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13109">Tuvale tek satırlı bidi metni çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13109">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13110">Tuvale çok satırlı bidi metni çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13110">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13111">Tuvale çok paragraflı bidi metni çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13111">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13130">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13130">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13131">Pixelmap 'i yeniden boyutlandır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13131">Resize pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13132">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination, 
    INT width, 
    INT height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13133">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13134">Bu hizmet bir pixelmap 'i yeniden boyutlandırır ve yeni bir pixelmap için bir işaretçi döndürür. Bu, pixelmap yeniden boyutlandırmanın sonucudur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13134">This service resizes a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap resize.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13135">Bu hizmet, yeniden boyutlandırılan pixelmap verilerini tutmak için belleğin ayrılmasına izin vermek üzere gx_system_memory_allocator_set önceki kullanımını gerektirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13135">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the resized pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13136">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13137">**src**: yeniden boyutlandırmak için pixelmap işaretçisine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13137">**src**: Pointer to the pixelmap to resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13138">**hedef**: elde edilen pixelmap için hedef arabellek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13138">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13139">**Width**: elde edilen pixelmap 'in piksel cinsinden genişliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13139">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13140">**Yükseklik**: elde edilen pixelmap 'in piksel cinsinden uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13140">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13141">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13141">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı pixelmap yeniden boyutlandırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13143">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz kaynak veya hedef pixelmap işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13143">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13144">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Genişlik veya yükseklik değeri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13144">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13145">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) kaynak pixelmap sıkıştırılmış biçimde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13145">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13146">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) bellek ayırıcısı tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13146">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13166">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13166">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13167">Piksel haritasını döndürme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13167">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13168">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src, INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx, 
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13169">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13170">Bu hizmet bir piksel haritasını döndürür ve piksel haritası döndürmesinin sonucu olan yeni bir piksel haritasına bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13170">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13171">Piksel haritasını doğrudan tuvale döndürmek için gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate() kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13171">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13172">Bu hizmet, bellek ayırmanın gx_system_memory_allocator_set piksel haritası verilerini tutmasına izin vermek için önceden gx_system_memory_allocator_set'nin kullanımını gerektirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13172">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13173">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13173">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13174">**src:** Döndürülacak piksel haritası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13174">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13175">**açı:** Derece olarak döndürme açısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13175">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13176">**destination:** Sonuçta elde edilen piksel haritası için hedef arabellek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13176">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13177">**rot_cx:** Hedef piksel haritasına göre döndürme merkezinin x koordinatı alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13177">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13178">Kaynak pixelmap 'e göre döndürme merkezinin x koordinatı ile başlatılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13178">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13179">Rot_cx GX_NULL, değer alınmayacak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13179">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13180">**rot_cy**: hedef pixelmap 'e göre döndürme merkezinin y koordinatı alındı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13180">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13181">Kaynak pixelmap 'e göre döndürme merkezinin y koordinatı ile başlatılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13181">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13182">Rot_cy GX_NULL, değer alınmayacak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13182">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13183">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13184">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı pixelmap döndürme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13184">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13185">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz kaynak veya hedef pixelmap işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13185">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13186">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) açı değeri 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13186">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13187">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) kaynak pixelmap sıkıştırılmış biçimde, bu desteklenmez</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13187">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13188">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) bellek ayırıcısı tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13188">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13189">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13189">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13190">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13190">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13191">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13191">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13208">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13208">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13209">Piksel haritasını döndürme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13209">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13210">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13210">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx,
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13211">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13211">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13212">Bu hizmet piksel haritasını 90 derece, 180 derece veya 270 derece döndürmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13212">This service rotates a pixelmap by 90 degree, 180 degree or 270 degree.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13213">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13213">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13214">**src:** Döndürülacak piksel haritası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13214">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13215">**açı:** Derece olarak döndürme açısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13215">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13216">**destination:** Sonuçta elde edilen piksel haritası için hedef arabellek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13216">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13217">**rot_cx:** Hedef piksel haritasına göre döndürme merkezinin x koordinatı alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13217">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13218">Kaynak piksel haritasına göre döndürme merkezinin x koordinatı ile başlatılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13218">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13219">Bu rot_cx GX_NULL değer alınmayacak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13219">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13220">**rot_cy:** Hedef piksel haritasına göre döndürme merkezinin y koordinatı alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13220">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13221">Kaynak piksel haritasına göre döndürme merkezinin y koordinatı ile başlatılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13221">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13222">Bu rot_cy GX_NULL değer alınmayacak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13222">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13223">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13223">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13224">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı piksel haritası döndürme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13224">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13225">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz kaynak veya hedef piksel haritası işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13225">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13226">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) açı değeri 0 veya 90, 180, 270 gibi basit bir açı değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13226">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13227">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) kaynak pixelmap sıkıştırılmış biçimde, bu desteklenmez</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13227">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13228">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) bellek ayırıcısı tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13228">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13248">Dikdörtgeni başka bir dikdörtgen içinde ortala</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13248">Center rectangle within another rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13250">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13250">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13278">Dikdörtgenin merkezini bul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13278">Find center of rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13279">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13279">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT *return_center);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13280">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13280">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13281">Bu hizmet, dikdörtgenin merkezini bulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13281">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13282">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13282">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13283">**dikdörtgen**: dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13283">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13284">**return_center**: merkez noktası işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13284">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13285">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13285">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13286">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) dikdörtgenin merkezini başarıyla buldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13286">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13287">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz giriş işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13287">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13288">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) geçersiz dikdörtgen boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13288">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13289">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13289">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13291">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13291">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_combine"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13307">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13307">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13308">İlk olarak iki dikdörtgeni birleştirin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13308">Combine two rectangles into first</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13309">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13309">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_combine(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13310">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13310">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13311">Bu hizmet birinci ve ikinci dikdörtgeni ilk dikdörtgende birleştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13311">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13312">İlk dikdörtgen ikinci dikdörtgeni içerecek şekilde genişletilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13312">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13313">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13313">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13314">**first_rectangle:** İlk dikdörtgen ve birleştirilmiş dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13314">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13315">**second_rectangle:** İkinci dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13315">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13316">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13316">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13317">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) İki dikdörtgen başarıyla birleştirildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13317">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13318">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz giriş işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13318">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13319">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13319">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13320">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13320">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13321">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13321">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13338">İki dikdörtgeni karşılaştırın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13338">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13339">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13339">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13340">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13340">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13341">Bu hizmet, birinci ve İkinci dikdörtgeni karşılaştırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13341">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13342">Eşitse, bir GX_TRUE değeri döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13342">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13343">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13343">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13344">**first_rectangle**: ilk dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13344">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13345">**second_rectangle**: ikinci dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13345">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13346">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13346">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13347">**sonuç**: dikdörtgenler eşitse GX_TRUE, aksi takdirde GX_FALSE döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13347">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13348">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13348">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13349">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13349">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13350">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13350">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13366">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13366">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13367">Dikdörtgen tanımlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13367">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13368">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13368">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_define(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13369">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13370">Bu hizmet bir dikdörtgeni belirtilen şekilde tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13370">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13371">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13371">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13372">**rectangle:** Dikdörtgen denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13372">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13373">**left:** En koordinatı sol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13373">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13374">**top:** En üst koordinat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13374">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13375">**right:** En koordinatı sağa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13375">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13376">**bottom:** En alt koordinat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13376">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13377">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13377">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13378">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) bir dikdörtgeni başarıyla tanımladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13378">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13379">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz dikdörtgen işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13379">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13380">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13380">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13381">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13381">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13382">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13382">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rect;

/* Define “my_rect”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rect, 10, 5, 200, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rect” is defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13398">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13398">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13399">Dikdörtgenlerin çakışmasını Algıla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13399">Detect overlap of rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13400">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13401">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13402">Bu hizmet, sağlanan dikdörtgenlerin çakışmasını algılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13402">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13403">Çakışma bulunursa, hizmet GX_TRUE dikdörtgeni döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13403">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13404">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13404">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13405">**first_rectangle:** İlk dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13405">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13406">**second_rectangle:** İkinci dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13406">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13407">**return_overlap_area:** Çakışan dikdörtgen alanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13407">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13408">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13408">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13409">**sonuç:** GX_TRUE çakışıyorsa, değilse GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13409">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13410">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13411">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13411">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13412">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13412">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13429">Noktanın dikdörtgende yer alıyorsa Algıla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13429">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13430">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13430">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13431">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13431">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13432">Bu hizmet, belirtilen noktanın dikdörtgen içinde olup olmadığını algılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13432">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13433">Nokta dikdörtgende yer alıyorsa, hizmet GX_TRUE döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13433">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13434">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13435">**dikdörtgen**: dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13435">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13436">**nokta**: nokta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13436">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13437">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13437">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13438">**sonuç**: nokta dikdörtgende yer alıyorsa GX_TRUE, aksi takdirde GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13438">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13439">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13439">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13440">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13440">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13441">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13441">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13457">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13457">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13458">Dikdörtgeni büyüt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13458">Grow rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13459">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13459">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_resize(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE adjust);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13460">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13461">Bu hizmet dikdörtgenin boyutunu belirtilen şekilde artırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13461">This service increases the size of the rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13462">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13462">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13463">**rectangle:** Dikdörtgen işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13463">**rectangle**: Pointer to rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13464">**ayarlama:** Dikdörtgeni ayarlamak için miktar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13464">**adjust**: Amount to adjust the rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13465">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13465">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13466">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Dikdörtgen başarıyla yeniden boyutlandırıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13466">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully resized the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13467">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz giriş dikdörtgeni işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13467">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13468">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13468">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13470">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13470">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Adjust “my_rectangle” by increasing 20 pixels on four sides */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_resize(&my_rectangle, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” is 20 pixels larger. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13486">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13486">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13487">Kaydırma dikdörtgeni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13487">Shift rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13488">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13488">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_shift(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13489">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13490">Bu hizmet, dikdörtgeni belirtilen değerlere kaydırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13490">This service shifts the rectangle by the specified values.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13491">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13491">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13492">**dikdörtgen**: SHIFT için dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13492">**rectangle**: Rectangle to shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13493">**x_shif**: x ekseninde kaydırma yapılacak piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13493">**x_shif**: Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13494">**y_shift**: y ekseninde kaydırma yapılacak piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13494">**y_shift**: Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13495">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13495">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13496">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) dikdörtgeni başarıyla kaydırın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13496">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully shifted the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13497">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz giriş dikdörtgeni işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13497">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13498">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13498">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13499">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13499">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13500">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13500">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;
```

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13516">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13516">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13517">Dizeyi 8bpp alfa harita türü piksel haritasına işleme (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13517">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13518">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13518">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(
    const GX_CHAR *text, const
    GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13519">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13519">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13520">Bu hizmet, gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext() için kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13520">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13521">Bu hizmet bir metin dizesini alfa haritaya işler. Bu, yalnızca alfa değerleri içeren 8bpp piksel haritasının özel bir biçimidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13521">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13522">Bu hizmet genellikle gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate ve gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw tuvale döndürülmüş metin çizmek için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13522">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13523">Bu hizmet, elde edilen alfa harita için gereken bellek boyutunu hesaplar ve uygulama tarafından dinamik olarak bellek ayırmak için tanımlanan gx_system_memory_allocator() işlevini çağırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13523">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13524">Uygulamanın bu hizmeti gx_system_memory_allocator_set() çağrısından önce, genellikle program başlatma sırasında bir noktada çağrısında olması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13524">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13525">Metin dizesi yalnızca bir kez döndürülerek tuvale çizilecekse alternatif olarak gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() hizmeti sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13525">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13526">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() işlevi, döndürülmüş metni tek bir işlemde işlemek için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap()), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate() ve gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() işlevini çağıracak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13526">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13527">Ancak aynı metin çeşitli açılarda birden çok kez döndürülecekse, gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API'sini kullanarak alfa haritasını oluşturmak ve ardından elde edilen alfa haritayı gerektiğinde birden çok kez döndürmek daha verimlidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13527">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13528">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13528">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13529">**text:** Alfa haritaya işılacak metin dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13529">**text**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13530">**font:** Metni işlemek için yazı tipi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13530">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13531">**return_map:** Çağıranın GX_PIXELMAP için işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13531">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13532">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13532">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13533">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) bir metin dizesini bir alfamap 'e başarıyla işlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13533">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13534">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz giriş işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13534">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13535">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) bellek ayırma/serbest bırakma işlevi tanımlı değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13535">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13536">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13536">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13537">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13537">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13538">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13538">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13539">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13539">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13541">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13541">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13542">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13542">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13543">Dizeyi bir 8bpp harfler eşleme türü pixelmap olarak işle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13543">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13544">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13544">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string,
    GX_CONST GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13545">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13545">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13546">Bu hizmet, yalnızca alfa değerlerini içeren bir 8bpp pixelmap özel biçimi olan bir alfamap 'e bir metin dizesi işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13546">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13547">Bu hizmet genellikle gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate ve gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw ile birlikte kullanılarak döndürülen metni tuvale çizmektir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13547">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13548">Bu hizmet, sonuçta elde edilen harflerden eşleşme için gereken bellek boyutunu hesaplar ve dinamik olarak bellek ayırmak için uygulama tarafından tanımlanan gx_system_memory_allocator () işlevini çağırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13548">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13549">Uygulamanın bu hizmeti kullanmadan önce, genellikle program başlangıcında, bir noktada gx_system_memory_allocator_set () çağrısı gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13549">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13550">Bir metin dizesi döndürülecektir ve tek bir kez tuvale çizildiyse, hizmet gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw () alternatif olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13550">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13551">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw (), döndürülen metni tek bir işlemde işlemek için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap (), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate () ve gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw () çağırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13551">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13552">Ancak, aynı metin çeşitli açılarda birden çok kez döndürülürse, gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API 'sini kullanarak bir kez daha verimli bir şekilde çizilecektir ve sonra sonuçta elde edilen harflerden oluşan Haritayı gerektiği gibi döndürün.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13552">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13553">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13553">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13554">**dize**: harflerden haritaya işlenecek metin dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13554">**string**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13555">**yazı tipi**: metni işlemek için kullanılacak yazı tipi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13555">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13556">**return_map**: çağırana döndürülecek GX_PIXELMAP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13556">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13557">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13557">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13558">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) bir metin dizesini bir alfamap 'e başarıyla işlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13558">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13559">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz giriş işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13559">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13560">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Bellek ayırma/serbest işlev tanımlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13560">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13561">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13561">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13562">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13562">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13563">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13563">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13564">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13564">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello World”;

string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

/* render string to alphamap once */
gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(&string, font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */
gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13604">gx_vertical_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13604">gx_vertical_list_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13605">Dikey liste oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13605">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13606">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13606">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13607">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13608">Bu hizmet dikey bir liste oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13608">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13609">GX_VERTICAL_LIST, api hizmetlerinden GX_WINDOW ve tüm api gx_window destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13609">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13610">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13611">**vertical_list** Dikey liste pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13611">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13612">**name** Dikey listenin adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13612">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13613">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13613">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13614">**total_rows** Dikey listede toplam satır sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13614">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13615">**geri çağırma** Liste kaydırıldıkları zaman dikey liste tarafından çağrılacak bir işlev.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13615">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13616">Çağıranın başlangıçta görünen liste satırlarını GX_WIDGET alt tabanlı yeterli veri kümesi oluşturması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13616">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13617">Liste kaydırıldı olarak bu işlev, sağlanan liste dizinine karşılık gelen liste altlarını yeniden oluşturmak için çağrılır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13617">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13618">**style (stil)** Kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13618">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13619">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13619">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13620">**vertical_list_id** Dikey listenin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13620">**vertical_list_id** Application-defined ID of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13621">**boyut** Dikey listenin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13621">**size** Dimensions of vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13622">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13622">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13623">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dikey liste başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13623">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13624">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13624">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13739">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13739">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-selected-widget-from-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13740">Seçili pencere öğesini dikey listeden Al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13740">Get selected widget from vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13741">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13741">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13742">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13742">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13743">Bu hizmet dikey listenin seçili pencere öğesini döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13743">This service returns the selected widget of the vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13744">Listede alt pencere öğelerinin daha fazla satır varsa ve seçili alt pencere öğesi görünümden kaydırıldığında, pencere öğesi yeni bir liste girişi görüntüleyecek şekilde yeniden kullanıldığından, bu işlev GX_WIDGET işaretçi olarak GX_NULL döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13744">Note that if the list contains more rows than child widgets, and the selected child widget has been scrolled from view, this function will return GX_NULL as the GX_WIDGET pointer, since the widget has been reused to display a new list entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13745">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13745">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13746">**vertical_list** Dikey liste pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13746">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13747">**return_list_entry** Dönüş listesi girdisi pencere öğesi hedefi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13747">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13748">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13748">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13749">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) dikey liste girişini başarıyla al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13749">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully get the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13750">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) seçili pencere öğesi görünümden kaydırıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13750">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) The selected widget has been scrolled from view.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13752">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13752">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13753">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13753">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13754">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13754">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13755">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13755">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *current_selected_widget;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of vertical list “my_list”. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_selected_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */
```

```C
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance,
    ULONG style);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13792">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13792">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13796">**ad** Kaydırma çubuğunun adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13796">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
