- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13799">**Stil** Kaydırma çubuğunun stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13799">**style** Style of the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13800">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13800">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13801">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı dikey kaydırma çubuğu oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13801">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful vertical scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13802">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13802">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13804">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13804">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13816">gx_widget_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13816">gx_widget_allocate</span></span>
### <a name="allocate-a-widget-control-block"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13817">Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu ayırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13817">Allocate a widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13818">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13818">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_allocate(
    GX_WIDGET **control_block,
    ULONG memsize);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13819">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13819">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13820">Bu hizmet, uygulama tanımlı bellek ayırma işlevini çağırarak dinamik olarak bir pencere öğesi denetim bloğu ayırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13820">This service dynamically allocates a widget control block, by calling the application defined memory allocation function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13821">Bu hizmet öncelikli olarak GUIX Studio özellikleri görünümünde "Dinamik Ayırma" özelliği seçildiğinde denetim bloğunun dinamik olarak ayırmak için GUIX Studio tarafından oluşturulan işlevler tarafından kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13821">This service is primarily used by the functions generated by GUIX Studio to dynamically allocate control block when the “Dynamic Allocation” property is selected in the GUIX Studio properties view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13822">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13822">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13823">**control_block** Döndürülen denetim bloğu işaretçisine işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13823">**control_block** Pointer to returned control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13824">**memsize** Bayt cinsinden denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13824">**memsize** Control block size, in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13825">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13825">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13826">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi ayırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13826">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget allocate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13827">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Bellek ayırma tanımlanmadı veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13827">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13828">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13828">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13829">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Bellek boyutu geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13829">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Memory size not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13830">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13830">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13831">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13831">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13832">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13832">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button;

/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_allocate(&button, sizeof(GX_TEXT_BUTTON));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the button widget control block is allocated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13870">gx_widget_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13870">gx_widget_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13871">Üst öğeye pencere öğesi ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13871">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13872">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13872">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13873">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13873">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13874">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi belirtilen üst öğeye iliştiriliyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13874">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13875">Pencere öğesi zaten başka bir üst öğeye eklenmişse, önce ayrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13875">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13876">Pencere öğesi zaten aynı üst öğeye eklenmişse işlev hiçbir şey yapmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13876">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13877">Pencere öğesi, z sıralama açısından üst öğenin en öndeki alt öğesi olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13877">The widget becomes the front-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13878">Küçük pencere öğeleri çakışıyorsa, bu pencere öğesi, altlıkların üzerine çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13878">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn on top of siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13879">Yeni pencere öğelerini z sırasına geri koymak için gx_widget_back_attach veya gx_widget_back_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13879">To put the new widget in the back of the z-order, use gx_widget_back_attach or gx_widget_back_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13880">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13880">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13881">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13881">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13882">**pencere öğesi** Alt pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13882">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13883">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13883">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13884">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13884">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13885">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13885">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13886">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13886">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13887">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) üst öğe veya pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13887">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13888">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13888">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13889">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13889">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13890">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13890">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13928">gx_widget_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13928">gx_widget_background_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-a-widget-background"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13929">Pencere öğesi arka planı çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13929">Draw a widget background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13930">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13930">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_background_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13931">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13932">Bu hizmet, bir pencere öğesi arka planının düz renk doldurmasını gerçekleştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13932">This service performs a solid color fill of a widget background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13933">Bu hizmet gx_widget_draw işlevi tarafından otomatik olarak çağrılır, ancak özelleştirilmiş bir pencere öğesi çizim işlevinin bir parçası olarak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13933">This service is automatically called by the gx_widget_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized widget drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13934">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13935">**pencere öğesi** Çizilecek pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13935">**widget** Pointer to widget to be drawn</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13936">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13937">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13938">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13939">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13939">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13940">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
    /* Call default widget background draw. */
    gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13978">gx_widget_back_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13978">gx_widget_back_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13979">Pencere öğesini üst öğesine Ekle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13979">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13980">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13980">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13981">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13981">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13982">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesini belirtilen üst öğeye iliştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13982">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13983">Pencere öğesi zaten başka bir üst öğeye eklenmişse, ilk olarak ayrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13983">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13984">Pencere öğesi zaten aynı üst öğeye eklenmişse, işlev hiçbir şey yapmaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13984">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13985">Pencere öğesi, üst öğenin z sıralaması bakımından en alt alt öğesi olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13985">The widget becomes the back-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13986">Eşdüzey pencere öğeleri çakışırsa bu pencere öğesi bu eşdüzey öğelerinin arkasına çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13986">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn behind those siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13987">Yeni pencere öğesini z düzeninin önüne koymak için gx_widget_attach veya gx_widget_front_move kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13987">To put the new widget in the front of the z-order, use gx_widget_attach or gx_widget_front_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13988">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13989">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13989">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13990">**pencere öğesi** Alt pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13990">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13991">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13991">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13992">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi iliştirme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13992">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13993">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13993">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13994">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13994">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13995">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) üst öğe veya pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13995">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13996">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13996">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13997">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13997">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-13998">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-13998">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_back_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14036">gx_widget_back_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14036">gx_widget_back_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-back"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14037">Pencere öğesini arkaya taşı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14037">Move widget to back</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14038">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14038">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_widget_moved);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14039">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14039">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14040">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesini üst öğe pencere öğelerinin Z düzeninde arka arkaya hareket ettirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14040">This service moves the widget to the back in the parent's Z-order of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14041">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14041">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14042">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14042">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14043">**return_widget_moved** Pencere öğesinin taşındığını belirten bayrak hedefi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14043">**return_widget_moved** Pointer to destination for flag indicating the widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14044">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14044">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi geri git</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14046">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14046">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14047">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14047">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14048">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Hiçbir değişiklik uygulanmaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14048">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) No changes are applied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14049">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14049">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14050">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14051">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14052">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14052">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move “my_widget” to the back. */
status = gx_widget_back_move(&my_widget, &moved_flag);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “moved_flag” is GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” was moved to the back. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14089">gx_widget_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14089">gx_widget_block_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-a-rectangular-block-of-pixels"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14090">Dikdörtgen bir piksel bloğu taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14090">Move a rectangular block of pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14091">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14091">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_block_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    INT xshift, INT yshift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14092">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14092">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14093">Bu hizmet dikdörtgen bir piksel bloğu taşır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14093">This service moves a rectangular block of pixels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14094">Bu hizmet genellikle hızlı kaydırma uygulamak için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14094">This service is most often used to implement fast scrolling.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14095">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14095">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14096">**pencere öğesi** Blok taşıma isteğine pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14096">**widget** Pointer to widget requesting block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14097">**engelle** Taşınan dikdörtgen sınırlayıcı blok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14097">**block** Rectangle bounding block to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14098">**xshift** Piksel cinsinden x kaydırma miktarı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14098">**xshift** The x shift amount in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14099">**yshift** Piksel cinsinden y kaydırma miktarı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14099">**yshift** The y shift amount in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14100">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14100">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14101">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi geri taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14101">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14102">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Pencere öğesi tuvali bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14102">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14103">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14103">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14104">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14104">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14105">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14105">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14106">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14106">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14107">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14107">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14108">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14108">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move a block of pixels 20 pixels to the right. */
status = gx_widget_block_move(&my_widget, &size, 20, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the block of pixels was moved. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14145">gx_widget_border_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14145">gx_widget_border_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14146">Pencere öğesi kenarlığı çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14146">Draw widget border</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14147">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14147">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_border_draw(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_COLOR border_color,
    GX_COLOR upper_fill, 
    GX_COLOR lower_fill, 
    GX_BOOL fill);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14148">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14148">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14149">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi kenarlığı çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14149">This service draws the widget border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14150">Bu hizmet normalde pencere öğesi çizim işlevinin bir parçası olarak çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14150">This service is normally invoked as part of a widget drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14151">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi kenarlık stili bayraklarını kenarlık, ince kenarlık, yükseltilmiş kenarlık, kenarlık veya kalın kenarlık çizmek için yorumlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14151">This service interprets the widget border style flags to draw no border, a thin border, a raised border, a recessed border, or a thick border.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14152">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14152">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14153">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14153">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14154">**border_color** Kenarlık rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14154">**border_color** Color of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14155">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14155">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14156">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14156">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14157">**upper_fill** Üst dolgunun rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14157">**upper_fill** Color of upper fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14158">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14158">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14159">Uygulamanın de özel renkler ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14159">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14160">**lower_fill** Alt dolgunun rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14160">**lower_fill** Color of lower fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14161">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14161">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14162">Uygulamanın de özel renkler ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14162">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14163">**doldur** Bu Boole bayrağı, pencere öğesi alanının sağlanan dolgu renkleriyle doldurulup doldurulmayacağını gösterir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14163">**fill** This boolean flag indicates whether or not the widget area should be filled with the supplied fill colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14164">Bu değer GX_FALSE ise yalnızca pencere öğesi kenarlığı çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14164">If this value is GX_FALSE, only the widget border is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14165">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14165">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14166">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14166">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14167">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14167">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14168">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14168">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14169">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14169">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
      /* Call widget border draw. */
      gx_widget_border_draw(widget, GX_COLOR_BLACK,
                            GX_COLOR_GREEN, GX_COLOR_BLUE,
                            GX_TRUE);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */

      /* Draw child widgets. */
      Gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14206">gx_widget_border_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14206">gx_widget_border_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-border-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14207">Pencere öğesi kenarlık stilini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14207">Set widget border style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14208">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14208">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14209">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14209">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14210">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesi kenarlık stilini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14210">This service sets the widget border style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14211">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14211">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14212">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14212">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14213">**Stil** Kenarlık stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14213">**style** Style of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14214">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14214">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14215">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14215">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14216">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi kenarlık stili kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14216">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget border style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14217">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14217">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14218">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14218">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14219">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14219">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14220">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14220">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14221">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14221">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14222">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14222">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set border style of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_style_set(&my_widget,
                                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” border style has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14259">gx_widget_border_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14259">gx_widget_border_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-border-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14260">Pencere öğesi kenarlık genişliğini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14260">Get widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14261">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14261">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14262">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14263">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi kenarlık genişliğini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14263">This service gets the widget border width.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14264">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14264">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14265">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14265">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14266">**return_width** Pencere öğesi kenarlık genişliği için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14266">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14267">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14267">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14268">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kenarlık genişliği başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14268">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved border width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14271">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14272">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14272">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14273">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14273">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_width;

/* Get border width of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_width_get(&my_widget, &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_width” contains the border width of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_canvas_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14310">gx_widget_canvas_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14310">gx_widget_canvas_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14311">Pencere öğesi tuvali al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14311">Get widget canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14312">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14312">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_canvas_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_CANVAS **return_canvas)
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14313">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14314">Bu hizmet, bu pencere öğesinin üzerinde işlendiği tuvale bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14314">This service returns a pointer to the canvas onto which this widget is rendered.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14315">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14316">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14316">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14317">**return_canvas** Pencere öğesi tuvali için hedefin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14317">**return_canvas** Pointer to destination for widget’s canvas</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14318">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14318">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14319">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi tuvali get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14319">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget canvas get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14320">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Pencere öğesi tuvali bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14320">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14323">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14324">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14324">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14325">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get canvas associated with “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_canvas_get(&my_widget, &my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_canvas” contains the canvas of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_child_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14363">gx_widget_child_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14363">gx_widget_child_detect</span></span>
### <a name="detect-widget-child"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14364">Alt pencere öğesi algılama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14364">Detect widget child</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14365">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14365">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_child_detect(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *child,
    GX_BOOL *return_detect);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14366">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14366">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14367">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesi üst pencere öğesi alt öğesi olup olduğunu algılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14367">This service detects if the widget is a child of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14368">Bu hizmet, alt öğeleri aramak için iç içe geçmiştir ve üst pencere öğesi alt pencere öğesi üst öğesi düzeyinde ise TRUE döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14368">This service nests to search children of children, and returns TRUE if the parent widget is at any level an ancestor of the child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14369">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14370">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14370">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14371">**alt** Alt pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14371">**child** Pointer to child widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14372">**return_detect** Algılama için hedefin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14372">**return_detect** Pointer to destination for detection</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14373">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14373">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14374">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi alt algılama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14374">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget child detection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Üst veya alt pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or child widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14377">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14377">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14378">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14378">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14379">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14379">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL detected;

/* Determine if “my_child” is a child of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_child_detect(&my_widget, &my_child, &detected);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “detected” is GX_TRUE, “my_child” is a child of widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_children_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14416">gx_widget_children_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14416">gx_widget_children_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-children"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14417">Pencere öğesi öğelerini çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14417">Draw widget children</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14418">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14418">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_children_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14419">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14419">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14420">Bu hizmet, üst pencere öğesi için tüm alt öğeleri çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14420">This service draws all children of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14421">Bu hizmet normalde mevcut alt pencere öğelerini çizmek için tüm standart pencere öğesi çizim işlevleri tarafından çağrılır ve alt pencere öğelerinin özel üst pencere öğesi türünüze ekli olmasına izin vermek için tüm özel çizim işlevleri tarafından çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14421">This service is normally invoked by all standard widget drawing functions to draw any existing child widgets, and should be invoked by any custom drawing functions to allow child widgets to be attached to your custom parent widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14422">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14423">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14423">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14424">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14424">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14425">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14425">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14426">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14426">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14427">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14427">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14428">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14428">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
        /* Call default widget background draw. */
        gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

        /* Add your own drawing here. */

        /* Draw child widgets. */
        gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_client_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14465">gx_widget_client_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14465">gx_widget_client_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-client-area"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14466">Pencere öğesi istemci alanı al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14466">Get widget client area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14467">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14467">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_client_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE border_width,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_client_area);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14468">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14469">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesi kenarlığı genişliğini genel pencere öğesi boyutundan çıkararak pencere öğesi istemci alanı hesaplıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14469">This service computes the client area of widget by subtracting the widget border width from the overall widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14470">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14470">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14471">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14471">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14472">**border_width** Pencere öğesi kenarlığı genişliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14472">**border_width** Width of widget border</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14473">**return_client_area** İstemci alanı döndüren hedef</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14473">**return_client_area** Destination for returning client area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14474">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14474">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14475">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi istemci alanı get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14475">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget client area get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14476">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14476">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14477">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14477">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14478">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) pencere öğesi kenarlığı geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14478">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Widget border not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14479">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14479">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14480">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14480">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14481">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14481">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE client_area
/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_client_get(&my_widget, my_widget_width,
                              &client_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “client_area” is the client area of “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14518">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14518">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14519">Renk al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14519">Get color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14520">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14520">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_color_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14521">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14522">Bu hizmet, sağlanan kaynak KIMLIĞIYLE ilişkili rengi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14522">This service gets the color associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14523">Bu hizmet yalnızca görünür pencere öğeleri tarafından çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14523">This service should only be called by visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14524">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14525">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14525">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14526">**resource_id** Rengin kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14526">**resource_id** Resource ID of color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14527">**Ek B** önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14527">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14528">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14528">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14529">**return_color** Renge yönelik hedefin işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14529">**return_color** Pointer to destination for color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14530">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14530">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14531">Uygulamanın de özel renkler ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14531">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14532">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14532">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14533">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı renk al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14533">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14534">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14534">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14535">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) pencere öğesi tuvali geçerli değil veya pencere öğesi görünmez</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14535">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14536">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14536">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14537">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14537">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14538">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14538">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14539">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14539">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14540">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14540">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR actual_color;

/* Get color for resource ID MY_FIRST_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_widget_color_get(my_widget, MY_FIRST_COLOR_RESOURCE_ID,
                            &actual_color);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the actual color is contained in “actual_color”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14544">gx_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14544">gx_widget_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14545">Pencere öğesi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14545">Create widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14546">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14546">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_create(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14547">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14547">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14548">Bu hizmet bir pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14548">This service creates a widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14549">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14549">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14550">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14550">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14551">**name** Pencere öğesi mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14551">**name** Logical name of widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14552">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14552">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14553">**style (stil)** Stil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14553">**style** Style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14554">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14554">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14555">**widget_id** Pencere öğesi uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14555">**widget_id** Application-defined ID of the widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14556">**boyut** Pencere öğesi boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14556">**size** Size of the widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14557">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14557">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14558">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14558">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14566">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14566">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET my_widget;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_create(&my_widget, "my widget",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_WIDGET_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_created_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14603">gx_widget_created_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14603">gx_widget_created_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-if-widget-created"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14604">Pencere öğesi oluşturulsa bile test edin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14604">Test if widget created</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14605">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14605">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_created_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14606">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14606">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14607">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesi önceden oluşturulmuş olup olmadığını belirlemek için testler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14607">This service tests to determine if the widget has previously been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14608">Hiçbir hatayla karşılaşilmezse, pencere öğesi GX_SUCCESS oluşturulmamışsa bu işlev yeniden işleve geri döner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14608">If no errors are encountered, this function return GX_SUCCESS, regardless if the widget is created yet or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14609">Testin sonucu, test işaretçisinde return_test olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14609">The result of the test is in the return_test pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14610">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14611">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14611">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14612">**return_test** Test sonucu hedefi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14612">**return_test** Destination for test result</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14613">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14613">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı test tamamlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful test completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14615">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14615">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14616">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14616">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14617">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14617">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14618">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14618">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL was_created;

/* Test to see if widget “my_widget” is created. */
status = gx_widget_created_test(&my_widget, &was_created);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, no error occurred. If “was_created” is
GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14655">gx_widget_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14655">gx_widget_delete</span></span>
### <a name="delete-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14656">Pencere öğesi silme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14656">Delete widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14657">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14657">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_delete(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14658">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14658">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14659">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14659">This service deletes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14660">Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu dinamik olarak ayrılmışsa gx_system_memory_free hizmeti, dinamik olarak ayrılan depolama alanını serbest bırakmak için çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14660">If the widget control block is dynamically allocated, the gx_system_memory_free service is invoked to free dynamically allocated storage.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14661">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14661">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14662">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14662">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14663">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14663">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14664">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi silme GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) bu işlevin geçersiz çağıranı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14664">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget delete GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14665">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14665">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14666">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14666">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14667">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) bellek boş işlevi tanımlı değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14667">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14707">gx_widget_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14707">gx_widget_detach</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14709">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14709">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_detach(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14710">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14710">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14711">Bu hizmet pencere öğesini üst öğesinden ayırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14711">This service detaches the widget from its parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14712">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14712">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14717">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14717">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14718">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14718">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14757">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14757">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14758">Pencere öğesi çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14758">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14759">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14759">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14760">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14760">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14761">Bu hizmet pencere öğesini çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14761">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14762">Bu işlev normalde Gux tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çizim işlevlerini uygulamaya yardımcı olmak için uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14762">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14763">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14763">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14764">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14764">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14765">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14765">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14766">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14766">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14767">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14767">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14768">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14768">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14769">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14769">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14806">gx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14806">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-widget-drawing-function"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14807">Pencere öğesi çizim işlevini ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14807">Assign the widget drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14808">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14808">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_draw_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14809">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14809">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14810">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesinin varsayılan çizim işlevini geçersiz kılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14810">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14811">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14812">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14812">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14813">**drawing_function** Çizim işlevine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14813">**drawing_function** Pointer to drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14814">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14814">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi çizim işlevi geçersiz kılma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14819">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14820">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14821">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14821">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14858">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14858">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14859">Pencere öğesi olayı oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14859">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14860">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14860">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14861">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14862">Bu hizmet, belirli bir tür veya GX_EVENT sınıfı olan GX_SIGNAL bir olay türü oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14862">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14863">gx_widget_event_generate (), 16 bit pencere öğesi KIMLIĞINI, geçirilen event_type ile birlikte tek bir 32 bit GX_EVENT. gx_event_type değerine kodluyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14863">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14864">Değer parametresi, oluşturulan gx_event kodlandı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14864">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14865">gx_event_payload gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata alanı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14865">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14866">Oluşturulan event.gx_event_target alanı her zaman çağıran pencere öğesi üst öğesiyle yüklenir, yani oluşturulan olay her zaman önce oluşturan pencere öğesi üst öğeye gönderilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14866">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14867">Yalnızca gx_widget_event_generate olay türlerini göndermek için GX_SIGNAL gerektiğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14867">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14868">Kullanıcı tanımlı olay türleri de dahil olmak üzere diğer tüm olay türleri için GUIX olay kuyruğuna iletilan olayın her alanı üzerinde tam denetime sahip olan gx_system_event_send() API'sini kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14868">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14869">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14869">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14870">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14870">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14871">**event_type** Olay türü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14871">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14872">**Ek E,** önceden tanımlanmış GUIX olayları içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14872">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14873">Uygulama tarafından ek olaylar eklenebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14873">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14874">**value (değer)** Ek olay bilgileri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14874">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14875">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14875">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14876">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi olay oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14876">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event generation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14878">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14878">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14880">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14880">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14881">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14881">Threads</span></span>
