## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14920">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14920">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14921">İşlem pencere öğesi olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14921">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14922">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14922">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14923">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14924">Bu, tüm pencere öğeleri için varsayılan olay işleme işlevidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14924">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14925">Özel bir olay işleme işlevi yazıldığı zaman, herhangi bir olay türü için varsayılan eylem her zaman olayı bir pencere öğesi tabanlı pencere öğesi türüne iletir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14925">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14926">En temel uygulama türüne dayanan pencere öğeleri GX_WIDGET varsayılan olay gx_widget_event_process işlevi olarak gx_widget_event_process'leri kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14926">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14927">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14927">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14928">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14928">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14929">**event (olay)** İşlemeye olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14929">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14930">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14930">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14931">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi olay işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14931">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14935">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14935">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14936">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14936">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14937">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14937">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Process event “my_event” for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process(&my_widget, &my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event “my_event” for widget “my_widget” has been processed. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14974">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14974">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14975">Pencere öğesi olay işleme işlevini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14975">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14976">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14977">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14978">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesi olay işleme işlevini geçersiz kılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14978">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14979">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14979">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14980">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14980">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14981">**event_processing** Yeni olay işleme işlevine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14981">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14982">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14982">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14983">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi olay işleme geçersiz kılma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14983">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14984">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14984">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14985">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14985">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14986">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14986">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14987">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14987">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-14988">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-14988">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_to_parent(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

## <a name="gx_widget_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15076">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15076">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-background-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15077">Pencere öğesi arka plan rengini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15077">Set widget background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15078">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15078">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15079">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15079">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15080">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesi arka plan renklerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15080">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15081">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15081">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15082">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15082">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15083">**normal_color_id** Normal durumdaki Fill renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15083">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15084">**Ek A** , önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15084">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15085">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15085">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15086">**selected_color_id** Pencere öğesi odaklanıldığında, Fill Color kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15086">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15087">**Ek A** , önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15087">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15088">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15088">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15089">**disabled_color_id** Stil GX_STYLE_ENABLED ayarlanmamışsa, Fill Color kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15089">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15090">**Ek A** , önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15090">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15091">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15091">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pencere öğesi dolgusu rengi başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set widget fill color</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15136">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15136">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15137">Üst pencere öğesi alt pencere öğesi bul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15137">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15138">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15139">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15140">Bu hizmet, istenen kimlik değerine sahip bir pencere öğesi arayan belirtilen üst öğenin alt öğelerini arar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15140">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15141">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15141">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15142">**parent** Aramanın başlat olduğu üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15142">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15143">**widget_id** Aranan pencere öğesi kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15143">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15144">**search_depth** İşlevin alt pencere öğelerini arayıcı olduğu, tekrarlayan iç içe yerleştirme düzeyini tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15144">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15145">Bu değer = <0 ise, yalnızca üst pencere öğesi alt öğeleri aranır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15145">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15146">Bu değer GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE alt pencere öğelerinin tüm alt öğeleri kapsamlı olarak aranır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15146">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15147">0 değerine sahip > değer, bu işlevin istenen pencere öğesi kimliği için arama yapılan alt pencere öğelerinde ne kadar derin iç içe geçmiş olduğunu sınırlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15147">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15148">**return_widget** Bulunan pencere öğesi için hedefin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15148">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15149">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15149">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15150">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi bulma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15150">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15151">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Pencere Öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15151">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15152">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15152">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15153">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15153">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15154">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15154">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15155">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15155">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15156">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15156">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *widget_found;

/* Find widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_find(&my_widget, GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE
                        MY_WIDGET_ID, &widget_found);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pointer “widget_found” contains the pointer to the widget found. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15193">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15193">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15194">İlk alt pencere öğesi için işaretçiyi iade edin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15194">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15195">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15195">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15196">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15196">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15197">GUIX, üst ve alt pencere öğelerinin ağaç yapılandırılmış listesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15197">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15198">Bu hizmet, üst öğenin ilk alt pencere öğesi için bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15198">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15199">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15199">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15200">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15200">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15201">**widget_return** Pencere öğesi işaretçisini iade etmek için işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15201">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15202">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15202">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15203">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) işaretçisi döndürüldü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15203">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15204">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15204">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15205">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15205">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15206">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15206">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15207">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15207">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15208">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15208">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15215">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15215">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-next-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15216">Odağı gezinti sırasında sonraki pencere öğesine taşı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15216">Move focus to next widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15217">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15217">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_next(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15218">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15218">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15219">Bu hizmet, odağı kabul eden pencere öğelerinin bağlantılı listesinde odağı sonraki eşdüzey pencere öğesine kaydırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15219">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15220">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15220">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15221">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15221">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15222">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15222">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15223">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) odak taşındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15223">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15224">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) odak taşınmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15224">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15225">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15225">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15227">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15227">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15228">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15228">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15229">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15229">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15230">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15230">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
widget in the navigation order */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15248">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15248">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15249">Belirtilen kaynak kimliği için yazı tipini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15249">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15250">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15250">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15251">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15251">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15252">Bu hizmet, belirtilen kaynak kimliğiyle ilişkili yazı tipini, pencere öğesi görünür olduğu ekranın yazı tipi tablosundan alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15252">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15253">Bu işlev yalnızca görünür bir pencere öğesi tarafından çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15253">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15254">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15255">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15255">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15256">**resource_id** Yazı tipi kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15256">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15257">**return_font** Yazı tipi işaretçisi için hedefin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15257">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15258">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15258">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15259">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarıyla alınan yazı tipi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15259">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15260">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15260">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15261">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Pencere öğesi tuvali geçerli değil veya pencere öğesi görünmez</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15261">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15262">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15262">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15263">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15263">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15264">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15264">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15265">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15265">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15266">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15266">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15270">gx_widget_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15270">gx_widget_free</span></span>
### <a name="release-memory-associated-with-a-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15271">Pencere öğesi ile ilişkili yayın belleği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15271">Release memory associated with a widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15272">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15272">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_free(GX_WIDGETG *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15273">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15274">Bu hizmet, bir pencere öğesi denetim bloğu ile ilişkili belleği serbest bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15274">This service releases the memory associated with a widget control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15275">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15275">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15276">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15276">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15277">**resource_id** Yazı tipinin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15277">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15278">**return_font** Yazı tipi işaretçisi için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15278">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15279">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15279">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15280">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarıyla serbest bırakıldı pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15280">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully freed widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15281">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) bellek boş işlevi tanımlı değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15281">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15282">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15282">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15283">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15284">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15284">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15285">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15285">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15322">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15322">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15323">Pencere öğesini öne taşı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15323">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15324">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15324">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15325">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15325">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15326">Bu hizmet, alt pencere öğelerinin üst Z sırası listesindeki pencere öğesini öne hareket ettirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15326">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15327">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15327">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15328">**pencere öğesi** Taşınacak pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15328">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15329">**return_moved** Gösterge pencere öğesi için hedef işaretçisi taşındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15329">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15330">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15330">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15331">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi öne taşı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15331">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15333">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) zaten ön pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15333">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15334">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15334">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15335">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15335">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15336">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15336">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15337">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15337">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15338">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15338">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL widget_moved;

/* Move widget “my_widget” to the front. */
status = gx_widget_front_move(&my_widget, &widget_moved);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “widget_moved” is GX_TRUE, the
widget “my_widget” was moved to the front . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15375">gx_widget_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15375">gx_widget_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15376">Pencere öğesi yüksekliğini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15376">Get widget height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15377">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15377">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_height_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15378">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15378">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15379">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi yüksekliğini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15379">This service gets the widget height.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15380">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15381">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15381">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15382">**return_height** Pencere öğesi yüksekliği için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15382">**return_height** Pointer to destination for widget height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15383">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15383">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi yüksekliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15385">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15385">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15386">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15386">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15387">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15387">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15388">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15388">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15389">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15389">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15390">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15390">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE widget_height;

/* Get height for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_height_get(&my_widget, &widget_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the height of the widget is contained in
“widget_height” . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15427">gx_widget_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15427">gx_widget_hide</span></span>
### <a name="hide-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15428">Pencere öğesi gizleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15428">Hide widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15429">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15429">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_hide(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15430">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15430">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15431">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi gizler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15431">This service hides the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15432">Bu pencere öğesi yine üst öğeye iliştirilmiş durumdadır, ancak tuvale çizmesine izin verilmez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15432">This widget is still attached to it's parent, but it is not allowed to draw on the canvas.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15433">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15433">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15434">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15434">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15435">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi gizleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15440">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15441">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15442">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15442">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Hide widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_hide(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is hidden. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_last_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15479">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15479">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-last-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15480">Son alt pencere öğesi için işaretçiyi iade edin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15480">Return pointer to last child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15481">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15481">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_last_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15482">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15482">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15483">GUIX, üst ve alt pencere öğelerinin ağaç yapılandırılmış listesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15483">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15484">Bu hizmet, üst öğenin son alt pencere öğesi için bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15484">This service returns a pointer to the last child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15485">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15485">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15486">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15486">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15487">**widget_return** Pencere öğesi işaretçisini iade etmek için işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15487">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15488">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15488">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) işaretçisi döndürüldü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15490">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15490">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15492">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15492">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15493">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15493">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15494">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15494">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_last_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
              return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_next_sibling_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15501">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15501">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-next-sibling-of-current-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15502">Geçerli pencere öğesinin sonraki eşdüzey işaretçisine dön</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15502">Return pointer to next sibling of current widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15503">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15503">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15504">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15504">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15505">GUX, üst ve alt pencere öğelerinin yapılandırılmış bir listesini tutar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15505">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15506">Bu hizmet, geçerli pencere öğesinin bir sonraki eşdüzey öğesine bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15506">This service returns a pointer to the next sibling of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15507">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15507">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15508">**geçerli** Geçerli pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15508">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15510">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15510">Return Values</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve next sibling widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_next(GX_WIDGET *current)
```

```C

    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15553">**pixelmap_id** Piksel haritası kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15553">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15554">**return_pixelmap** Piksel haritası hedef işaretçisi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15554">**return_pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap destination pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15557">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15557">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15558">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) pencere öğesi tuvali geçerli değil veya pencere öğesi görünmez</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15558">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15561">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15561">Allowed From</span></span>

```c

/* Get the pixelmap associated with MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15642">gx_widget_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15642">gx_widget_shift</span></span>
### <a name="shift-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15643">Shift pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15643">Shift widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15644">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15644">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_shift(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift, 
    GX_BOOL mark_dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15645">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15645">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15646">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi kaydırarak isteğe bağlı olarak kirli olarak işaretler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15646">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15647">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15647">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15648">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15648">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15649">**x_shift** x ekseninde kaydırmak için piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15649">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15650">**y_shift** Y ekseninde kaydırmak için piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15650">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15651">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE, aksi takdirde kirli olduğunu GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15651">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15652">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15652">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15653">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi kaydırma GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15653">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget shift GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15655">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15655">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15656">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15656">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15657">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15657">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15658">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15658">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_shift(&my_widget, 10, 20, GX_FALSE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15695">gx_widget_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15695">gx_widget_show</span></span>
### <a name="show-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15696">Pencere öğesi göster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15696">Show widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15697">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15697">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_show(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15698">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15698">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15699">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi gösterir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15699">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15700">Pencere öğesi yalnızca bir üst öğeye iliştirilmişse görünür hale gelir ve üst pencere öğesi de görünür olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15700">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15701">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15701">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15702">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15702">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15703">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15703">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi Show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15708">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15708">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15709">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15709">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15710">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15710">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Show widget “my_widget”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shown. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15747">gx_widget_status_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15747">gx_widget_status_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15748">Pencere öğesi durumu Ekle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15748">Add widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15749">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15749">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15750">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15750">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15751">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere öğesine durum bayraklarının herhangi bir birleşimini ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15751">This service adds any combination of status flags to the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15752">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15752">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15753">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15753">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15754">**durum** Eklenecek durum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15754">**status** Status to add</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15755">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15755">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15756">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi durumu ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15756">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15757">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15757">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15758">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15758">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15759">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15759">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15760">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15760">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15761">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15761">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add status to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_add(&my_widget, status_to_add);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15798">gx_widget_status_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15798">gx_widget_status_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15799">Pencere öğesi durumunu al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15799">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15800">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15801">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15802">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesinin durum bayraklarını alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15802">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15803">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15804">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15804">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15805">**return_status** Döndürülen durum işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15805">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15806">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15806">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15807">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi durumu Al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15807">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15808">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15808">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15809">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15809">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15810">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15810">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15811">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15811">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15812">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15812">Example</span></span>

```C
ULONT get_status;

/* Retrieve status flag from widget “my_widget”. */ status =
gx_widget_status_get(&my_widget, &get_status);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the status from widget “my_widget” is
saved to “get_status”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15848">gx_widget_status_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15848">gx_widget_status_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15849">Pencere öğesi durumunu kaldır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15849">Remove widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15850">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15850">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15851">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15851">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15852">Bu hizmet, pencere öğeleri iç durum değişkeninden belirtilen durum bayraklarını kaldırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15852">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15853">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15853">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15854">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15854">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15855">**durum** Kaldırılacak durum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15855">**status** Status to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15856">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15856">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15857">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi durumu kaldırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15857">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status removal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15858">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15858">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15859">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15859">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15860">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15860">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15861">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15861">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15862">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15862">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_remove(&my_widget, status_to_remove);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the status flags are removed from the
widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15899">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15899">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15900">Test pencere öğesi durumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15900">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15901">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15901">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15902">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15903">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere öğesinin durum bayraklarını sınar ve sonucu "return_test" ile işaret edilen bellekte depolar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15903">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15904">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15904">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15905">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15905">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15906">**durum** Test için durum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15906">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15907">**return_status** Test sonucu için hedefe işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15907">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15908">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15908">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi durum testi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15910">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15910">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15911">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15911">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15912">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15912">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15913">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15913">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15914">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15914">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL test_result;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_test(&my_widget, status_to_test,
                              &test_result);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was tested
and the result in “test_result”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15923">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15923">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15924">Görünür bir pencere öğesi ve dize kimliğiyle ilişkili dizeyi alma (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15924">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15925">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15925">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15926">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15926">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15927">Bu hizmet, gx_widget_string_get_ext() tercihi ile kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15927">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15928">Bu hizmet, verilen dize kimliği değeri için dize tablosu girişini döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15928">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15929">Bu hizmet gx_display_string_get benzerdir, ancak etkin görüntü çağıranın geçirilene değil otomatik olarak belirlenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15929">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15930">Bu hizmet yalnızca görünen pencere öğeleri için kullanılabilir, yani bu pencere öğesiyle ilişkili görüntüleme bilinmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15930">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15934">**dize** Dizeyi döndüren değişkenin adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15934">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi durum testi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15938">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15938">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15955">**dize** Dizeyi döndüren değişkenin adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15955">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15966">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15966">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15967">Pencere öğesi stili ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15967">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15968">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15968">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15969">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15969">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15970">Bu hizmet pencere öğesine bir stil ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15970">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15971">Ayrıca, aşağıdaki eylemler alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15971">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15972">Eklenen stil GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, durum GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT eklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15972">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15973">Eklenen stil GX_STYLE_ENABLED, durum GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE eklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15973">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15974">Pencere öğesi görünür durumda ise, otomatik olarak geçersiz kılınmış ve yeniden çizi için kuyruğa eklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15974">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15975">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15976">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15976">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15977">**style (stil)** Eklemek için yeni stil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15977">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15978">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15978">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15979">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15979">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15980">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi stili ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15980">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15981">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15981">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15982">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15982">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15983">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15983">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15984">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15984">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15985">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15985">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-15986">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-15986">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_add(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style was successfully applied to the widget “my_widget”. */
```

```C

    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG *return_style)
```
