## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16075">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16075">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16076">Pencere öğesi stilini kaldır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16076">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16077">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16077">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16078">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16078">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16079">Bu hizmet pencere öğesinin bir stilini kaldırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16079">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16080">Ayrıca, aşağıdaki eylemler alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16080">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16081">Kaldırılan stil GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, durum GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT kaldırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16081">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16082">Kaldırılan stil GX_STYLE_ENABLED, durum GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE kaldırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16082">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16083">Pencere öğesi görünür durumdaysa otomatik olarak geçersiz kılınır ve yeniden çizim için sıraya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16083">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16084">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16084">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16085">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16085">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16086">**Stil** Kaldırılacak stil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16086">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16087">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16087">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16088">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16088">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16089">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi stili kaldır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16089">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16090">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16090">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16091">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16091">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16092">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16092">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16093">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16093">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16094">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16094">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16095">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16095">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16133">Pencere öğesi stilini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16133">Set widget style</span></span>

```C
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16135">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16135">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16136">Bu hizmet pencere öğesine bir stil ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16136">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16137">Küme stili GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT içeriyorsa, durum GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT eklenir, aksi takdirde durum kaldırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16137">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16138">Küme stili GX_STYLE_ENABLED içeriyorsa, durum GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE eklenir, aksi takdirde durum kaldırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16138">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16139">Pencere öğesi görünür durumdaysa otomatik olarak geçersiz kılınır ve yeniden çizim için sıraya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16139">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16142">**style (stil)** Ayar için stil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16142">**style** Style to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16143">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16143">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

```C
gx_string render_string;
render_string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello”;
render_string.gx_string_length =
    strlen(render_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Blend “my_string” over “my_widget” given alpha value 120. */
status = gx_widget_text_blend_ext(&my_widget,
        my_text_color,
        my_font_id,
        &render_string, xoffset, yoffset, 120);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_string” has been blend to “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_top_visible_child_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16299">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16299">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-visible-child-that-is-top-of-z-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16300">Z sırasına göre görünen alta işaretçiyi iade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16300">Return pointer to visible child that is top of Z order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16301">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16301">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16302">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16303">GUIX, üst ve alt pencere öğelerinin ağaç yapılandırılmış listesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16303">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16304">Bu hizmet, geçerli pencere öğesi için en üstteki görünür alta bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16304">This service returns a pointer to the topmost visible child of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16305">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16306">**geçerli** Geçerli pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16306">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16307">**widget_return** Pencere öğesi işaretçisini iade etmek için işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16307">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16308">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16308">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16309">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) işaretçisi döndürüldü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16309">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16310">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16310">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16312">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16312">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16313">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16313">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16314">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16314">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16424">gx_window_client_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16424">gx_window_client_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-client-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16425">Pencere istemci yüksekliğini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16425">Get window client height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16426">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16426">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_height_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16427">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16427">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16428">Bu hizmet, pencerenin istemci yüksekliğini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16428">This service gets the client height of the window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16429">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16429">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16430">**pencere** Pencere işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16430">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16431">**return_height** İstemci yüksekliğinin hedefi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16431">**return_height** Pointer to destination for client height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16432">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16432">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere istemci yüksekliği al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16434">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16434">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16435">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16435">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16436">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16436">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16437">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16437">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16438">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16438">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE my_client_height;

/* Get client height of “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_client_height_get(&my_window,
                                     &my_client_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window “my_window” client height is contained in “my_client_height”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_scroll"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16454">gx_window_client_scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16454">gx_window_client_scroll</span></span>
### <a name="scroll-window-clients"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16455">Kaydırma penceresi istemcileri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16455">Scroll window clients</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16456">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16456">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_scroll(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_VALUE x_scroll,
    GX_VALUE y_scroll);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16457">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16458">Bu hizmet, pencere istemcilerini belirtilen miktarda kaydırıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16458">This service scrolls the window clients by the specified amount.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16459">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16459">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16460">**window (pencere)** Pencere işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16460">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16461">**x_scroll** X ekseninde kaydırma miktarı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16461">**x_scroll** Amount to scroll on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16462">**y_scroll** Y ekseninde kaydırma miktarı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16462">**y_scroll** Amount to scroll on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16463">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16463">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16464">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere istemcisi kaydırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16464">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client scroll</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16465">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16465">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16466">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16466">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16467">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16467">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16468">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) kaydırma değerleri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16468">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16469">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16469">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16470">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16470">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16471">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16471">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Scroll clients of “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_client_scroll(&my_window, 10, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the clients of window “my_window” have been scrolled. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16516">gx_window_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16516">gx_window_close</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16518">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16518">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_close(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16519">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16519">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16520">Bu hizmet, kalıcı bir pencerenin üst öğesinden ayrılmaya ve kalıcı yürütme döngüsünden geri dönmesini zorlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16520">This service forces a modal window to detach from its parent and return from the modal execution loop.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16524">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pencereyi başarıyla kapattı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16524">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully closed window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16525">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16525">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16526">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16526">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16527">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16527">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16528">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16528">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16529">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16529">Initialization and threads</span></span>


## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16546">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16546">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16547">Oluştur penceresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16547">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16548">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16548">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16549">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16550">Bu hizmet bir pencere oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16550">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16551">GX_WINDOW, api hizmetlerinden GX_WIDGET ve tüm api gx_widget destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16551">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16552">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16552">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16553">**window (pencere)** Pencere denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16553">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16554">**name** Pencerenin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16554">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16555">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16555">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16556">**style (stil)** Pencere stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16556">**style** Window style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16557">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16557">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16558">**window_id** Pencerenin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16558">**window_id** Application-defined ID of the window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16559">**boyut** Pencerenin boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16559">**size** Size of the window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16560">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16560">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16561">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16561">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16562">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16562">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16563">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16563">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16564">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16564">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16565">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16565">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16566">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16566">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16567">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16567">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16568">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16568">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16569">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16569">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WINDOW my_window;

/* Create window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_create(&my_window, "my window",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                          MY_WINDOW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16588">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16588">Description</span></span>

### <a name="process-window-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16614">İşlem penceresi olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16614">Process window event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16615">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16615">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_event_process(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16616">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16616">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16617">Bu hizmet, bu pencere için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16617">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16618">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16618">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16619">**pencere** Pencere denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16619">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16620">**olay** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16620">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16621">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16621">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16622">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere olay işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16622">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16625">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16625">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16626">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16626">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16627">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16627">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16628">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16628">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16644">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16644">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16645">Bir pencereyi mod ile yürütme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16645">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16646">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16646">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16647">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16647">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16648">Bu hizmet, bir pencereyi mod olarak yürütür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16648">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16649">Pencere istemci alanı dışındaki tüm kullanıcı girişleri (kalem olayları vb.) yoksayılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16649">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16650">Bu işlevin bir sürekli engelleme yürütme döngüsü girdiğine ve model yürütmesi sonlandırılana kadar çağırana dönmez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16650">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16651">Alınan herhangi bir olay için olay işleme sıfır olmayan bir durum değeri döndür olduğunda veya api işlevi çağrıldığında kalıcı yürütme gx_window_close sonlandırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16651">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16652">Sıfır olmayan olay işleme dönüş kodu, bu API'ye geçirilen return_ptr çağrıyı yapana döndürülür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16652">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16653">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16653">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16654">**window (pencere)** Pencere denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16654">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16655">**return_ptr** Kalıcı yürütme çıkış durumunu kaydetme konumu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16655">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16656">Bu durum GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16656">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16657">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16657">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı yürütme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful execution</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16659">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Olay kuyruğundan toplama olayı başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16659">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Pickup event from event queue failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16660">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16660">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16663">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16663">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16664">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16664">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16665">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16665">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Execute a modal window. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window was executed, and return_code holds the execution return code. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16743">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16743">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16744">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16744">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16745">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16745">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16746">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16746">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_root_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16762">gx_window_root_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16762">gx_window_root_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16763">Kök pencereyi bul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16763">Find root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16764">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16764">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_find(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root_window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16765">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16765">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16769">**return_root_window** Bulunan kök pencere için hedefin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16769">**return_root_window** Pointer to destination for found root window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16770">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16793">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16793">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-scroll-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16794">Pencere kaydırma bilgilerini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16794">Get window scroll info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16795">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16795">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16796">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16796">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16797">Bu hizmet pencere kaydırma bilgilerini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16797">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16798">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16798">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16799">**window (pencere)** Pencere işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16799">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16800">**style (stil)** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL veya GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16800">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16801">**return_scroll_info** Kaydırma bilgileri için hedefin işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16801">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16802">Üst pencere bu yapıyı başlatarak üst pencere toplam boyutu, değiştirilebilir alan ve kaydırma artış ve sınırları hakkında kaydırma çubuğuna bilgi verir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16802">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16803">Varsayılan uygulama, değiştirilebilir alan olarak Windows istemci alanı kullanır ve piksellere göre kaydırır, ancak özelleştirilmiş pencere uygulaması kaydırma parametrelerini kullanabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16803">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16804">**Ek I,** GX_SCROLL_INFO yapısının tanımını içerir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16804">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16805">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16805">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16806">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere kaydırma bilgileri get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16806">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16807">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16807">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16808">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16808">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16809">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Geçersiz tür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16809">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16810">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16810">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16811">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16811">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16812">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16812">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scroll_info_get(&my_window,
                    GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scrollbar_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16828">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16828">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16861">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16861">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16862">Pencere duvar kağıdını al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16862">Get window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16863">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16863">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID *return_wallpaper_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16864">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16865">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere için duvar kağıdını alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16865">This service gets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16866">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16866">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16867">**window (pencere)** Pencere işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16867">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16868">**return_wallpaper_id** Duvar kağıdının kaynak kimliği için hedefe işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16868">**return_wallpaper_id** Pointer to destination for resource ID of wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16869">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16869">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere duvar kağıdı al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16871">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16871">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16872">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16872">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16873">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16873">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16875">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16875">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RESOURCE_ID my_window_wallpaper;

/* Get wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_get(&my_window, &my_window_wallpaper);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_window_wallpaper” contains the wallpaper resource ID for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16891">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16891">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16892">Pencere duvar kağıdı ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16892">Set window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16893">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16893">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_set(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16894">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16894">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16895">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere için duvar kağıdını ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16895">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16896">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16896">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16897">**window (pencere)** Pencere işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16897">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16898">**wallpaper_id** Kullanmak üzere duvar kağıdının kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16898">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16899">**kutucuk** Duvar kağıdı, duvar kağıdı GX_TRUE değilse duvar kağıdı kutucukla birlikte kutucuk içinde değildir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16899">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16900">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16900">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere duvar kağıdı kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16904">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16904">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16905">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16905">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16906">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16906">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8f18-16907">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8f18-16907">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,
                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the wallpaper for window “my_window” is set. */
```
